So much easier... -Filter and sort is terrible. It closes with ever selection you make. So be prepared to have to hit “filter” 10 times if you want to find a red women’s top in the correct size
Title: Bring back old format

Content: It was an excellent application but with the latest updates it is extremely difficult to use it: it constantly asks for the password to mark favorites or to pay what I have in my cart.
Title: Was an excellent app

Content: I have not updated to the latest version of the app.  As of last night, I cannot sign in on my iPhone.  However, I can sign in on my iPad.  I can even sign in on my 8-year-old iPod Touch!  I have the same version of the app and the same iOS on my iPhone and iPad, so only being able to sign in on one makes no sense.  There’s always some kind of bug in this app, so I hesitate to update it.  Please listen to your customers and fix these bugs!  Thank you.
Title: Can’t sign in!

Content: I love this app soo much! I buy everything from this app mainly because I don’t want to leave the house. This app has made it so easy for me and I would give this 5 STARS! Thanks so much and I am looking forward to buying my next item
Title: Impressed!

Content: Why the pointless change in search results display? For the iPad app, it changed from a scannable list of reasonably sized items to the GINORMOUS display of single items that cannot be scanned. Not useful at all. Options for users to change their own screen displays might actually be helpful (standard feature for many websites, as you well know). Your latest display decision is awful.
Title: Search results display has changed for the worse

Content: Haven’t you ever heard “if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it!”? I don’t know why you changed the lists function to that dumb heart instead of drag and drop, but I HATE IT. Search results are often repetitive and sometimes completely unrelated.  Also, when I check out and choose not to apply my store card rewards, it ignores my selection and applies them to my order anyway. Let me save my 5% back rewards! Jeez. Get it together.
Title: Bring back drag and drop lists!

Content: Among other things, I can’t select and drag an item to my lists. The sudden changes; why it’s not improving anything. There’s no longer an ease of use. I can’t even access my own list. Answers please.
Title: Why change a good thing.

Content: I have not been able to back arrow on my iPhone since last week. It’s annoying because I have to move to the basket and then I can search and continue to shop. Is there a fix? Thanks
Title: My App problem

Content: I ordered an item and it told me it would arrive June 28. It never came. I looked at my email and all I could find was a confirmation that I had ordered it. So finally after searching I see there’s a messages tab on the app and that’s where it decides to tell me my order was cancelled even though every other time that my orders were cancelled it emails me. Now I gotta wait another 4 days
Title: Order cancelled without me knowing

Content: Can you make it easier to give you feature requests in the app?  Can you also make it so that I can select and see the total cost of things I put in a wishlist and then make it so I can just add all the ones I have selected into the cart for purchase?  Thanks!
Title: Feature Requests

Content: Don’t believe their “free two day shipping” it will never come in two days. It will never come in three days. Usually 5-7 days. Also never pay for expedited shipping either. It will never come in the time frame quoted either. I live in Monterey, CA not out in the middle of Montana. There should be no reason why my packages cannot arrive at the quoted time. You’re better off ordering your products from their actual home site. This company is a joke and a complete rip off.
Title: Shipping

Content: I think the driver tracker needs a little tweaking. I mean it works fine but recently it keeps saying “1 stop away,” even when it doesn’t look like it is. See if you can look into this and perhaps keep a look out for any bugs that may be in the app presently.
Title: I’m just guessing but...

Content: The current IOS version for this application on the new 2018 version of IPads does not allow for the purchasing of kindle books. It sends a shopper into an endless loop with no option to actually purchase the books. I have to go online to the website in order to complete purchases. What is the point of having this application if I still have to go to the website?
Title: Purchasing books on kindle issues

Content: Unfortunately Amazon’s relentless focus on customers has come to an end. Chat bots don’t answer your questions, outsourced customer service is a joke, constant delays in shipping times. They don’t need your business anymore. Shop the competition. Often the prices are better. I use to pay a little extra for the great service, but that service is now lacking.
Title: Unfortunately, they’ve gotten too big.

Content: First off, i would agree with many of the other newer reviews. The app has gone from something very useful to something not useful at all.  When i put something in my cart and set the address, the address changes in the cart. Ive sent 3 packages to the wrong person, then figured out what was going on.  On top of the logistic issues, less prosucts are prime and many of them have fake reviews. Keep the 3rd party sellers in north america not china.
Title: Starting to turn out like sears

Content: I like the app but the new update removed the shortcuts to the lightning deals, wish list recommended items and orders.  I constantly go to the online version. Wish they would bring those back.
Title: Like the App, but miss the old shortcuts

Content: Love the app but one problem  Every time I see the buy with one click it scares me because I might press it by accident i hope in a future update you will make an option to turn it off
Title: One problem

Content: What the heck? Tried to post a few reviews and it’s telling me there’s a problem and to resubmit...I keep hitting the resubmit but same message pops up.  Anyone else having this trouble? The customer service in the Chat app wasn’t very helpful and told me someone will follow up with me in 24hrs.  Tip: So you don’t have to retype in case the screen refreshes, suggest you type your review in an email to yourself and save the drafts often so you have a copy when the app fails you.
Title: Reviews are not positing

Content: I can’t click anything on the top of the screen!! Back arrow, my notifications, search or my cart etc. I have to keep closing the app and opening it again, and starting over. This started happing after the most recent update today. Annoying.
Title: What happened???

Content: Thanks to the most recent update, when you try to add to cart or checkout, you're given a error message, "sorry, something went wrong," and nothing happens.   Similarly, thanks to the update, you can find yourself stuck in checkout purgatory.  Clicking "place your order" will revert your screen to "proceed to checkout."  Fix these bugs that didn't previously exist.
Title: Updates are making app worse

Content: I hope they don’t start charging everyone for returns. That may make people who would order  think about it first. That would not be good for business. Thanks
Title: Returns

Content: Tried other market places and this is the most trustworthy place to buy things when living far from the city.
Title: Happy

Content: Please, I beg you, stop messing with the filter! It is so hard to navigate 10k search results without the filters and I feel like that feature keeps getting updated for the worst. I keep getting the same promoted items which are typically trash that I need to return. Give me the best prices and let me buy slightly used items from good brands and I swear I’ll buy more stuff. Please.
Title: Please stop messing with the filters!

Content: The app is amazing but I so wish it would offer iPhone users a dark mode. When I’m browsing at night, the whiteness of it just kills my eyes. I go full on dark mode whenever I can and this app doesn’t give the option. Bummer
Title: Great App but so bright!

Content: I am visually impaired and this app needs the pinch/spread action to be able to see things. I’ve purchased the wrong items more than once and I feel there is no excuse for this to be an issue with the Monopoly it has.
Title: It’s ok for some…

Content: I cannot for the life of me see my active orders anymore. I have to scroll all the way back for stuff that I preordered. Please add something in the filter for orders to see only what all active open orders we have. Before this update the app would separate active orders and delivered orders and it made it very easy to see what was coming and when. Please add this back or make it an option on the filter
Title: Please fix order filter

Content: I have yet to find a better way to buy everything I didn’t even know that I needed. It’s like I’m scamming myself out of all my money!  Easy to navigate and great functionality.
Title: Wonderful!

Content: Used to be able to click top deal for deal of the day. Now you have to go though 100’s of deals that aren’t deal of the days. Also questions are missing. Not liking the changes in the last 2 months to the app!!!
Title: Hard to find deal of the day / Top Deal!!!

Content: I do like the percentage of 5 star reviews but I’d rather know number of ratings.  75% 5* reviews means nothing if there’s only 4 reviews. Bring back number of reviews please. You’re wasting my time, I’m less likely to buy a product with a few reviews and absolutely refuse to buy one now as I feel duped into clicking it.
Title: Downgrade a couple of days ago.

Content: What a waste of time, after confirming my order of $181 for supplies needed the next day they canceled my order and only $24 worth of the supplies were ordered. Won’t even tell me what items were canceled. Canceling prime and going back to being prepared and not depending on overnight shipping…………...  *UPDATE* After reordering everything and continuing to shop around, my account was locked. Never again.
Title: Canceled my order after confirming

Content: I have several orders that are listed as arriving late on the App, but I have received them. Please add an option to mark them as received. Otherwise, this is a great app.
Title: Orders tab needs way to acknowledge order

Content: What happened to being able to hold down the little heart and save it to a specific list you wanted? Now it has to be saved to a main one then moved….too much work! And why change the stupid search bar to the bottom. It’s been at the top for years….who decided that was a good idea?! Fix it!
Title: New update issues

Content: Why is this the second time my order has been late!!!?? I ordered an item five days ago and it just arrived today when it said it’d be here 3 days ago. The day before yesterday I ordered something else and it said it’d be here by 8pm …it’s not going to be here and if it isn’t I am honestly done with this app.
Title: Dissatisfied

Content: This is a decent app, but moving the search bar to the bottom really messes up the experience. It’s not intuitive and it feels very awkward to me. At least let the user choose options!
Title: Liked it better before search bar went to the bottom

Content: Since the app was upgraded, it moved the search bar to the bottom of the screen which drives me crazy.  Also the search feature ignores a lot of the words you put in the search.  I had better search results before the “update”
Title: The upgrade stinks

Content: Don’t expect to get what you paid for or have been promised. Items consisting arrived broken or have missing parts. Wool socks have no wool. Sterling silver earrings aren’t all sterling silver. The brand name is spelled one way on the screen and arrive with a miss spelled logo. You buy something and the price changes just at the end of your process. The date and time of your item arriving is never correct. It’s a scam!
Title: This is a second or nock off retailer.

Content: The app is now randomly adding all of the Assurion insurance products to my cart every time I want to add an expensive item even though I say NO to adding them. Also the card just randomly moves to checkout phase and I have to close the app and reopen it to look at my cart again. This has been going on for over 2 weeks.
Title: No! I do not want insurance!

Content: I do love the ease of finding what I’m looking for when shopping, tracking my orders and such, but I wish it were easier to find account information. It’s frustrating to try to complete simple “house keeping” on my account and I can’t even find it.
Title: It’s great for normal ordering but …

Content: After updating iOS to latest version, I can no longer view my orders. It just says still loading & nothing ever loads. It does the same thing for lists & but again options. Deleted app and added again with same results.
Title: App Issues After Latest 16.3 Update

Content: The app frequently malfunctions causing the add to cart and other buttons on the specific items pages to no longer work. It’s very frustrating! The app is also extremely slow often taking a long time to load search results. Overall the app has a lot of bug issues that the browser shopping site doesn’t have.
Title: App Malfunctions all the time

Content: I just don’t like the fact that every time I ordered something it came a whole day late and then I recently ordered some stuff and it was a whole week late like bro it shouldn’t take that long it definitely shouldn’t take a whole week for something so small to get here
Title: Late deliveries

Content: Yesterday I could click on the three lines on the bottom right of the app and there would be a button to click called orders. I use that ALL of the time to reorder things and to track order delivery info. That orders button is gone now and it isn’t obvious where I should go now to find the info.
Title: Where’s the order history?

Content: Adding commercials to my searches now? WTH is this garbage? New bar at the bottom takes up viewing space. Pages on the iPad automatically resize and only use 2/3 to 3/4 of the screen making it difficult to read the tiny print
Title: New layout is not an improvement

Content: There is no way to disable “Deals” and advertising notifications in the app. They force you to receive these advertisements daily if you want to also receive notifications about your orders. Called support and was told I had to choose between not receiving any notifications at all, or receive notifications but also advertisements on my phone.
Title: Notification Trap

Content: every time i look at a product on the app, as i scroll down my screen turns white and sometimes i’m able to close the app and try again. most times i’m not lucky. love the app just hard to figure out what’s what when the whole app turns white.
Title: A Little Buggy

Content: Please make these impromptu, unsolicited customer videos, modeling the clothing, stop. I cant even assess the item while browsing & it makes me want to keep scrolling to items without random people twirling around. If I want to see a video, I want the option to click on it, not have the movement while I’m scrolling. Absolutely hate it.   Why do I need TO INVENT A NICKNAME TO LEAVE a review.
Title: Customer videos

Content: Makes shopping very easy… sit at home and buy pretty much whatever you want … love the no shipping charge … If I did not like what I’ve ordered I’ve been able to send the item back
Title: Eagle

Content: Just which each order can come down my road, instead of picking up my order at the store
Title: Easy to order

Content: Customer service is awesome. Love they provide updates and pics of what’s going on with your order. And they have almost everything you could need
Title: I love them

Content: Love it but customer service can be a lil nicer . I spend so so much money here . But I’ve had a problem lately on and off with missing items . But other than that I Love this place !
Title: I spend alllll my money here ! Love it !

Content: I buy items based upon value for the money.  It’s very nice when the price per ounce is listed on items.  It needs to be on all items to make it less of a struggle to pick the best priced item. Hopefully that will happen soon.
Title: $ per ounce

Content: They go up on the yearly fee and most items are either out of stock or sky high prices. Finding things a lot cheaper at other places like Walmart and same item. Then I wanted to buy one thing that was not good but they listed it under the Fresh items and can’t get it without spending $35 and it’s only $3.99. What a rip off!Godfather59
Title: Use to be better

Content: I love the expedited, 2-day shipping with Prime!  That’s why I pay for it! However, sometimes I purchased international items that took 6+ weeks to arrive…if I’m lucky.  My item was listed as Prime so I didn’t think twice about it. Please do not list items as Prime when the company cannot get it to the customer within the 2 day delivery time. Shipping in 2 days does not count! Also, no way to cancel the order, even immediately, when it is shipping internationally.  I understand that you do business on an international level but, be transparent about DELIVERY TIME, please. Much appreciated!
Title: PLEASE WORK ON IT

Content: These were the best laces for me. I use them all sorts of things not just shoes. I tie them on all my game calls.  They even helped me get a bear I shot, out of a deep canyon.  I tied him to a stick with leather shoe laces.              Would recommend to any sportsman or outdoor enthusiast.
Title: All tied up

Content: You guys would be on TOP of everything lately it just been a running around.  I’ve done requested a call and chatted with someone for this issue. I haven’t got my package or my refund back.  I’ve been waiting for a week in half for this package OR an email to make a complaint. This haven’t been the first package either  I haven’t received.
Title: Still Waiting

Content: You get everything in a timely manner has everything possible and is fast and is and it feels like I get a gift every time a package comes good prices and Amazing return policy
Title: Amazing must have app

Content: I’m always amazed that the prompts that are suggested are also quite helpful. I also found a New Box of Chocolate’s, candy’s that my Husband and I just love and the price is more reasonable than good ole Sees.  Like so many others, I find it just as easy to order a laxative that is needed, or of course the Holidays and Family special occasions.  I love being able to hold items for later. I generally purchase them eventually.   Mrs. Got-Rocks, I’m not. But I tend to spend like I am.
Title: Getting to know me

Content: Always receive items fast and tracking number is always available.
Title: Great service

Content: STOP SENDING ME DEALS NOTIFICATIONS when I can’t turn them off. I want to receive push notifications about my shipments, but NOT random deals I’m not interested in. The only way I can control this is to turn off all notifications, which is NOT USEFUL. Get it together and either give me the ability to manage different notification types, or don’t market to me using push.
Title: No way to turn off marketing notifications

Content: I love having one stop shopping for everything from my cars to my house! When people write good reviews it makes my decisions to purchase items easier.   The ability to search by brand or product is simple. I love being able to have all my vehicles in the garage and filter searches for each one.  This is my go to for quickly purchasing the item I need without ever leaving the comfort of my home!
Title: Easy to find exactly what I need

Content: I like the way I receive my orders they knock like I ask for them to and it’s there in a few days just like I won’t it to be very happy so far. Wasn’t as first but, got them trained. Perfect so far b
Title: Review for my order’s

Content: Close to Christmas and such cold weather needed to find a functional boot for the wife, it looked good and warm to me got it in the right size as well , hope you’ll have as much good luck as I did!!
Title: Just what I was looking for

Content: Even if problem with product never an issue to return always going above and beyond!!!
Title: Never disappointed

Content: Wish afterpay was a option when checking out
Title: Payment options

Content: Love app, but you can’t purchase kindle books from the app?  Have to go online or use a computer (not phone). Please make this functionality in your next version updating
Title: Kindle purchases from app

Content: No longer able to find upcoming deals to save on wishlist after last update. Please fix!! Only options under availability now are available and watchlist.
Title: Upcoming deal option missing

Content: You must have everything in the world at my fingertips. You make it to easy but it really helps those who can’t get out much. Thank you for your service.
Title: On line orders

Content: Is easy. Products always on time, in the shape I expected, plus you can go back and see what you have ordered before.  I have used that to reorder more than once.
Title: Shopping prime www

Content: With the latest updates, the app has become unusable for blind users. It is difficult to navigate to the content and read information with voiceover. It was very accessible a few weeks ago, however, recently it has become unusable. Therefore, I give it a three star.
Title: The app is not accessible with voiceover for blind or visually impaired users.

Content: I don’t like that when your item is either stolen or delivered to the wrong place you don’t compensate the customer and at some point I may stop shipping on line if I have any more problems with receiving things it always seems to be small item packages. Concerns me.  Thank you
Title: Value customer

Content: My iPhone just informed me that my iPhone se will not support the app and that a older more compatible version exists.  I have IOS 12.4 and it keeps kicking me into safari to look up on the web.  Please make an older version available so I don’t need to upgrade my phone yet.  Thank you.
Title: Older versions of app

Content: The app is easy to maneuver and ordering is quick and easy. I also get my packages in a timely manner. If they don't come in on time I don't fuss because I understand we are in a pandemic.
Title: App is easy to use

Content: I’ve been using the App for years and have found it very functional. However, since the most recent update (a week ago), when I open the App on my iPad Pro in landscape (horizontal) view, it displays in “vertical” view. If I rotate the iPad, it will show in landscape view - but the window is cropped. And even on my iPhone, although it displays correctly, the window is cropped.  What’s up?
Title: App display is cropped on my iPad since new update

Content: App doesn’t come up in landscape mode when the iPad is in landscape. And when it does, it only uses ~the top 2/3 of the screen. And is formatted such that the “Add to Cart” button is inaccessible off the right side of the screen. Going to the cart returns the view to portrait…  Really can’t be used to actually buy anything from an iPad. This is happening on two different iPads…
Title: This latest version is broken on the iPad

Content: The app doesn’t display correctly on my iPad. The bottom 1/3 of the screen is a blank space and cuts off the display window making it difficult to see items or menus. The app switches to portrait/vertical view constantly, even though I don’t change the position of my device. This is extremely annoying, especially since I prefer landscape/horizontal view.
Title: Terrible app update

Content: I would prefer that the app would allow me to limit inappropriate material from showing when I do searches. This is with merchandise as it is with prime videos. I also would like to prime videos to let me search out languages so I don’t search for a movie and then find out it doesn’t have English as a language that is offered.
Title: Limited Intelligence

Content: Please remind drivers that I have requested my purchases be delivered to my front and to knock on my door before leaving.  Twice, recently, my purchases have been left in my mailbox.  I need all items delivered to my front door.  Thank you.
Title: Packages don’t belong in my mailbox

Content: Thank you for helping us get through this mess. I so appreciate the convenience and the variety of products. And prices!!! But, best? Customer service. Your people been so helpful. Thank you.
Title: Thank you.

Content: App will not stay open after update. Crashes within seconds! Have removed & reinstalled without success.
Title: Useless after update

Content: The app is broken, it won’t let me add items to my cart, add items to my wish lists and it won’t let me return items through the app itself. I used the link through the App Store to try and contact support, but the link took me to the app, and there was no option to contact app support through the app. Even if it was an option, I’m sure it would be broken too! 😡
Title: The app is currently broken!

Content: If you put something from “Prime Wardrobe” in the cart, you have no choice but to order it. They don’t have a working option to delete the item. Probably they’re hoping most people will just order the item and keep it because they don’t want to deal with the hassle of canceling the order or sending the item back. It’s despicable.
Title: They try to force you to order stuff

Content: I just updated to the new version, and each time I click on it, it takes me out again. Please fix this bug!!!
Title: Don’t update to the new version!!!!

Content: This is my go to app for everything however since the last update it crashes as soon as it’s opened. Such a disappointment 😤
Title: Latest Updatr

Content: Please stop changing the location of links and information on this app. Completely unnecessary and really annoying.
Title: Disappointed

Content: For being determined to put customers first. Our family appreciates your business principles and the many wonderful employees that work so hard every day to deliver on your promise of excellent shopping experiences!  Thank Goodness!  Wendi
Title: Thanks Jeff Bezos

Content: Haven’t had any issues in however many orders. But once I had an issue (appears my order was shipped to a wrong address by the look of the photo), it’s impossible to get it resolved. I submitted “haven’t received item” and have yet to hear back.
Title: Good until an issue comes up

Content: I enjoy ordering here for can always track my order and if something goes wrong they are always willing to solve the issue.
Title: Please customer

Content: Wish you could email sellers & communicate with them through the app instead of having to go to my personal email account
Title: Simple & easy app to use. Great communication

Content: It would be awesome if we could bring back page numbers! Sometimes, if you’re comparing items, you want to bounce back and forth between pages. Would love it if those came back!
Title: Page numbers

Content: Limited items per page while searching for products. It would be nice if we didn’t have to click multiple pages.
Title: Items per page

Content: I like the fact that they give you the option to use your rewards on u you our credit card. Thank you
Title: Easy order

Content: Have had my Prime account for more than a few years and shopped occasionally.  When the pandemic arrived in the US, Amazon’s became and will remain my preferred way to shop.  Mr. Bezos - thank you for business model.  You’ve changed the world in a good way!
Title: Exceptional On-Line Experience

Content: This app is amazing and I highly recommend it, however, I do think it should have a dark mode. I also just bought a sword and it is very swag and cool
Title: I love this app. You can buy things online with try click of a button.

Content: Why did you remove the dates when looking at reviews? Only the "Top Reviews" section has dates now. This just makes it harder to make an informed decision when shopping. Normally I sort reviews by "Most Recent" and can get a good idea of if a manufacturer has presently changed their product for the worst or see how commonly duds occur, now I can't anymore. I waited to leave a review in case it was a glitch but it's been at least several days now.
Title: Updated App Hiding Review Dates

Content: Shopping experience great , customer service great as a believer in Christ I may not agree with all the technology and stuff but I do enjoy shopping here I believe great experience to try this , my orders that I purchase in the past have arrive good no damage at all
Title: Shopping

Content: Very slow loading when I click on something.
Title: Loading issues

Content: I have reached out many times on this item. I am unable to place reviews on items I have purchased. There was never a bad review from me and I still have yet to be told exactly why I can’t place reviews on items I have purchased. I would like to share with others the positivity that I have from certain purchases and provide recommendations for sizes and such.   Thank you for your review.
Title: Reviews

Content: What the heck is all this random stuff that I don’t care about???  It looks like I’m on QVC’s site. I’m a dude- why are you showing me all this stuff for women and home care and clothing. None of these are my typical shopping categories.   Let me customize my Home Screen to categories I WANNA SEE.  (Classic example of companies just doing too much). KEEP IT SIMPLE.  Change doesn’t always = Good.
Title: Version 17.x — REALLY DISLIKE HOME PAGE

Content: It’s an amazing app. This has save me from forgetting people’s gifts💀. The only thing is that sometimes things are too expensive plus shipping but I get it. You can also cancel order which is a relive to me because I never think before putting in a order. I recommend it.
Title: Amazing

Content: Keep changing it for the worst. The extra large blocks displaying the item after searching takes too long to scroll through to see lesser number of items.   Also notice the convoluted cycle of trying to find the customer service number. Takes you in a constant loop ending back in the place. What’s you angle?
Title: Put back the previous interface

Content: I ordered these two things.. i liked it and loved it very much ! The stones are solid which is perfect but, the lines weren’t strong enough to hold the stones so it easily losen. Pls next time, use fishing lines as bracelet strings so it won’t lose easily. Thank u and happy merry Christmas 😊❤️
Title: Necklace and bracelet.

Content: Can’t access Whole Foods cart and orders in iPad app. Works fine in iPhone app, but on iPad it is impossible to place Whole Foods pickup/delivery orders. Also cannot access the Whole Foods cart, even though the number of items appears.
Title: Can’t access Whole Foods cart and orders in iPad app

Content: It’s very difficult to apply specific filters in the app. I understand not wanting to have too many choices at the top bar, but that space should be used for common filters and the full set should be available in a menu that opens on the right side.
Title: Needs same filters as web version

Content: The app is easy to navigate around with easy to understand controls HOWEVER when searching for a specific item will sometimes result in a totally different item at the top of the list. Wish they fixed that for an easier time looking for the stuff you want.
Title: Search filters

Content: The only way I’ve found to manage my devices is through the app, but when I try to use it to find one of my children’s tablets, the lousy interface on the iPhone covers up the part where it’s trying to find the tablet. Peel off some of those billions of dollars in profits and find some competent person to fix this simple yet amazingly frustrating problem.
Title: Fire Tablet and the iPhone App

Content: I am legally blind and when I tap on item to magnify only item is zoomed NOT words The app worked better before upgrade. Can’t zoom list  so can’t order! I have iPhone 8. Your IT people need to correct this as soon as they can or I will continue to use Wish who has solved this problem Need ZOOM text ability!!
Title: Problem with zoom

Content: Gift-giving functionality is definitely improved.  Otherwise, this is just a fresh look, not a major upgrade.  Why do programmers release "new" versions that really aren't??
Title: Updated Look

Content: Don’t like the new App formatting changes. Especially putting a bar at bottom of screen, I can no longer swipe up to Print from phone.
Title: Can’t Print From iphone now

Content: Since I downloaded the app years ago, it has become more user-friendly. I enjoy utilizing the features and it is easy to navigate through the products.
Title: User-Friendly

Content: I really have to wonder about how legit all these one-star reviews are because from my experience this app is a dream. Fast, quick and easy to shop and look up and find ANYTHING your heart desires. You folks with the one star reviews are nuts.
Title: This app is a dream

Content: Most recent update has visually ruined a perfectly satisfactory app.  WHY in the world would you move the “buttons” to the bottom of the app?!?  They obscure the bottom of the pages in your searches and were just fine where they used to be.  Overall, this app is definitely easy to use but there was no need to change it from the previous version.
Title: Go back

Content: The app is great in general, but I really hate the new navigation bar that floats close to the bottom of the screen. It’s distracting and takes up way too much screen real estate. Make it flush with the bottom or top of the screen, or make it disappear when scrolling (like the bar in Safari).
Title: Annoying floating navigation bar

Content: I like it the subscribed items are a bit challenging to get to. And returns now are a bit hard when you have to take it somewhere. And you prefer not to go to a post office or a store. That’s the point of ordering thing to you.
Title: A few thing that could improve

Content: Theres an order history glitch im getting right now that all my items ive purchased aren’t showing up in my order history. I ordered some diapers, nightstands, and bottle nipples, all a couple weeks apart from the other and the bottle nipples and diapers are showing in my order history but the nightstands wont unless I specifically search for it? It was letting me see all my orders in my order history just a couple days ago. Please fix
Title: Order history glitch

Content: The RECENT update that was released. I was able to get the app to load up on the iPhone 11 Pro by deleting the app, restart phone, then re-download the app. After it might ask you to login again.  Hope this helps!
Title: iPhone 11 Pro iOS 13.4.1

Content: For those of you who are not able to open the app.  I was having the same issue.  I even powered off my phone, which didn’t do anything.  I then deleted the app and reinstalled it, based on advice I found online, and the app is now working again!
Title: App Issue workaround

Content: They use an oddball address and ask for your email address and login hard to tell who you are As it’s the same as phishing. Try going through your app ??thanks for locking up my app holes
Title: Security emails

Content: So far with All my purchases I’ve gotten exactly what I’ve expected. One product that I ordered was not and it was so easy to return. I’ve ordered kids products delivered to different States and with no problem.  Reasons for the 5 stars!
Title: Breeze

Content: Not sure if it was an update to ios or the app but shipping notifications were turned off. Re-enabled in the app so I know when packages are delivered before they get swiped by some ne' er-do-well.
Title: Great app but make sure you turn notifications back on

Content: I keep trying to log into my account to be able to order my things and it’s telling me my information is wrong even though I have my information saved into my phone. I was already logged in and can still view all of my accounts saved lists but not buy the things that I want because it’s telling me I need to log in first. I tried to reset my password but I am not receiving those emails. Please fix this.
Title: Trouble logging in

Content: I’m in agreement with everyone else that the recent updates aren’t working for me. I’m not sure if the dev team did it for performance enhancements reasons or if it was meant to help in some way we can’t see on the front end, but we all like the old version of the app better that allowed you to drag/drop items to wish lists and to have infinite scrolling when searching items. Please bring this function back!
Title: Used to be good

Content: Over the last few months the app will no longer keep me signed in, loses chat and lags. I have everything updated and all other apps work fine. You are a multi billion dollar company and as a prime member, I kinda want this to work so...figure it out! You want my thousands of dollars I spend per year, right? If not, fine. I can go back to other apps and vendors or god forbid, brick and mortar store fronts.
Title: The app is crap

Content: While I generally love this app, since the launch of iOS 13 I’ve been having issues with staying signed in. Basically every day it asks me to sign in again. It is extremely annoying.  My partner has had this issue with their account on their iPhone as well - so I know I’m not alone.  I would love to see this get fixed at which point I would happily amend my rating.
Title: Frequently prompting for login

Content: I’m in the military and since i’ve moved overseas the app has been glitching and messing with my account even when I’m in the middle of shopping. I was on a few hours ago no problem. I just went back on to purchase what i was looking at and it completely kicked me out my account and when I signed in again it deleted everything from my wishlists and cart.
Title: Deleted everything.

Content: In previous versions, I could scroll through results continuously. In this version, about 14 results display, plus about 6 “sponsored” results, with a “next” and “previous” button. No no no! I want to be able to scroll interrupted through results. I want to be able to browse products easily. This is just annoying.
Title: Bring back scrolling search results

Content: The app now randomly asks for login and password.   I am shopping during the day, put the phone away and when I return the app has logged out and can’t log back in - it just freezes.  I can go into the shopping card and sometimes it will let me go back to shop without login in.  This is so annoying.  Until this is fixed, ditch the app and go to the website directly.
Title: App crashing and getting stuck on password prompt

Content: I don’t like having to click filter each time and letting the page load again for each filter. It has never been this anti-user-friendly before
Title: Complicated

Content: Since the last update you got rid of the wish list bar at the bottom of the app. I used it all the time and it was the best part of the app please put it back on the app
Title: What happened to the wish list bar

Content: I used to LOVE this app... but the recent update removed the wishlist from the bottom of the screen.  I used to be able to press and hold the picture of an item and drag it to the bottom taskbar to drop it onto my wishlist, but that is totally gone now.  I have no idea why they would remove that feature.
Title: Wish list gone wrong

Content: I’m a fan, however there are problems! Just messaged a seller requesting proof of postage for a verified return and I find no venue to post image files, jpeg. in the native messaging service... contrary to what is stated in the description provided.  Why can’t I post my photo of the postage receipt? Please help!
Title: Not convinced!

Content: App is alright. Needs tweaking. The algorithm for suggestions is horrible. I once ordered a cd by a band name Once Human (metal band), algorithm suggests I purchase LeAnn Rimes. (Say what?) not even close. Really don’t like the app always putting mp3, stream, or prime video at top of my search list. Especially when specifically searching for cd’s, DVD’s, and Blu-ray’s. If I wanted the digital, I would have search in digital.
Title: App needs tweaking

Content: Immediately opening the app, scrolling through browsing, trying to make a purchase....whenever at random basically, I continually get a window that opens “We weren’t able to save this item to Wish List.  Please try again.” And asks to hit ok.  It pops up so many times beyond the point of being just irritating
Title: Wishlist bug

Content: It would be extremely helpful if your app would support iOS dynamic text so when I set my system text size to be larger due to my vision impairment, the text within your app also gets larger. Currently I have to use either zoom or voiceover a lot in your app. It’s all about accessibility these days!
Title: App should support iOS dynamic text for larger text.

Content: Why is it that when the app is on my cell phone, it keeps telling me “No Network Connection” just because I’m away from my WIFi?  Is there a problem with using my phone data?
Title: Network Connection??!!

Content: I read A LOT.  Before I would search for and purchase my ebooks for my Kindle app with no problems.  Now however each time I try to make a purchase it shows me it is available but the ebook version is not, data not available for purchase through app.  ANNOYING!!!  If I run a Google search and choose it that way I can make my purchases no problem.  FRUSTRATING!!!  Fix this please.
Title: Very unhappy

Content: Unfortunately, this app is a disappointment as of late. It keeps locking up. And no, my phone isn’t the cause; it has a enough space and memory to support the function of this app. Developers, please fix it; I have faith that you can.
Title: Locks Up

Content: App can be buggy and slow but if you have the patience it will get it done.   Also on the back of gift cards says to check balance use app or website but their website redirects you only to the app to check it.   And the app doesn’t let you just check the balance it automatically adds the full amount to you balance on your account. Terrible feature that you can’t just check without being forced to redeem.
Title: Sorta ok

Content: Why help people buy things so easily but hide the return ability ? Maybe I missed it but it seems more difficult to find? Does one only have a certain amount of time to return things? This will definitely change my buying habits
Title: Return button/ability seems to have disappeared?

Content: I’ve been having an issue for a few weeks now where the page that displays the tracking info for packages just briefly loads then goes blank. Then all the rest of the pages go blank after that. Wish there was an easy way to report this without leaving a review.
Title: Can’t see tracking info

Content: The order tracking in the app is glitching. Every time I click the tracking number the screen goes white. The way it lets you see where the driver is driving, it’s pretty awesome.
Title: Order tracking

Content: I enjoy the app but it is frustrating when I am searching through my shopping cart and it won’t go past a certain point. And just loads back to where I was.
Title: It still has bugs

Content: When I do a search for an item, other irrelevant items pop up also and I have to sift through those so it takes longer to find what I want. I’m looking for a specific blanket right now and I put that into the search bar, and a bunch of baby item crap popped up. Not what I searched for, not what I need.
Title: Annoying Suggestions

Content: Someone has hacked my account several times. I have changed my password, delete my current credit cards and change my settings. And I still got hacked when I told them. They got my solutions I have already tried when I asked them why they can’t just close the account I still haven’t gotten a response yet! I sent that email over a week ago! Do not shop here your information will be leaked to 3rd parties
Title: They won’t delete my account

Content: Lately this version of the app keeps erring out on itself when you try and purchase something, or pull up past orders. “Oops something went wrong” keeps popping up often, like when placing an order, and suddenly there’s multiple of the same items in your cart.  Oops, something in the app broke.
Title: Constant “Oops Something Went Wrong”

Content: Before there used to be a pop up allowing me to change to Most Recent, Top Reviews. Now the screen goes dim as if there would be a pop up, but there is NONE!  I noticed another issue with the pop ups is when I want to buy multiple quantity, the screen dims, but no pop up with the quantity integers to select. Just a dimmed screen with no pop up.
Title: Cannot filter, no pop up appears

Content: Since the latest update I can’t use the back arrow to return to the product list after I click on an item to view the details about 80% of the time. This makes it really hard to shop and makes me reluctant to click on anything as I have to force close the app sometimes to return to the previous screens
Title: Latest update fixed stuff and broke stuff

Content: Keep getting the error on login that "Something went wrong." Can't review old orders and can't place new ones. TouchID comes up and verifies then get the "Something went wrong" error again. Makes app useless.
Title: Something went wrong

Content: I ordered 15 items 9 days before Christmas and all items said will arrive before Christmas. Also ordered 2 items not expected until after Christmas so I paid for expedited shipping to get in 2 days. Not only am I not getting my 15 items until the 29th, but even the items I paid for expedited shipping will be late. When I contacted them they said I can pay an extra $62 to get items before Christmas. Hmmm...
Title: Items that say arriving by Christmas may not arrive

Content: I have used this APP a million times and have never had trouble with it. Recently it asked me to change my password that I've had for 10+ years for my protection so I did. Now it always says"Sorry something went wrong" when I try to make a purchase. I can't change the shipping or form of payment. But it WILL let me see everything else to do with my account!! I've missed out on 2 timed specials today that I wanted to buy for Christmas presents. I'm very NOT HAPPY RIGHT NOW!!!

It’s a great app and it was working just fine until I updated it. When I try to search anything in particular, it shows me zero results of says that there’s nothing related to the search. However, when searching from a computer, it works just fine. Please fix this!
Title: Good app - update needs improvement

Content: Hi on the browser if it’s possible to make it like before where u can drag the item and move it to anywhere you want to organize. It is really helpful thanks!
Title: Wishlist

Content: Love this app, been using it for awhile. There is however one glitch that bugs the heck out of me. When scrolling down on today's deals, after about 30 seconds of scrolling, the pictures of items will stop popping up. Wish this could be fixed! It's been like this for awhile even with a new phone!
Title: Good app, but...

Content: Why does it take 30 days to get a refund when they take your money immediately for a purchase. They have the item back and said they will not refund for at least 2 weeks but up to 30 days. They are ripping people off! I’m going to cancel my account because they cannot take care of their customers. They are basically stealing from the customers!
Title: Rip off

Content: That alone is all that needs to be said. Turns out "From A to Z" includes quite a lot of things. Finding what you need takes far too long because sifting through the morass of ads, sponsored items, Amazon's brand (also an ad) and blatant Chinese knockoffs flood the results no matter how  unambiguous your search query.  It's a shame.
Title: Search functionality is egregious

Content: The app is alright for the most part. Easy to use and navigate, but paying extra for prime doesn’t seem worth it anymore. There was a time when items on prime meant free shipping and items arrived in two days. That doesn’t seem to be the case anymore.
Title: What happened to prime

Content: I don’t trust you anymore, what you doing to your customers is really bad I put the product name I want and I even put it between double quad, but you still show me a lot of garbage that is not relevant to what I want. you do all of that to get some money from the advertisement and to make your customer buy useless product. You should be ashamed from what you doing to your customers!
Title: Untrustworthy

Content: It’s amazing but a few flaws (overall good app)  1. The search with camera NEVER shows anything similar to the photo, 2. The filter options… I would filter “short sleeves” for example then end up with long sleeve shirts
Title: Overall an amazing app

Content: Every time I open the app a pop up pops up that says “sorry, something went wrong. try again later” like 10 times. I have to close one pop up and then immediately the next one pops up. So annoying when I’m just trying to shop. Fix
Title: Bug

Content: The app is decent until they completely change the layout or features you were using. And then if you happen to find a workaround to use the same features (Today’s Deals -> Watchlist, for example, no longer shows up on the phone version), they’ll change that too. It’s like playing whack-a-mole with a Dev who doesn’t want you to use their app.
Title: Decent until…

Content: Title pretty much says it all. Whoever decided to move the search bar to the bottom clearly didn’t test drive the app. Also the persistent search bar is annoying when trying to chat with customer support or search your purchase history. Yet another reason why I won’t be renewing my Prime membership and will be shopping elsewhere.
Title: Move the search bar back to the top

Content: You have intended to try to be clever and make the search work by year. I don’t know when I had a past order. That is why I’m doing a “search”. I don’t know what year it was. I want to search all my orders ever. It did work this way before. Please add filter for search all orders.
Title: Orders Search is now worse?

Content: I think your previous version was much better.  Why you got rid of continuous scroll and have some items scroll sideways and others scroll down, search on bottom isn’t good either for viewing suggestions from my text, old version was 5 stars perfect, simplicity at its finest
Title: New app version not an improvement

Content: Why is it so difficult to allow users a simple option?   I DESPISE the search bar at the bottom. To the point that it makes the app unusable. I’d rather use a PC web browser than suffer being forced to use the search bar at the bottom.  I understand I’m not alone. I also understand others differ in their opinion and are fine with it. Which is perfectly fine.  That brings me back to the original point; give me the simple option of CHOOSING the justification. Stop forcing terrible options on users and destroying their experience in your not so veiled pursuit of creating larger ad space.  It’s an absolute disgrace, and it’s insulting to your customers.
Title: New Search Bar Justification

Content: June 2023 - Whoever thought this redesign was an improvement was dead WRONG. They couldn’t have been using the app on a daily basis like a majority of customers. Seriously - the search bar at the bottom - WHY!?!?!? How counterintuitive. At least give us the option to place it where we want it to be. Terrible user experience.
Title: Why move the search bar!?!?

Content: The new search bar location and wish list change is awful.   Now it takes several taps to see your wish list items. And what is the difference between hearts and bookmarks? They both go to the same list!    When doing a chat session, it’s too easy to accidentally type in the search bar instead of the chat window.
Title: Horrible Updates

Content: Every time I add something to my list it times out or sits with the circle spinning for mins. I end up backing out or closing the app. It seems the stuff is saving, but freezes with every item I look at. It’s been this was for about 2 weeks. I’ve done the most recent update and have also made sure my phone was up to date on versions. Hoping it’s fixed soon.
Title: Having issues.

Content: Ok so  I ordered something no problem with a visa gift card then like a day later I try to buy something and then all of a sudden my account got put on hold but idc I got the first thing so idc I love this thing I got
Title: It’s ok

Content: I will order a idem and then it will take the money and it then when I check it next day it will say payment needs revision and I already paid for it and then it comes thru the mail so I don’t know if something actually went through or not so I wish they would fix that problem
Title: It’s making mad

Content: for some reason, when I click the back button, it sometimes doesn’t work and I would have to force restart the app.
Title: back button sometimes doesn’t work.

Content: i have a account and i ordered a purse and i payed and everything and it was coming in Sunday then when i went to look at it again it logged me out then when u tried to log back in it told me it wasn’t available and it’s making mad so don’t get order it off of something else not this website it stupid and idk how to fix it so it took my money and can't get it back
Title: do not get

Content: If I could add a picture I would… but the whole app is messed up—pictures and words and icons are all stacked on top of each other it’s all smashed together and can’t make anything out in the app (I’m using the app on my iPhone mini).  I’ll have to delete the app if these issues aren’t fixed— I thought the update would fix it but it looks worse if that was even possible !
Title: App is messed up

Content: I like to "heart" items without adding them specifically to a list of mine. You should make it easier for me to view the items that I’ve hearted in the past or even show a carousel of them. Thank you!
Title: Good but how do I view my favorites?

Content: A month later I get what I ordered started out in Vegas went to calif went to anchorage went to Oregon another site in Oregon to anchorage back to Oregon now says it went to anchorage has now left anchorage for delivery thing is I live 150 miles from anchorage.  This is a sign of not knowing what their doing in shipping.   Hey if it’s been in anchorage why does it have to go back and forth to get it.   Hahaha
Title: Shipping is a joke

Content: The app is good.l from a shopping experience standpoint, but returns could use some work. Navigating multiple return details is somewhat difficult. Would be great to see a list of all returns you currently have in process organized by location site of the return.
Title: Good but needs some simplification

Content: Recently purchased MADETEC heated gloves I couldn’t be happier with the gloves they really saved my hands during this polar cyclone. Love the fact that they are rechargeable. Thinking of buying some for my wife. They work really good and are easy to use.
Title: Heated gloves

Content: With the latest app update, only 5 items on my Save for Later can be viewed at a time making it difficult to find an item to purchase. I would like to be able to scroll through my entire list without having to click multiple times.
Title: Limited “Save for Later” view

Content: Since their newest update it’s not even working I will spend hours clicking on it just to tell me we’re sorry it’s not working right now go to the home page while I’m on the home page?! I have gotten out of the app and reopened it and it does the same thing I can’t shop! Before their update though it was amazing the best shopping app ever. Idk what’s up but I hope they fix it fast!
Title: Stop updates!

Content: For the past month I haven’t received the advertised 2 day shipping/delivery available to Prime members.  It’s taking 8-9 days to receive prime items and makes the prime subscription useless.  Walmart somehow is cheaper and faster now and doesn’t cost 18 dollars a month.  Been a prime member for about 10 years and the service and really hone down hill the past year.  Not worth it anymore.
Title: No longer receive Prime orders in 2-3 days

Content: The app does exactly what you’d expect it to, but I think adding a dark mode would make it even better, for me personally, dark mode is easier on the eyes.
Title: Does what it’s supposed to, but please add dark mode

Content: After the last update the verification in the app loops and gets stuck to where certain parts of it are unusable. Face ID has the same problem, verified and then loops on itself over and over not allowing function of the app. Before this it was a great app. Needs to be fix. Website version works fine.
Title: Was a great app broken now

Content: I spent hours Hans picking items needed for my move to another home and I’m finally ready to sort them into lists and POOF!!! Gone! I looked with multiple devices and no, my Dave for later is gone.  Also it was really annoying how I can’t report a problem through the app or App Store. Just a bunch of useless forums and no simple quick way to report bug issues like this
Title: Missing save for later

Content: This app needs a better search engine for items. I search and end up seeing random things and not what I’m looking for.  And… for the love of god please provide a way to leave feedback regarding delivery problems! My carrier constantly leaves my order at the wrong address!
Title: Please improve

Content: The apple won’t let me choose one time purchase anymore. I tried to select one time purchase, and it refreshes the page and keeps the option for subscribe and save. Please fix.
Title: Can’t select one-time purchase.

Content: Not being able to talk to someone when I have a simple question will 100% every time cause me to cancel my order.
Title: Customer service

Content: This app keeps autocorrecting things without being able to save what I’ve typed and they have the product I want but I can’t search it correctly. I have an iPhone 13 pro.  Also, when I click on a product I a lot of times get a blank page and have to go back and reload the product. It’s annoying and has been this way for quite some time.
Title: Not good

Content: Here lately when I’m scrolling search results to see what I want (or even looking at an item) my app it flashing and going back to home page. Very frustrating having to search 10x for same thing and then find what you’re looking for
Title: Resetting my search

Content: You can find items that you can’t find on store shelves lately. The price of gas it’s so much cheaper to have it delivered instead of running around eating gas .
Title: Easy shopping

Content: I have always loved the app for my prime membership but lately I can’t click on the stars to see the reviews or when I scroll down I can’t see them either. I click on an item and the page goes all white. Also emails about shipped items would be better if they had the image of the item.
Title: Needs update

Content: Please remove this scrolling button. I have accidentally pressed this several times while swiping up/down on the page.
Title: Add to Cart

Content: I called trying to unlock my account. Question I could not remember the lady that helped me unlock my account lied to me she said I will be able to get my books back as long as I have my email address so she gave me instructions how to create a new account with my email address so I did all of the instructions and I got in but no book I was able to get back. Made me sooo upset she a liar liar pant on fire ggggrrrrrrrr.
Title: Unlock account liars

Content: For the last few updates, the app will occasionally go white/blank while either browsing products or looking at a product page. The top and bottom bars are there and function, but the products are just gone. Navigating away from that page will restore functionality, but it will randomly happen again.
Title: White Screen

Content: With the most recent update, I’ve lost the ability to easily add items to my various lists. Now all I have is the “Add to Registry & Gifting” which does not access my wishlists. Please add it back. The ability to add items to my lists is very useful to our family.
Title: What happened to the “Add to List” feature

Content: Never change the screen after you order. This time, it took me took a blank page with the word “cancel” on top. Could not get out of it unless I cancelled and started over. Fortunately, it didn’t cancel.
Title: Short Note

Content: Hello             I downloaded your appAnd I tried to go shopping for a phone found one and went through the formality of it only at the end it was looking for a different payment make it didn’t go through I ain’t quiet sure why I took all the information including the card it denied me payment for the phone so thanks but I’ll try Walmart  not happy with they outcome of it
Title: Hmm I guess ya won’t except a direct express card right

Content: This is getting old every time I try to order something it says it can’t send to my address which is untrue Then it won’t let me return items to Whole Foods where I shop I called customer service they said delete the app try again but that didn’t fix problems on your app I have never had this many problems before and you need to fix your app
Title: Glitches in app

Content: When I click on the little pics to get different views of product, nothing happens. When I click on a little pic to select a different color option that the product is offered in, nothing happens. I don’t understand why such basic functionality is non-functional in an app for one of the most valuable companies in the world.
Title: iPad app not working properly

Content: I got an empty box instead of what I ordered and they made it right almost no questions asked. It took about 5 minutes and was very easy.
Title: Very helpful when dealing with scammers

Content: Omg what did you guys do to this app ??!! This was my go to app for buying stuff online and now I click on an item and the next page which is suppose to be the item I clicked on is blank. Please fix this !! It started after the last up date. What’s the old saying if it’s not broke don’t fix it... wise up and fix what you broke, your loosing customers 😡🤬
Title: Last update screwed this app up big time 🤬😡🤯

Content: The app has so many issues. Takes forever to load. I can’t open the notifications in the settings without getting the “something went wrong on our end” pop up. It’s so much easier to use the website on a computer rather than use this app. It needs a major update.
Title: Frustrating

Content: Our last two deliveries have been set outside our garage.  We are disabled and have requested delivery to our front door, which is on the side of our condo.  Other drivers have had no problem with this but the driver that brought our last two packages must not have wanted to walk the few steps to our front door.  This makes it much more difficult for us.
Title: Delivery Instructions

Content: Just wanted to say thank you so much for your prompt attention. I know you are super busy at this time and you were right on your game! So Thank you so much!         Great job UPS. Congrats and Thank you again!!!
Title: Returned items

Content: Go back to the previous style of displaying all options for a product and all sizes on the first visit to the product page.  I hate having to click on See more options and then See more sizes.  Waste of time, not user friendly, how many people are missing out on all options of a product because they don’t see those buttons.
Title: Recent app changes

Content: While re-ordering from past orders, searching past orders should be made easier without requiring filter value of the exact purchase year it is obviously hard to remember thus making past order search very time consuming.
Title: For re-order experience, searching past orders should be made easier

Content: I love this online store but there should be a feature that allows you to see how much a list costs. This would really help out for birthdays and Christmas so i know how much I’m spending.
Title: Lists

Content: This app enables annoying deal notifications by default and then buries the setting to disable it in an obscure location that’s impossible to find without searching google.   The menu is called settings and is different from the account menu. Not sure if this is intentional or just bad design.  I never signed up for this explicitly so not sure why it’s enabled by default.
Title: Annoying spammy notifications

Content: I like how I can track my package and how they are deliver with picture confirming delivery. Also I like the app and website on how easy is to submit a return and the way the money is refunded.
Title: Excellent delivery services

Content: I stopped buying old perfume spray’s this white musk body spray is not too expensive I’ve been using it some time now and it smells amazing I would recommend this product because it’s worth it.
Title: Nice Fragrance!

Content: Not always the lowest prices and sometimes the delivery date slips, but customer service has always been great and the app is my go to for easy ordering.
Title: Not always the lowest prices

Content: I almost never have issues with this app. Much better than anything comparable.
Title: Does pretty much everything you would want. Support is world class.

Content: Hard to compare items in different pages, some items have long delivery times, hard to find items in search bar with words then contained in product description ... With such high Prime monthly charges software should be updated to be more user friendly.
Title: Not user friendly

Content: Love it and you can find pretty much everything you can thinking of, just wish in the order filter there was the option to choose not delivered yet but I love it
Title: Good for finding stuff you can’t find in town

Content: This is annoying. Why is the app forcing portrait mode?? I need landscape for my iPad. This weird feature has basically rendered the app useless for me. Hopefully it will be corrected soon.
Title: Forcing portrait mode

Content: The latest update of the app forces the app to use portrait mode and then cuts the bottom of the screen off making it very difficult to shop.   I have deleted and re-added to see if that fixes it, but alas, no.   Please bring the fully functional landscape mode back to the app for iPad.
Title: Update Broke App

Content: Very few times I’ve been disappointed. Quick and easy to order, quality you can trust! Never a fail!
Title: Fun quick shopping!

Content: This is a great place to buy a variety of quality things. You can find everything here that you need.
Title: Fantastic place to buy things

Content: Last two updates have a bug that keeps displaying in portrait mode even though my iPad is in landscape mode. To replicate this: 1. Turn iPad to landscape view 2. Go to any item in the store that has user photos in the reviews 3. Tap on a photo to view it 4. Tap the close button After the photo closes, the screen will automatically rotate to display in portrait mode. Now, you have to rotate your iPad to portrait mode and back to landscape mode to rotate the screen again. Hopefully the developers will see this and fix it.
Title: Screen rotation bug in latest updates

Content: Most everything I need I can get here. This place really has changed the world. I’ve never been a shopper, I like to be home when I’m not working, but now I shop a lot. Thank you.
Title: You got it

Content: This app is a mess right now. Nothing is working unless you want to order. No order tracking, no looking at what you’ve ordered etc. I’m terribly disappointed because I shop almost daily. Please help us out and resolve the app’s issues. Want to love it again.
Title: No longer functions

Content: I haven’t had a problem with the app since it first launched. Today whenever I’d click on an item in my cart, I was redirected to the home page. Same thing would happen when I’d click on a suggested item. Very frustrating
Title: Having a lot of issues

Content: I love how I can get product so fast I just do not like how some of my products like a rag no juice is opened and the seal broken. I don’t have the time to send things back so I end up throwing $20 in the trash!
Title: Preopened Packages

Content: Ease of shopping and finding what you want, great selection, simple return process, usually best prices, great delivery service. A great standard for online shopping.
Title: Sets the standard for customer service

Content: Seeing a lot of the same things. Would like more of a variety by reputable companies in the USA. It’s difficult trying to return an item from China when the shipping cost more than the item then we get stuck with an item that doesn’t fit.
Title: A lot of the same

Content: On my phone, I can share an item via text.  There is the Apple share icon next to the item’s photo. On the iPad, that doesn’t exist.  There is a “share” written in clickable text on some items, but that just takes you to email.
Title: On iPad, no ability to share by text

Content: Why don’t you show the seller’s information to the customer?  I want to know who and where the seller company is. It makes a big difference in a decision. Be transparent and show the country of the seller upfront.   Why do you not allow restrictions on content?  Why is it possible to find x rated products easily searched on your site? You need to allow people the option to restrict content.
Title: Why hide information?

Content: I have on my profile to please not leave any packages on my front porch to ring the doorbell or just leave it between the front door and screen door. Your drivers are not following instructions and are even putting packages on my back porch which face the street area. I did not receive a couple of items today and I am very upset
Title: Packages/delivery

Content: My account was hacked since last year. I tried to reach out to customer care but customer care is asking me for details of card use on the account while it was hacked. How on earth would I know the card details. I have sent several mails trying to retrieve my account but it’s not working, response I always get is to provide details of card used on the account while it was hacked. Not helpful
Title: Account Hacked

Content: I stopped buying old perfume spray’s this white musk body spray is not too expensive I’ve been using it some time now and it smells amazing I would recommend this product because it’s worth it.
Title: Nice Fragrance!

Content: Not always the lowest prices and sometimes the delivery date slips, but customer service has always been great and the app is my go to for easy ordering.
Title: Not always the lowest prices

Content: I almost never have issues with this app. Much better than anything comparable.
Title: Does pretty much everything you would want. Support is world class.

Content: Hard to compare items in different pages, some items have long delivery times, hard to find items in search bar with words then contained in product description ... With such high Prime monthly charges software should be updated to be more user friendly.
Title: Not user friendly

Content: Love it and you can find pretty much everything you can thinking of, just wish in the order filter there was the option to choose not delivered yet but I love it
Title: Good for finding stuff you can’t find in town

Content: This is annoying. Why is the app forcing portrait mode?? I need landscape for my iPad. This weird feature has basically rendered the app useless for me. Hopefully it will be corrected soon.
Title: Forcing portrait mode

Content: The latest update of the app forces the app to use portrait mode and then cuts the bottom of the screen off making it very difficult to shop.   I have deleted and re-added to see if that fixes it, but alas, no.   Please bring the fully functional landscape mode back to the app for iPad.
Title: Update Broke App

Content: Very few times I’ve been disappointed. Quick and easy to order, quality you can trust! Never a fail!
Title: Fun quick shopping!

Content: This is a great place to buy a variety of quality things. You can find everything here that you need.
Title: Fantastic place to buy things

Content: Last two updates have a bug that keeps displaying in portrait mode even though my iPad is in landscape mode. To replicate this: 1. Turn iPad to landscape view 2. Go to any item in the store that has user photos in the reviews 3. Tap on a photo to view it 4. Tap the close button After the photo closes, the screen will automatically rotate to display in portrait mode. Now, you have to rotate your iPad to portrait mode and back to landscape mode to rotate the screen again. Hopefully the developers will see this and fix it.
Title: Screen rotation bug in latest updates

Content: Seeing a lot of the same things. Would like more of a variety by reputable companies in the USA. It’s difficult trying to return an item from China when the shipping cost more than the item then we get stuck with an item that doesn’t fit.
Title: A lot of the same

Content: On my phone, I can share an item via text.  There is the Apple share icon next to the item’s photo. On the iPad, that doesn’t exist.  There is a “share” written in clickable text on some items, but that just takes you to email.
Title: On iPad, no ability to share by text

Content: Why don’t you show the seller’s information to the customer?  I want to know who and where the seller company is. It makes a big difference in a decision. Be transparent and show the country of the seller upfront.   Why do you not allow restrictions on content?  Why is it possible to find x rated products easily searched on your site? You need to allow people the option to restrict content.
Title: Why hide information?

Content: I have on my profile to please not leave any packages on my front porch to ring the doorbell or just leave it between the front door and screen door. Your drivers are not following instructions and are even putting packages on my back porch which face the street area. I did not receive a couple of items today and I am very upset
Title: Packages/delivery

Content: My account was hacked since last year. I tried to reach out to customer care but customer care is asking me for details of card use on the account while it was hacked. How on earth would I know the card details. I have sent several mails trying to retrieve my account but it’s not working, response I always get is to provide details of card used on the account while it was hacked. Not helpful
Title: Account Hacked

Content: I stopped buying old perfume spray’s this white musk body spray is not too expensive I’ve been using it some time now and it smells amazing I would recommend this product because it’s worth it.
Title: Nice Fragrance!

Content: Not always the lowest prices and sometimes the delivery date slips, but customer service has always been great and the app is my go to for easy ordering.
Title: Not always the lowest prices

Content: I almost never have issues with this app. Much better than anything comparable.
Title: Does pretty much everything you would want. Support is world class.

Content: Hard to compare items in different pages, some items have long delivery times, hard to find items in search bar with words then contained in product description ... With such high Prime monthly charges software should be updated to be more user friendly.
Title: Not user friendly

Content: Love it and you can find pretty much everything you can thinking of, just wish in the order filter there was the option to choose not delivered yet but I love it
Title: Good for finding stuff you can’t find in town

Content: This is annoying. Why is the app forcing portrait mode?? I need landscape for my iPad. This weird feature has basically rendered the app useless for me. Hopefully it will be corrected soon.
Title: Forcing portrait mode

Content: The latest update of the app forces the app to use portrait mode and then cuts the bottom of the screen off making it very difficult to shop.   I have deleted and re-added to see if that fixes it, but alas, no.   Please bring the fully functional landscape mode back to the app for iPad.
Title: Update Broke App

Content: Very few times I’ve been disappointed. Quick and easy to order, quality you can trust! Never a fail!
Title: Fun quick shopping!

Content: This is a great place to buy a variety of quality things. You can find everything here that you need.
Title: Fantastic place to buy things

Content: Last two updates have a bug that keeps displaying in portrait mode even though my iPad is in landscape mode. To replicate this: 1. Turn iPad to landscape view 2. Go to any item in the store that has user photos in the reviews 3. Tap on a photo to view it 4. Tap the close button After the photo closes, the screen will automatically rotate to display in portrait mode. Now, you have to rotate your iPad to portrait mode and back to landscape mode to rotate the screen again. Hopefully the developers will see this and fix it.
Title: Screen rotation bug in latest updates

Content: Most everything I need I can get here. This place really has changed the world. I’ve never been a shopper, I like to be home when I’m not working, but now I shop a lot. Thank you.
Title: You got it

Content: This app is a mess right now. Nothing is working unless you want to order. No order tracking, no looking at what you’ve ordered etc. I’m terribly disappointed because I shop almost daily. Please help us out and resolve the app’s issues. Want to love it again.
Title: No longer functions

Content: I haven’t had a problem with the app since it first launched. Today whenever I’d click on an item in my cart, I was redirected to the home page. Same thing would happen when I’d click on a suggested item. Very frustrating
Title: Having a lot of issues

Content: I love how I can get product so fast I just do not like how some of my products like a rag no juice is opened and the seal broken. I don’t have the time to send things back so I end up throwing $20 in the trash!
Title: Preopened Packages
