Content: Now that copying text has been removed, I cannot copy and paste order tracking numbers anymore. This is extremely frustrating as tracking numbers are very long to punch in one number at a time.   I don’t understand developers that remove functionality.
Title: Why has copying been removed?

Content: Doesn’t work anymore after latest update 2 days ago.  Nothing is lined up and if I make a selection the add to cart button disappears.  Can’t even place an order on my iPad.
Title: Latest update ruined it

Content: Upcoming Lightning deals are missing the “Watch Deal” button, and deals I’m watching (which I had to find on my PC) shows blank. All other deal tabs work except for the “Watching” tab which is a pair of sunglasses image. So all the deals I’m watching I can’t actually see while I’m at work on my phone which means I miss the deals when they finally go live. PLEASE FIX your deal watching issues.
Title: App not working

Content: I want to start this by saying that I am a frequent online shopper. From clothes to furniture, I do it online. The issue I am recognizing here is that, you can't split screen it with another app. I don't think it would be hard to integrate, too. Other than that, app works great.
Title: Great with one problem

Content: Current the only way to search reviews for a keyword is to share -> open in browser -> request desktop version. Would use this all the time if it were built into the app!
Title: Would really love to be able to search reviews

Content: I can no longer change color or quantity before adding to cart.  If I do, I no longer have the option to purchase the item even though it is available.  I need to scroll through what other people bought to see if I can find the options I want in order to put purchase.  Very frustrating! Will limit what I buy.
Title: Update has issues

Content: I love my cameras. They are awesome.  One small problem I am hoping someone can resolve for me. I have them facing out my window, at night the lite reflect in the window and you can not see beyond the glare in the glass. How do I fix this small problem ?   Anyone !
Title: Happy owners

Content: I hate when I am looking through the daily deals and I click on an item and when I go back to the list it takes me back to top of the list.  Now I have to make the decision to scroll ALL the way down to where I was or just close the app
Title: Daily Deals

Content: It seems to me the app is not as good as using a browser. I guess I assumed it would be better, most things are, but not in this case. Search functionality, navigation, shopping cart, etc. are all inferior to the browser experience, plus you can filter ads in a browser... ads, really? I’m already on the site shopping, is that not enough?
Title: Use a browser

Content: The iPad version does not show Customer Images on the item reviews page and now with the latest update if you click on an image on the item description page it brings up the “detail” from the last item you looked at, not the current item.
Title: iPad app not as good as iPhone app.

Content: Every time I try to open the app to check my orders or look at my lists, it prompts me to login. When I put in the correct info it then says that a problem has occurred. It usually allows me to go on to the page I want anyway, but it continually asks me to sign in as I browse around. Yesterday I couldn’t complete my order online because it wouldn’t let me log in and I had to use a desktop to complete the order.
Title: Sign in keeps messing up!

Content: I created a return, and just prior to SUBMIT, I chose “add additional items to this return”. It provides a list of all purchases, but nothing happens when I select another item: no reason for return pops up. Eventually I  selected a few more items for return, but now I’m frozen in Return order land, and there is no way out besides closing out of the app. Which means I have to start over.
Title: Selecting multiple items to return at same time is busted.

Content: Sometimes I get one small thing in a big box , but I’m sure you have your reasons.  I’ve been super happy with every aspect of this company for many years
Title: There great

Content: Lately this app has been annoyingly glitchy. When trying to order a product and change the shipping address, it doesn’t let you and glitches back to the order screen. Also, when trying to view your orders it consistently asks me for the password and a pop up notification appears saying it is unavailable right now?   This app has worked great before. Please fix these issues.
Title: Glitchy

Content: I love the app, it’s usually easy and fun to use, but recently I’ve been having a problem where it won’t let me look at my orders or anything else like that including the details on my account. Every time I try to look at them it asks to use my Touch ID to log in and then when I try, it says error. Please fix!
Title: Please fix!

Content: Wasn’t until 9.21.1 that the landscape orientation became a problem for me.  Reinstalled the app, which fixed the orientation bug, however, several subsequent delete and reinstall attempts have not addressed the inactive buttons, truncated windows, and erratic behaviors.  Would have been a one-star review, but these problems are enough to prevent me from shopping. So, I’m saving money... extra star!
Title: The bugs are taking over

Content: *The latest update fixed the landscape issue, so I’ll adjust my rating.  I’ve been using the app a long time without many issues and The developers seemed to be improving navigation over time. Now no landscape? Come on, I never use my iPad in the vertical position.
Title: *FIXED* No Lanscape

Content: I use landscape for EVERYTHING and I suppose for some people portrait is not a big deal. WHY would you screw with shopping experience and as a huge corporation risk captive audience by not offering the ability to comfortably browse, search, and ultimately make purchases easy for the consumer? This to me is very irritating. What else is wrong with the app? Lots by the number of reviews. I turned it off. Might shop if I am near my laptop.
Title: Hate portrait mode. Get your head on straight!

Content: Most recent update has broken the apps ability to show me my previous orders. When using Touch ID (or entering my password because I didn't turn in that feature for this app), I get an error message that "something has gone wrong. Please try again." but the page never loads no matter how many times I've tried to access it.
Title: Recent update = frustration

Content: The team closed my account without explanation. They took my gift card points and told me their decision was final. Even the customer support couldn’t figure out why it did happen  It appears the company is too big to address this issue. They shouldn’t take it for granted that us customer will recreate accounts right after they close our accounts.
Title: Too authoritative to trust

Content: You can click for 30 minutes and not get a phone number to call customer service. Also, when they tell you, your deliveries gonna be there tomorrow then it doesn’t come tomorrow. They tell you at the last minute. Has been done to me 10 times in the past year and I’ve only made 20 orders.
Title: Impossible to call customer service

Content: We bought the speakers, and so far they are great very clear and good sound comes through it, and I like out lights up very pleased with our new speakers went great with my new WebCam. Thank you. RobertGlenna
Title: Nylavee  speakers

Content: I’ll be doing much more shopping elsewhere. I don’t find this app user friendly at all. It is not nearly as easy to browse. Just when I find something I want to look at more in depth it whisks me off to another page and I cannot get back to where I was NIT FINISHED LOOKING! I did not download this app. I much prefer the old format. I’m pretty much forced to limit my choices to those I can find locally.
Title: Terrible App

Content: This has made it much easier as I can’t get to any stores and can find items I don’t usually find In Stores
Title: Shopping after surgery recovery

Content: I order a wig for a friends birthday gift. I tracked my package a it showed delivered however it was not where I requested it to be dropped off but a far post office instead when I don’t even have a P.O. Box and they didn’t even do anything help and the id I have does not have the new address for me even to pick up package…. This is total garbage as my first time using this dirty app
Title: Very disgusting app that knows to ruin things

Content: Please make it an option to move the search bar back to the top. Also, why do I have to click 4 times to get to my lists now when it used to take one? Please bring back the old version, it was so much better.
Title: Search bar

Content: Please remove the “add to cart” from the bottom right of the screen. I keep accidentally adding stuff to my cart from just scrolling on the product page. Also, the search bar at the bottom of the screen was not a good move. It’s also in the way when swiping and too easy to accidentally hit when swiping up.
Title: Search bar and add to cart

Content: Why aren’t the developers listening to the public?  The search bar is down by the other buttons at the bottom and makes me think that they’re trying deceptive practices!! I cannot navigate the app without hitting those other buttons and it’s extremely frustrating
Title: Search Bar

Content: The adds are out of control!  There are more unrelated adds that pop up when searching for something than actual products to buy now.  Then you have to filter through alphabet-soup company names (all basically the same factory in China spitting out cheap, poor quality ****) to actually find something worth buying.
Title: More adds than products

Content: Please change the search bar back to the top of my app, or provide me with the option of customizing my user interface. I do not like it at the bottom.  Safari provided me the option to move it back to the top and I did; you should do the same.
Title: Change the search bar back to the top

Content: Your new updated on the app absolutely is horrible. The search bar on the bottom is the worst idea. You would have to use now two hands and you hit all the other buttons on your phone and you barely can even use the app developers. Please put the search bar back up on the top. If you’re so bored, go on vacation, quit messing with the app..
Title: Search bar on bottom, no good!!

Content: Please allow us to select where the search bar goes, and don’t force us to accept a new standard when the other was working perfectly fine. Add an option in the app to choose as being at the bottom made me delete the app and start using the mobile website so I get the experience I wanted back.
Title: Search bar moved with new update.

Content: Lately, the app only works for a few seconds, and then it crashes and I hope they fix this as soon as possible!   April 4, 2023.
Title: App keeps crashing

Content: I hate that the search bar moved to the bottom of the screen.  It’s annoying! At least give us an option to keep it at the top.  There’s nothing wrong with having it at the top, don’t mess with something that’s not broken just to create change for no reason.  Please add an option to move it back to the top, thanks!
Title: Search bar at the bottom is terrible

Content: Why change the my list the things we save obviously if we separated and created folders it was for a reason something thst was simple to access you made more steps if we want to see everything we saved in a list we wouldn’t of created folders dummy now we have scroll all way over to find what we lookin for makes no sense
Title: fire the developer n hire new ones

Content: The app works to do one thing, sell mostly Chinese products. What the app does not do is give a way to provide honest feedback without censorship, no way to print logs of customer service chats, no easy way get any messages vendors, or function properly without incessant errors.  This is not the same company I started with nearly ten years ago. It feels like the beginning of the end.
Title: Garbage App

Content: Please update it again because it’s not letting me track my package it says Sorry, something went wrong. We're working on fixing it. (CS11)
Title: Not letting me track my package

Content: They have already put my account hold yesterday and, I called to get my account back up. Then I woke up to my account back and tried to order something and then again my account got put on hold. I already sent a appeal to get my account back and I don’t know why they keep doing it.
Title: They keep putting my account on hold

Content: I cannot believe a person is unable to connect with me when requested to do so.  My issue is a return problem and although I asked for a call to contact me when they did they could (?) not hear me and hung up!  Really bad service.  And now I can’t connect back to them as I can’t find that link again.  The lack of customer support is pitiful.
Title: Terrible customer service

Content: These sellers make hard to find items and even everyday items so much easier to buy. Saves me time and money since the Biden Crime Family has made the price of gas so outrageous ‼️
Title: AWESOME

Content: It’s been very difficult to see pricing on my phone/ prices seem to change before I’m checked out.  Additional costs and delayed delivery aren’t apparent until after I’ve checked out.  Please fix pricing so it stays consistent.
Title: Difficult to track pricing and get support

Content: The app is difficult to read when you are older in the glasses. I can’t find a place where I can change the font to make it bigger.
Title: Hard to read for older folks

Content: I got a 50$ gift card and applied it to the wrong account. So I went to my other account, the one with prime and it said the card was already redeemed. I called customer service and they where rude and didn’t help. I was told I won’t be able to get my card back. So now 50$ are in the trash. They are also not eco friendly and are a awful website.
Title: This absolutely is an awful app

Content: I used to love using my app however now the page will go blank a minute in and won’t let me search anything. It makes it impossible to shop. The app also shuts down the second I try to share anything I do find.
Title: Serious problems

Content: They will take your money and won’t think twice about it! I spent over $100 on products all with different shipping dates that I never received. They blamed me for it and refused to refund me all because I took advantage of the $0.99 echo dot and the customer service rep processed the order as a refund. They retaliated by “losing” my orders and refusing refunds until I threatened to take legal action. On top of this, I was a prime member for YEARS!
Title: Buyer beware!

Content: When I go to check my orders under your order section, the page keeps loading a different view and keeps showing older orders, and I keep having to hit the back button to get to the right page, but this seems to happen like every time, I checked for an updated app, but there is none at the moment
Title: Unable to check my orders

Content: A very interesting read! Has so much information that I haven't ever really heard before. The only thing I had a hard time with, was big words that were stumbling to me. But it was a great informational book! Great job & kudos to the author!!
Title: Book entitled Mary Knew

Content: The previous version was fast, stable and got searches up as fast as you could think. This latest version sits there doing nothing for an eternity…. And then tines out with uh-oh, something went wrong. Understatement of ALL time. It doesn’t work, it goes into a loop before timing out. Fix it or allow us the option of reverting back to old version. Biggest mistake was installing it.
Title: Useless garbage

Content: Overall good quality with prompt delivery . Also credit or exchange on items if needed !
Title: Large Selection of Products

Content: It’s annoying that notifications must be enabled in order to use AmazonSmile, but what’s even more annoying is that many notifications I cannot swipe dismiss from the lock screen. Instead I have to clear all notifications from all apps, including those I don’t want to dismiss.
Title: Annoying Notifications

Content: When searching in order history, you can search by item. Update so we can search by dollar amount of each invoice/order Thanks
Title: Add this in your next update

Content: You know when you search a product then try to filter by brands, you may get one or two brands the libs want to force you to support, violently if necessary,….but you definitely don’t get an honest filtering that shows all the brands your original search presented.
Title: I’m so tired of the phony libs

Content: Fast, efficient app that lets me do just about anything I'd want to do that I'd previously do on the website.  Very user friendly!
Title: Makes it WAY too easy to spend my money!

Content: Very frequently the entire page goes blank in the middle of scrolling through search results or through a page for a specific item. The only way to get back to what you were looking at is to go back and redo the action. It’s very irritating because I have zero internet issues and this is such a dumb problem
Title: Big issue

Content: Deliveries have always been timely over the years. They often make an effort to make the boxes or packages less obvious from the street. Their hard work is greatly appreciated by me.  Debbie  Senior citizen
Title: Delivery

Content: A very interesting book, Mr. White has a way with telling a story that’s hard to put the book down, it’s a 5 Star book for sure, you will not be disappointed.
Title: The Hawaiian Intervention by Kelvin White

Content: Shopping is great, but why does the app interfere with the currently playing audio both when I open the app and when I se it. This app doesn’t play audio, so what is it doing to cause a pause in at start and close???
Title: Interferes with audio

Content: I often want to tell my friends about good purchases.  There used to be a share button, but it disappeared. Wish you would bring it back.
Title: SHARE button - where did it go

Content: App has become so buggy and slow. Barely works no matter what connection I have, doesn’t load properly. Have to close the app multiple times to get some things to work. Literally owned by a billionaire and the app has progressed downwards. Make it make sense.
Title: Buggy

Content: I’m a prime member. I have been receiving bad customer service lately. My orders have been being messed up and late and not that they care they really just don’t care to give a good reason on why these problems have happened and o well no reason to figure it out.
Title: Service

Content: Please fix notification pop up every time I click product - “press and hold to save to specific list” Fix please!
Title: Update: Fixed

Content: Always happy with the products quality and the ease of ordering! Shipped quickly and can find most anything you want or need!!!gb!
Title: Satisfied customer

Content: Products returns are not easy. If I have to return a product, I can’t return it from my shipping address. I have to drop the product to some location.
Title: Returns

Content: Typical big tech company with garbage “global engineering”. I’m in Japan temporarily and the stupid app won’t let me change my country to the US. I don’t have a Japan account and don’t want to order from their worthless Japan based site. But the country and region button won’t let me change settings. Tapping it does nothing. It won’t open the settings.   No wonder all their engineers quit.
Title: Garbage App, cannot change country

Content: Whoever designed this app needs a raise. It is so easy to order, check delivery status, save items for later, etc
Title: All other apps should do this

Content: The app keeps crashing every time I try to search for food items within the Whole Foods app. The issue started after installing iPhone update to 15.2.1. I have taken all the basic steps to try to resolve the issue. Nothing has worked. Please update the app so I can shop for my groceries. Thank you!
Title: The App needs to be updated!

Content: Very difficult to read and navigate on iPad mini. It appears that item listings look like the desktop version, but menus look like the iOS app. It would seem to make sense that the iPad is much easier to use with a larger screen, but it is significantly more difficult and nearly unusable.
Title: Text WAY too small on iPad mini

Content: I’ve noticed when I choose a product that has same-day delivery or next day delivery it often comes up at checkout As 4-5 day delivery. If you don’t notice it you end up with a 4 day wait. A bit deceptive.
Title: Delivery times

Content: I wish there was a more interesting format when it comes to shopping for someone else and not knowing what to get them or even yourself. I think a way in previewing cool and upcoming interesting items that’s more intriguing would increase the things I would by.
Title: Shopping format

Content: First time ordering I usually buy in person but it was easy and not at all time consuming.
Title: Easier than I thought

Content: Customer service terrible. I tried getting help with a payment declined for a gift card and they refused to help me. They only said go call them card issuer and didn’t listen to me at all when I said the problem was actually that I spent more than was on the gift card and just needed to modify the order.
Title: Bad customer service

Content: One nice thing about having a Prime account was that you would receive your order the next day. Since Covid deliveries are varied. Don’t totally understand why but…. Prices I noticed on some things have been absolutely outrageous. 🤷‍♀️
Title: Review

Content: Click and ship so easy my wife came up with that click and ship click insert click and ship click and ship we love it
Title: Click and ship

Content: Sup Everyone, I just bought my first video game off of here yesterday once I finished paying for it it told me it was going to be delivered to my house on Monday but lucky enough I got it the next day.
Title: Fast and Free Shipping

Content: Now if we could just get them to start ringing the doorbell when they leave the package or knock on the door instead of just sliding in dropping it and taking off.
Title: Delivery

Content: I know the ads have some merit but they have started to interfere with finding what I am looking for. I used to find what I was looking for right away too and now I have to sort through pages after my search to find the right products. Repeats of the same product are annoying too.
Title: Too many ads

Content: I got a refund for a costume that was never shipped they gave me a refund for it then suddenly returned the money back to themselves I’ve contacted 4 different people the first three said I’d get my refund back in 7-10 business days then suddenly I’d get it in 48 hours but it never came the 4th one was really unhelpful and didn’t understand what I was saying and repeating the same things. Terrible service
Title: Returned my refund

Content: Changing a payment method on an order with a live person was difficult, and when my son tried to change it online he was unable. Lots of strife for something that as t should've been simple
Title: Customer service mediocre

Content: Great app quality with multiple options if you are not certain of an item you can see similar products and buy what’s best for you
Title: FYI

Content: When making a purchase on items ,  I always look for the items with next day delivery and every time it goes to shopping cart it adds days to the order . What is the point of having prime of you don’t get the benefits .
Title: Delivery times

Content: The app is generally fine. I've been using it for years. For some reason, most recently, however, it has decided again not to work with voiceover. Entire pages disappear without warning, frequently, whether using the app or going in through the website. Voiceover is used for people with print disabilities, especially visual.
Title: Increasingly in accessible to visually impaired

Content: Virtually everything I’ll ever need, at the palm of my hand. I wish there was a way to enlarge (I’m growing old and my sight isn’t what it used be). But the usefulness and ease of use more than make up for this.
Title: What an app

Content: Okay, when i first got the app it was great! I love scrolling through thing and adding them to my list and what not. Recently, I tried going into the app and it said “uh oh, something went wrong on our end” and ever since then whenever i open the app it says that. But the thing is, it is only when i am home. I tried doing this at school and it worked just fine.
Title: This is making me mad

Content: The latest version has UI issues on iOS. The bottom third of the screen is blank, but you can still scroll the top section. If you’re in landscape mode, clicking any app control forces you back to portrait mode and a return of a blank bottom third. FRUSTRATING
Title: Fix UI on iPadOS

Content: The app has been malfunctioning lately the whole right side of the page is cut off so I can’t hit the , buy it now button, add to cart button or add to list. It also keeps switching to portrait mode making everything sideways on my monitor. Spent way to much time on chat and speaking to customer service than it’s worth
Title: Malfunction

Content: It now behaves like an iphone, both in appearance and more importantly, in rotation. Suddenly it is a useless app, after years of active use on my ipad. I can manually rotate my ipad to “fix” the app (back into landscape mode), but click on anything, an item or a menu option or an order, and it switches back to portrait (iphone) orientation. What did you do? Why? When will it be fixed?
Title: Sep Upgrade destroyed app for ipad

Content: After the newest update it opens vertically and I have to physically turn my IPad to get it to oriented correctly for my use. Also there is a big white blank banner at the bottom of the screen with no way to close it….please correct these issues!
Title: New update is terrible!

Content: This latest update has created viewing problems and much frustration on my iPad.   Why would you possibly release such a buggy app.   For those of you that say delete and reinstall yes that does work for a short time then all the viewing and sizing problems come back.   How do you take a 5 star app down to a one star app in one update????
Title: Update creating viewing problems

Content: I wasn’t able to use this app without updating.  After I updated it I’ve had problems.  It displays the page vertically/in portrait orientation and I don’t see a way to change it.  I don’t use my iPad this way and my stand only supports landscape mode.  Also, sometimes only the top 2/3 of the page is displayed.  Reinstalling the app or restarting my iPad has not helped.
Title: Forced to Update to a Buggy App

Content: Your platform could be easier.  Sort by delivery date would be awesome, being to see a running total.

Content: When I have a problem with my purchase, the customers Service is Extremely efficient
Title: Amazing Customer services

Content: All of a sudden I cannot make purchases from the iPhone app. Can’t add to cart, can’t add to list, can’t purchase. I have logged out and back in, I have uninstalled and reinstalled, I have changed password.  Please fix your app ASAP.
Title: Can’t add to cart or list!

Content: I am on my IPhone tonight trying to add to my latest order. I was able to access the app earlier in the day. Even support the app immediately closes. Help
Title: My app keeps closing

Content: I really wish there was still the filter in the orders to select “open orders”.  I pre-order books which can be a year out but looking at orders to try to find them is super annoying now.

Sharing lists is broken, ordering from Whole Foods is broken, the ability to search within specific departments is broken, etc etc etc.  Deleting the app and using the website as the app offers nothing but inconveniences and bugs.

Content: For the past few days since the update it has been super hard to purchase/look at items. It stays on a loading screen and i am constantly closing in and out of the app. I went to the app store to see if anyone else was having problems and i saw that they are and that the app was recently updated. So that must be the problem. Please fix it!
Title: New update misfortunes

Content: This app is getting worse by the day. Taking forever to load. Shutting down my phone. Not scrolling at all. Please fix this. I’ve never had issues with it before but obviously there are bugs and kinks going on. Thanks!
Title: Bogged down and slow

Content: The app keeps crashing every time  you go to view something to purchase. It won’t let you look at it and it won’t even let you add it to the cart. I tried reinstalling it and also updating it and the same thing keeps happening. If this is a new update it needs to be corrected because I have never had a more frustrating experience.
Title: Crashes

Content: The app doesn’t keep track of my purchase history.  I have to use my desktop computer and use the full site to have the ability to view and file a grievance if a product is faulty. 😒 lame
Title: This app is broken. You still need a desktop!

Content: Today after the update pushed out the app started closing a few seconds after it launches.
Title: Force closing after launch

Content: I’m a person who hates to go store by store looking around. I get inpatient at times and don’t want to wait. So I decide to look online where is at my own time and look for prices.

Content: Good products they send them quick if available I just bought a mixer I want to see how it comes the other stuff that I ordered was fine
Title: Mixer and cables

Content: What has happened to do 2 day shipping!? I’ve been a prime member for YEARS and always had 2 day or less shipping. Now my packages come in 5 or more days! That’s ridiculous!!
Title: No longer 2 day shipping

Title: Gift card

Content: I’m really upset that I’ve been paying for a membership and haven’t been getting my items shipped to my house in the time they said it would be here.
Title: Understanding

Content: Love the app. So much so that I might need to seek professional help haha😂 just please add a dark mode setting for the backgrounds. My husband and I keep very different sleep schedules and so I never feel comfortable browsing in bed.
Title: Please add a dark mode!

Content: I was given a $25 provisional credit via email from your customer service representative Sean and I was told that when I made an order and it will automatically deduct from that order I just purchased a mile stone blanket this morning and it did not deduct the $25 original credit can you explain please?
Title: Where’s my provisional credit $25

Content: Very convenient to shop.   Love the selection of items I can find.   What I don’t like is all the fake reviews and junk products out there.   I wish I could search for high quality goods that are verifiable.
Title: Overall good

Content: The latest redesign of the app added a floating “add to cart” button that sits right where your thumb naturally touches the screen while scrolling down to see details on an item. This loads up your cart with everything you look at, causing you to have to wade through the cart and delete everything or else buy a bunch of unwanted items by mistake.  FIRE THAT APP DEVELOPER.
Title: Terrible redesign causes cart loading

Content: Shopping is easy and lots of choices !  Found what I needed quickly and was able to check out without a problem . Choose the expedited shipping !
Title: My order

Content: Whomever your programmers are they should be fired. I enjoyed scrolling through all of the lightning deals. I found a nice tablecloth and those really wonderful anti-fatigue mats. Now there is no scroll and one has to go through each category. Please bring back the scroll feature and make it so that it does not jump five lines ahead of where you stopped.
Title: bring back the scroll for the lightning deals

Content: The old app was so much better. You could tap on a picture within a pic series and view, rather now you have to tap hold for zoom. Idiots
Title: Why change the picture view feature

Content: product is working but I was hoping it’s easier to rescue a small lizard from the trap (and let go outside). I did rescue her but almost gave up at some point: the glue is so thick
Title: Nice product but heartbreaking

Content: 1.App updates very slowly. So scrolling through past purchases to find items  is very frustrating  2. The whole food stand alone app lets you see how close your delivery driver is to your house. This is very helpful since I live in a hi-rise. This app does not have this feature. Again, very frustrating.
Title: Whole Foods feature not great

Content: Not sure who decided that moving the menu system to the bottom was better than having the menu at the left of the app??  With the menu at the bottom, Now I need two hands to reach and interact with the app when before my thumb was able to reach and interact with the menu system just fine.
Title: Why move the menu to the bottom of the app??

Content: 7 generations ahead of you will know how your leader has used his power to control the hearts and minds of our people to create a world in his limited minds image—- and the rest of you helped.
Title: Shame on you for hiding behind your ideals, I see you.

Content: It would be helpful to know in which country a product is made and being shipped from. Some of the products have that information but most don't.
Title: Indicate in which country products are made and being shipped from

Content: Basically if someone gets your phone because I’m signed into the app someone can go on a spending spree.  They need to have some sort of security for purchasing or making changes to the account.   Like someone else said filters are horrible.  Interface needs to be updated.  Looks like something from the 80s if there were internet.
Title: Where’s the security??

Content: It has good things, but I've really got most of it on other pages for better prices and the same quality. They tend to always have problems with sellers not shipping to your location. I was also subscribed to prime and the packages arrived more late than if it were not prime, they even charged me the monthly payment more than once per month.
Title: Can be better

Content: There is some bugs where it won’t load, or it will kick you out of the app. It sometimes also will say something is available when it isn’t, or it won’t load pictures. Also, I wish you could select multiple items to movie in lists.
Title: There is some bugs...

Content: For a company that promotes their customer service, I have sadly not encountered someone to provide that. I had a basic order request and was told that they do not do price adjustments under exception. That maybe I’ll get an adjustment on their end at their own discretion. Instead, I will have to cancel my initial order (return it) and order the exact same thing again. That is not what I call good customer service!!
Title: Poor customer service

Content: This app has just about EVERYTHING you could possibly want ! Everything about this app is really good, from the costumer service , to the shipping time , to the prices. Everything! Not much to complain about really.
Title: Very amazing app!

Content: The shopping cart was moved to the bottom and other features realigned. Confusing at first, then just aggravating.
Title: The mobile app does not mirror the desk top it kindle versions.

Content: I know that with this corona virus situation is getting harder to make the business, but it used to take 2 days for prime members, if it takes 4-5 days it’s alright, but is taking TWO WEEKS
Title: Taking to long

Content: The newest update is horrible. The menu bar at the bottom incredibly inconvenient and annoying. I cannot scroll now without accidentally hitting it. Please remove and re-update! Also- please show all lists. It’s annoying to find and open my baby registry- way too many clicks needed.

Content: Would be a 5 star but...I use to use the sample the mc3 music before I buy to be sure I’m getting the right song....now looks like you are forced to be an unlimited member to hear the song....not cool amazon...you are a 2 billion dollar company now...you can give us a break now and again
Title: Why, oh why did they take a feature away

Content: It doesn’t let me read the reviews. Click on reviews and nothing. I can click on anything else and it works. Stopped letting me see the reviews after last update. Also the filters do not filter properly. Very frustrating.
Title: Doesn’t let me see reviews. The filter does not work properly.

Title: Needs copy/paste tracking

Title: Cancel my order without me knowing

Content: This is probably not that serious, but why would you change “my orders”? Before it made sense, things that hadn’t arrived and things that were delivered were separated. Now they are all in one big list, doesn’t show if it was shipped unless you go to the product, and it’s a big mess. Also, it looks awful.
Title: Why?

Title: Your app is worthless.

I did find a couple results mixed in, but at double the price of what I found searching the Internet. This site needs to allow customers to provide feedback on what items don’t match what they’re looking for. What happened to the link to search for similar items?!.. oh found it.. it show cargo covers for other vehicles.. rage quit!

Content: The delivery drivers ruin this company. It’s awful they just throw your package at any door step they will literally hand it to anyone around your apartment without charging, then mark it as delivered and your left with no package. Please hire people who at least graduated high school. Or start docking pay to the idiots who deliver to wrong address my god it’s like you have to be a moron to be hired ughhhhhh

Content: You used to be able to just scroll through items while browsing and now only a limited amount show per page and you have to keep hitting next. Its less convenient. I dont understand why companies feel the need to “fix” things that arent broken. =|

Content: Love the app. Best shopping app I’ve used. One thing that seems to be missing is somehow having multiple products opened at the same time. Kinda like multitasking or having several tabs in a browser.   Anything like that possible?

Content: Should really think about being able to  real time track your orders could be a better improvement for the customer in case they have something to do but wanna be here for the package when it arrives just a thought!
Title: Tracking shipments could and should be in real time tracking

Content: I’ll add items to the cart. Once going back into the app to check on other things, I look at my cart and it will show its empty. Even though I have numerous items in there. I have to delete the app and reinstall to get everything back again.  Quite frustrating..
Title: Keep losing items in the cart

Content: I really hate the update that has the next page button instead of the scroll. Like, why? Scrolling was so much faster. The next page button just slows me down and I find my self giving up after the 2nd page. Please consider changing back to scrolling!

Content: Crashes, freezes logs me out, pictures will obscure options on the page, you sometimes need to scroll 8 and a half miles down the page past a pile of useless BS to find the review section, and the “share” button exists about 1% of the time. What the hell guys? Do you want me to make the app for you? I can if you want. Apparently the dudes who make it now aren’t gettin payed enough, this thing is trash.
Title: Why is a multi billion dollar company app this bad?

Content: The new update makes searching IMPOSSIBLE. Trying to filter your results you have to keep going back to the filter screen after each selection because it automatically takes you to the search page. Next and previous button I find unnecessary just let me scroll through all my results. Ugh.....
Title: Hate the update

Content: Can’t look at different models of the same product!  Seems to be a huge issue on a variety of items.  A shopping app that you can’t shop on....?
Title: Errors all over

Content: I loved using this app but not its hard to see items using my cell phone... the changes might be great but the view looks like I’m using a computer or the web vs my cell phone.
Title: Do not like the new look

Content: Wish list drag and drop feature has been removed and you now have to page through search results instead of them being provided as a continuous list. In addition, filter selections—including the “Prime” option—are removed after viewing an item and navigating back to the search results. None of these changes are user-friendly! Please bring the old version back!
Title: New Update is TERRIBLE

Content: No one wants to see 5 products and then have to click a next button and wait while the next page of products loads. Nor do we want to have to click the back button to have to go back to find the products we were interested in. I get creating room for ads but please bring the continuous scrolling back. It was way more convenient.
Title: The latest update is terrible

Content: The main feature that I loved was the drag and drop to the list tray that would pop at the bottom of the app. It made things so much simpler. This awesome feature is gone, and I even find myself sort of avoiding going into the app because of this.
Title: I used to love this app

Content: For being the second richest man in the world, I would think Jeff would be able to stay on top of technology and keep the foundational piece of his company from crashing EVERY DAY!!! I don’t write reviews, but this most recent update is consistently giving me the “Uh-Oh, something went wrong on our end” message! No kidding! Please fix, as I am discouraged to continue trying when it keeps crashing every time I use it. Thanks!
Title: What is wrong with this app?!?

Content: I ordered a punching bag, and I never got it, but it charged me 233 for it already,it saids it got here July 12th, but when I was first buying it, it said it would arrive between the 18th and 26th so I never checked the package until now. So I check and it saids it’s been delivered so I look in the garage, and everyone’s rooms in the house to see if it’s there, and everyone said no package has came, so now I’m waiting for this dumb seller to contact me back.
Title: First order was good, never got my punching bag

Content: Can y’all please add the feature back where we can slide through pics I hate going all the way back to click a new picture and then do it all over again

Content: The format for the review section is horrible before you can scroll through each picture review with the next or previous arrow now you have to go back and click on the image instead of going through all of them with just a click

Title: Awesome

Title: Please Add a Feature to Nickname my Payment Options

Content: Many of the products just have all the information squished to the very right hand side of the screen and is impossible to read.

Content: Can’t get anything I order right I ordered a book it came in Spanish  I ordered a brown guitar it came in blue Customer support lives on the other side of the world which there’s nothing wrong with that, they’re just incredible hard to understand and would not help me or give me a refund  I will never use this site again and I hope as many people read this review so you can save your time, money, frustration, etc
Title: no wonder people hate jeff

Content: Something happened with the “today’s deals” page! You can no longer filter the categories and when I go onto the “watching” tab, there is nothing but a white screen. Super frustrating! Fix this please.

Content: This app g”refuses to allow you to enter a new shipping address. When you create the address it looks like it has succeeded, then it throws you all the way back out of the shopping cart to the order summary page. The new shipping address is not saved. I contacted customer support about this and they argued with me about it. I uninstall/reinstall did nothing to fix the problem. Very frustrating when traveling.
Title: Horrible bug: won’t add shipping address

Content: Update: The latest update fixed the landscape orientation issue. That was my only problem with the app, I like it otherwise. Thanks for being so responsive to this problem!
Title: Fixed! Now its great

Content: For some reason the screen view does not show the whole description or reviews like it used to.  I would like to know if there are options on how the screen of the product chosen can be viewed. If the screen view is a recent change, this is the reason for my rating.
Title: Screen view

Content: The display problem has resolved.  Pages are not displaying properly on iPad Pro 10.5. Everything below the product is displayed in a 2 inch column on the right, everything to the left is white space.
Title: Seems to be working again

Content: It used to be perfect. Lately it's super laggy. Can't search for anything, touch does not register, can't open lists. I've gone back to just using the browser version.  About to delete app.  Edit: looks like they fixed with latest update.
Title: Better

Content: If you select a product to view then click on the picture to enlarge for a more detailed view it works fine on the 1st. product you select, however; all subsequent products that you view by clicking the picture to enlarge them, will only show the images for the 1st. product you viewed.
Title: Product Picture Problems

Content: When shopping around and navigating through various products, the top menu bar (back arrow, menu, search bar, checkout, etc.) occasionally becomes unresponsive. I’ve found that the only way to fix this is to restart the app, which is really frustrating and causes me to lose where I was. This is extremely annoying when trying to cross-shop multiple products.
Title: Please fix menu bar bug

Content: It worked fine until the last update. Now I can’t do anything without a screen popping up and asking for me to sign in despite the fact that I’m already signed in. Then it gives the message of oops something went wrong and I’m back where I started. Please fix this!
Title: Needs another update

Content: There needs to be a fix for the high background activity.  According to my battery, I’ve used the app for 2 mins but had 15 mins background activity.  Even when I turn it off it still registers, so something is hanging when I suspend the app.  Please fix, I will be uninstalling until a fix is issued.
Title: Background activity..?

Content: I do not want to be driven to your app.  If I am looking for options for purchasing a product, I can find more options using a web browser the one companies app. If I download your app, then if I want more info about a product, I am driven to your app.  Then I can’t use a simple back arrow to return to my selection options. If I don’t have the app, the info is displayed in my web browser.
Title: No App Ever

Content: It was fine before. Before now can’t look at order details because it always glitches on touchID. I even updated to iOS 11 to see if that’s the problem.  Update: also cannot contact customer service about an order issue because of the touchID glitch.
Title: Can’t sign in to check my orders

Content: I never had a problem with landscape vs. portrait, and then this update comes along and I cannot get the app to rotate to landscape position. It is not a convenient app in portrait mode and I am NOT happy!! PLEASE FIX!!!
Title: There wasn’t a problem until the update

Content: If I plan to buy any items from my list, I am unable to load them to check their availability and price, prior to purchase.
Title: Unable to load items from private list

Content: This latest update seems to have broken the screen rotation.  Its LOCKED in portrait mode on iPad making everything too small to read.  I want to  look at everything in landscape mode but screen longer rotates.  Its either broken or someone has decided they know how I should shop on their app.
Title: Broke screen rotation

Content: This allows me to do everything I need to to spend my money.. I probably made a purchase everyday for the past 6 years.. the app on iPhone is much better than everything else.. even the iPad app is not as good..
Title: Great app

Content: I’d like to see the app get a dark mode. Myself my eyes can’t handle bright light so I always choose dark mode whenever available.
Title: No complaints just a want

Content: Sitting out back on my patio with my coffee ordering fun things for my daughter, son-in-law & grandson’s new house so they can enjoy making it their home!!
Title: Having fun ordering things for my kids new house!

Content: So I had a wrongful charge on my debit card. I spoke with an agent about the situation. He said I'd get a refund. Told me to hold on. 10 minutes later I got a new agent. Explained to him what went wrong. 5 minutes later after waiting for nothing. I get a new agent. Talk to the agent. The agent said they knew it was wrong, and that I'd get a refund around 5-6 business days. It's been 15 business days. No refund.
Title: Lied to by customer service agents

Content: WTH is going on? This has been happening for a long time. I search for an item, use the filter. Click on an item, check it out. Go back to my list of filtered options. They’re gone! It’s back to my original search without my filters input. I have to do it all over again. And it just keeps happening. Going to start shopping elsewhere.
Title: Cancels queries if I add filters

Content: Undoubtedly due to agile and the need to change rather than find an optimal state the app is getting buggier and harder to use. I am constantly getting the dog pictures indicating the app is again hosed. Maybe you should let your people work at home as it’s clearly getting worse since you returned to the office.
Title: Somehow getting worse

Content: What genius decided to move the search bar to the bottom? Ordinarily, that would not be a problem. The problem is when you need to chat with customer service. The faint box that you are supposed to tap on to reply to cs is right above the search box and I have a habit of tapping the more obvious box (search box) when trying to type a reply. Bad design.
Title: Design flaw

Content: The company has transformed the app in an advertising engine reducing the value of the searches and the value of my time. Customer service, as many other reviewers said, is worse than that of cable companies. This app has become the necessary evil but at some point there has to be an alternative.
Title: Best game in town but still HORRIBLE

Content: I use this app all the time and i love it so much! It has pretty much everything you could possibly want or need, and fair prices for pretty much everything! 5/5 stars:)
Title: Best app ever!!

Content: It’s really annoying having the search bar on the bottom!!!
Title: Search bar

Content: I love the app , I would love it you guys added a multiple Cart feature. That would be next level 💯  It’s like organizing my shopping for when I get paid 😂
Title: I love the app

Content: It’s a shopping app and you guys don’t know how to use or something? 😭 or can’t find what you’re looking for. I don’t understand the dislikes. Man
Title: I think it’s funny how people dislike this 😭

Content: So we have to be eligible to do a review, that’s not productive at all. It isn’t genuine because now everyone can express their view on a product they ordered. I purchased a wristband that not only took days after supposed delivery to arrive, but it’s not the wrist band I ordered. It’s a completely different design than what I ordered. And I went to write a review and it says I’m not eligible. This is ridiculous.
Title: Get it together

Content: I miss being able to tap and hold when adding an item to my lists so I could select which list I wanted it on. Now the only option is wish list and I have to go in to manually move it.
Title: Lists options when selecting is gone

Content: What happened folks? Why has the search bar been moved to the bottom of the screen in the mobile? Most people are used to doing a search with search bar located at the top of the screen. It wasn’t broke, why are you fixing something that’s not broke? Bad idea .  I am sure you have received many negative feedbacks to this great move.
Title: Search bar in the bottom?

Content: Let us at least have the option to put the search bar at the top and remove the lightbulb from the bottom nav bar. Having muscle memory for the magnifying glass which used to be there is leading to frustration when looking for my orders. And now the bottom of the screen is cluttered with buttons and bars. Please fix it.
Title: Put the search bar back at the top

Content: This new UI or set up is ugly and frustrating. I shouldn’t have to start over from the very top to scroll through after viewing a product. I should still be able to continue where I left off. This is so annoying.
Title: Stop overdoing it.

Content: Moved the search box from top to bottom for no good reason. Just because you can doesn’t mean you should  Tiny Tracking map now buried under lots of white space with very little useful information. Old map was useful. This one can’t be expanded so why bother
Title: Upgrades aren’t. Just changes to justify developers job

Content: Only company that thinks the search bar being stuck at the very bottom of the screen is a good idea. All you need is add 2 settings to the app… “Search bar position: top/bottom” “Search bar visibility: hide when scrolling/always visible”  The search bar being on the bottom and always visible just blocks the view of products while scrolling.
Title: Dumb search bar

Content: Change the saved back to the lists. I had them in lists for a reason. And now I can’t I save something or see multiple lists.  Very frustrating.
Title: Lists changed to saves

Content: Returned item the same day I received it.  Bought Anderson Hitch for my pick up.  Returned because didn’t fit in the receiver.  It has been 30+ days waiting for money.  Still have not received it yet.  Called customer service 3 times keep telling me they received the item back, but could be another 10 days before it is deposited back in my bank account. Terrible
Title: Returned item

Content: Having just about anything worldwide at your fingerprints, has never been easier. Shopping without hassles and always getting great deals!
Title: Worldwide

Content: I can’t get my orders to load. It’s frustrating because I can’t figure out how to put something together because I can’t look at the video. I tried letting it load for 30 minutes and it just never stops loading.
Title: Not loading

Content: I use this app frequently but over the last month or so when I go to look at my orders page it takes an extensive amount of time to load if it loads at all. Please fix this
Title: Order page not loading in app

Content: This app is a good app I recommend you to get it it has whatever you need a fast shipping and for your first purchase they give you like a free coupon and free shipping!!
Title: You should get

Content: The app has become a trashcan for bad ads. Sports videos all over the place. I don’t care about sports. Im trying to shop… not be told theres sports videos.  They changed the icons recently too, which are just garbage. Harder to find what i need… wheres my browsing history? Wheres my orders?   Why cant i get support through the app? Why link me to the website? (Oh id guess this is an apple problem)
Title: Stop these bad ads!

Content: This app and its search field option make finding, reviewing the item and its customer reviews as too the availability to order so simple.
Title: Excellent app!

Content: In the middle of searching or looking at a product, the app will suddenly have a completely blank page. I often have to redo my search and it gets really annoying real fast. This has been happening for at least a month or so.
Title: App freezes with blank screen

Content: Any chance of the developers fixing the issue users are constantly having with a page going blank randomly. I’ll be looking at an item and then blank. I have to go back and start the search all over. You can’t figure this out?
Title: Still buggy after lots of updates

Content: The most recent update changed the order page. Now if you have a bunch of orders or preorders, it’s hard to keep track of when they will ship. They need to bring the old page back thay shower all orders made in order of when they are gonna ship vs now where it’s just showed orders on how recent they were placed.
Title: Bad update

Content: For the past maybe 3months if I search my app, it will randomly just go blank.  You can see the search bar, home bar, account bar, etc. but no products.  I have to close the app and reopen.  There is no searching because I’d be doing this motion constantly. I can now only shop if I know what I’m needing.  Go in, get out and hope the screen doesn’t blank out.

So annoying.

Is this a broken feature of the app or an intentional scam?

Whoever you men and women are, you’re stupid and pathetic.

This is an online app with sensitive information, and if something goes wrong, there is no one to contact. The chat doesn’t work and the phone lines don’t respond. Nowhere to go but screwed.

I understand that we are in an emergency but I’m also running a business that requires protective gloves for certain chemicals and to cancel my order twice isn’t good for business. I hope that in the future they will progress in good customer care and a little more understanding and some better communication with the client.
Title: They canceled my order twice

App needs to wait until I'm done setting all the filters and search only when we click on Done.  Otherwise it's a pain in the  __ to repeatedly go back into search options for every type of filter setting

Very poor service for such an expensive item.   One star given for this service.

A significant amount of items are Sponsored items, which distract from shopping and waste time (usually, cheap crap).  The app was much better a year ago. Now it’s almost useless.

Title: Fix it! The BACK Button doesn’t work

Content: What has happened to this app since the newest update? I’ll search for an item, click on it, then all of a sudden the back arrow or anything on the top bar doesn’t work! Sometimes on the home page I can’t search items because it doesn’t allow me to click in the search bar! It’s awful now! And it’s not my phone as my screen works in that area once out of this app.
Title: Touch screen not working on app?!?

Content: Latest update stops working correctly after browsing items.  Primarily the top navigation buttons to go back to the previous screen or jump to the home page stops working. I have closed the app, removed from memory and launched again.  No change. App continuously fails in the same way.
Title: Latest update not working on iPhoneX

Content: Ever since the latest update it requires to input the password to sign in to see details of the orders. When I do sign in, it comes back with an error message. Every single time. So I just go to the browser and do it there. If that would be the purpose of the app, there wouldn’t be an app. Please fix it.
Title: Update needs an update

Content: It would be awesome if you could search and add an advanced filter to search the people/influencers you follow to find a specific item they’ve posted and can’t remember who posted it.
Title: Search filter

Content: Just show the darn product.  Instead of showing me photos of the products in my search results, I see videos for those products. I can’t see the actual product photo in the list, just movement. It’s also really distracting. And you can’t turn it off. Please end this pointless distraction.
Title: Auto play videos for products in search list!!?

Content: The UI on this app has been getting worse and worse. The wishlist looks like absolute crap now and things are more difficult to find. The search bar being on the bottom is dumb and doesn't look good. Stop updating stuff that worked perfectly fine and focus on updating your search function.
Title: Just keeps getting worse

Content: Why do you guys make everything so exspensive and it takes 10 years just for it to be shipped if you want shipping faster you should to it on plane instead of a facility I even had to cancel my order because of this
Title: Make it cheaper

Content: When I order an item, I want to pay for it when I order it. If I order something and think I have money left over and spend my money, I’m not going to expect to get hit with “payment revision needed” 5 days later when I have no money. Please make a setting so I can just pay for the order when I order it
Title: What’s up with the delayed payment

Content: Asks for OTP which is fine, but sends an OTP before I select how to get the OTP. There is no spot to send the OTP I’m sent because the page is waiting for me to tell it which king of OTP I want. But I can’t tell it what I want because it tells me I have to wait. When I do wait and it sends a new OTP, I still don’t get a screen to input the OTP which makes me super grumpy!
Title: Can’t log in

Content: For the love of God, please stop changing the rating system. Now I can’t tell how many people have reviewed a product. Please put back the star rating (with all stars shown for easy identification) and the number of ratings. Why make it harder?!?
Title: Don’t fix what isn’t broken

Content: Almost everything available on this app is cheap Chinese clones of every product you could want. It’s impossible to filter the search results by the products country of origin which leads to tons of garbage arriving at my doorstep. Let people support their own countries economy and not some Chinese child slavery company that directly funds the CCP to commit more atrocities to the Uyghur Muslims
Title: Needs “sort by country of origin” feature

Content: Only issue is being too late ordering products at awesome prices…my bad. Everything is delivered on time and in great shape at phenomenal prices.👍👍
Title: Only issue is I ordered too late…👍👍

Content: Y’all should add a feature where you can send stuff to your friends on the app instead of having to send a link. Kinda like what tik tok has
Title: I swear this will be a hit

Content: Prime is so overpriced and they don’t include a lot of their services in it like music. A lot of stuff doesn’t even come within the two day period and a lot doesn’t even have that option included. Not worth it. It’s a convenience but not sure it’s worth the price
Title: Prime is overpriced

Content: I hate how I can’t find what I wanted when I put in a item. Then the results has so many things that I didn’t want. It makes finding what I want to take forever to find.  This multiple items is a freaking nightmare.  Can’t you JUST pull up what I asked for??
Title: Hard to find

Content: I like being able to do one transaction for my order so my bank doesn't flag multiple...and now with the update you can't seem to be able to make subscribe and save orders with the rest of the cart like before.
Title: Subscribe and save in cart gone

Content: I can’t find certain items anymore. My private shopping list is missing. Also the grooming items that I normally find. Are being sold for hundreds/thousands of dollars. I’m not sure if the app was hacked. This is definitely a problem.
Title: Was the App Hacked?

Content: Love the new layout with the search at the bottom. Still would appreciate far better battery optimization out of this app though. No reason it should be this power hungry.
Title: New UI layout

Content: The new update to the app is awful. The search bar needs to be at the top. The way everything is organized now makes everything difficult to find. Jumping through hoops to find something that took two screens before is infuriating.  The app needs to go back to being almost the same as the mobile website.
Title: Bad Update

Content: The changes to the app are really bad. It now acts more like a pseudo browser rather than the former version of the app. It lags and begins to not load results especially if you follow links to products store fronts. The search bar move would be ok if the back button were a little larger.  Adding to cart resulting in checkout or view cart were not well thought out.
Title: App changes review

Content: Move the stinking search bar back to the top. Who thought this would be a good idea? It’s the only thing has the search bar at the bottom so your brain is constantly looking for it elsewhere and adds a split second of confusion which leads to aggravation and finally a bad experience using the app.
Title: Search bar

Content: Hating how now the search results are so large that you can’t really scroll through all your options easily. Makes me feel like they want me just to pick the first thing they show me. More so makes me just close the app and search somewhere else for what I am looking for now.
Title: Struggling with the latest update

Content: I absolutely hate the search bar being pulled down to just the bottom of the page, just above the toolbar. it’s not where my eyes want to look when I’m searching and when I’m clicking to search for item, half the time I end up tapping on one of the tools. please allow us to choose where we want the search bar
Title: Change search bar back!!!

Content: It’s great but with the latest update I’ve been having problems where it has been saying “Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again,” constantly.
Title: The new update

Content: The search bar is now at the bottom of the app to cater to those who are using only their thumb. I hate it. I know it is simple to adjust to but I don’t want to. I have preferences and practically every app has the search at the top. Even Safari gave the choice instead of mandating it. Change it back or better yet give the public an option.
Title: Forced move of search bar

Content: I keep getting an error message  in your app when I try to do ordinary things such as view my cart, look up order history, access customer service, and search for products on my iPhone. I have done the following things already:  1. Downloaded the latest version 2. Uninstalled and reinstalled the app 3. Logged out and logged back in  I have already tried to access in app customer service, but it gives me an error message as well. Your assistance would be greatly appreciated.
Title: App has major glitches

Content: Why is the search bar down at the bottom of the screen now on the app??? That’s the most ridiculous thing you could’ve done. No option to change it. It’s just stuck there in the bottom of the app. So irritating! Even when Apple tried that dumb move, at least they gave us an option to keep things normal.
Title: If it ain’t broke, don’t break it.

Content: I made a order and than it my account got put on hold bc of suspicious activity with the payment and I sent them the proof of everything and they still have my account on hold. I haven’t got my money back I had already spent the money order got canceled didn’t get money back so I wouldn’t recommend this app.
Title: Really ?

Content: The most unreliable delivery service. I pay extra to have something ordered by a certain time (i.e. adding extra items to quality and paying more fees) and they fail me almost every time. I pay for services and don’t get them. Canceling my subscription. Unbelievable.
Title: No wonder you had to lay everyone off

Content: I had like 9 deliveries this month, and the last one very important for me urgent overnight delivery has a status: delivery attempted today. And no other information update for many hours!  When am I going to get this stuff? No clue for several hours.  And of course it is not obvious to find support contact and find cancel membership button.
Title: Canceled membership because of UX and service

Content: I hate going to the deal section now. It doesn’t show prices it shows groups which you have to click on to see the prices of individual items. Then when you go back to the sales it states you from the top and you wonder why Black Friday and Prime day didn’t do well. It’s too cumbersome to scroll to see what you want.
Title: Deal section not user friendly

Content: I didn’t see my order after i purchased it. I had a difficult to get to place my order.
Title: I didn’t see my order

Content: Orders placed with ample time for delivery end up being delayed so long that the reason for the order is now missed. Customer service is USELESS! They give you the runaround and give no actual assistance. They do not vet sellers, and take no responsibility for any problems with shipping, even when it’s included in prime. There is no integrity in this greedy company. There never was. The app is total garbage, as well. Shop local.
Title: The worst

Content: Had a great experience with most purchases until one came in with an item missing and they kept blowing me off telling me the second dumbbell would arrive later. Then I ordered a desk chair which didn’t arrive and again they offered no resolution. Most of my orders arrived on time but as soon as I had complications they offered little to no help.
Title: Great when orders are fulfilled properly

Content: The latest update completely broke the app. My entire purchase history is gone, and it says I've never bought anything. The search also isn't returning all relevant results and only includes a handful of brands despite my typing the brand name into the search bar. Lists are also gone. The mobile website still works, though.
Title: Update broke the app

Content: There’s no excuse for such a buggy app. You have a ton of programmers and you can’t make a functional app? Product pages disappear while you’re reading them, missing functionality, etc. And I hear it from a lot of other people so it’s a wide spread problem. But they are too big to care.
Title: Ridiculously Buggy App

Content: Thanks to the overly aggressive risk management, my account was locked out when I couldn’t name the month and year when I subscribed — which was at least eight years ago. Though, they were happy to continue charging me for their service which I could not use.  Good job losing a customer who spent $17,195 since 2013 on your services (yes, I checked mint).
Title: Just cancelled my subscription after 8+ years

Content: The app is still not user friendly. Website is still a better experience. Company as a whole is getting worse. Customer service is terrible. Even prime doesn’t get you much anymore.
Title: Getting worse

Content: Every time I tap on an item to look at the description my screen goes white I have to hit the back button research the item and it does it all over again and again. Apps up to date have no idea why I’m having this issue.
Title: App no good

Content: The page constantly goes blank on me and doesn’t show back up. I have to either switch to a new tab or tap the back button to get anything to reload on my screen. This happens at least once every time I open the app.   Can you please fix this?
Title: Page will go blank and unresponsive

Content: When products do not deliver needs to be a option in returns. I’ve not gotten two things and see no option for this.
Title: Returns

Content: I dont know when the change happened , appears to be recent . But when shopping the Whole Foods market and something is on sale, it now only shows the sale price and before it showed also the original price and savings to ensure you knew you were getting a good sale item. Please update back as this is a helpful budget tool
Title: Whole Foods market

Content: But instead of copy/pasting the SAME thing in the update notes for well over a year, how about you guys show transparency in what you fix or change? Also where is dark mode? This is one of the very few apps I have that still blind me. I should not have to wear sunglasses when opening your app.
Title: The app works fine...

Content: We are very happy with any items we order! We are only disappointed in the last 2 orders there were promised  on one and they did not come for 2 or 3 days later! Thank You for asking and helping us to get our orders in a timely matter as we expected!
Title: Bern n Mike

Content: The last few months this app has been very glitchy. I click on a product it shows it to me for a couple seconds then it all turns white and I have to back out of that product and hope that it’s still on the same page of listings but usually it’s not
Title: Glitching so much

Content: The 4 buttons on the bottom of the app have a bug when using the trackpad on my Magic Keyboard. When trying to select a button, 3 of the 4 are off to the side, not overtop of the button symbol.
Title: Bug with iPad app

Content: Always getting quality products and services
Title: Happy customer

Content: I ordered my first skateboard and I’m so excited and I got the last one on sale! I wait 2 days for it to come and they changed the date witch was a bummer and I had to wait another week for it to come then the day it’s supposed to come they canceled the WHOLE ORDER!!!! I’m so mad and now I have to wait 12 business days to get my money back😡😖
Title: I’m so mad

Content: I like to watch videos and look at the pictures before I decide what to buy, but the videos never play.
Title: Video playback

Content: You guys are seriously great. Beside the fact that I can never send reviews even though I love doing so bite got post blocked and I can’t get a response for my dispute… I still continue to purchase off your site 😊
Title: You guys are almost the best

Content: First place I look when I need something because they have everything!
Title: Everything!

Content: Love how easy it is to find what I’m looking for.  Just type it in the search box snd there it is.  Can filter to get only the highest rating items or by price.
Title: Easy

Content: I enjoy ordering items on the app. It makes shopping a pleasure, not a hassle, from searching for items and placing the order. Keep up the great work.
Title: Love it

Content: This latest version has issues with iPad Cursor support when using an external “mouse” or “track pad”.  Specifically when the mouse indicator gets down to the lower bar where “Home”, “Account”, “Cart”, and “Menu” exist, it starts to jump around all over the screen.
Title: iPad Cursor Support Issues

Content: I pay for prime and use to order my stuff on here and it would ship most of the time that day. Know I order things and it gives a shipping date several days out. Then they wait till the last minute to ship my items and then they arrive late??? Why are you charging me for prime if we aren’t getting our stuff faster than we use to?????
Title: Shipping

Content: Someone called me 5 minutes after I sent a message. Fast and friendly customer service!
Title: Customer Service

Content: Still no change to search and sorting of items. When there are 2000 items returned from a search, I need more control over custom filtering. *initial review* The app works but you can't control the search sort and filters well. The app is okay for some purchases, but overall, it's best to use a browser to search for products.
Title: Search function is awful

Content: When you have gift card money, by default it’s setup to be used right away. Please change this. I’d like to be able to select when I spend that gift money.  Lightning deals are not all great. Irrelevant to my shopping or search history.   I also have had to cancel an order several times because I’ve had something shipped to a different address once, and for some reason, the app treats it as my default.   I’d like to be able to export all my invoices from my phone and not have to go to a computer.
Title: App is still clunky

Content: There’s always something with the app going wrong . I made a thought my gift card had 30 dollars so I made a 29$ purchase then I get a notification that something went wrong because there wasn’t enough money or something and I had to do a report and wait 24 hours for a response. If the full payment isn’t in the card why continue the payment ?
Title: BAD

Content: Love the wide selection of ptoducts, item descriptions, star ratings, customer reviews & Prime shipping.  Some items sadly do not ship to hawaii…but I’m hoping they all eventually will!!
Title: Shop Everything!  So efficient!

Content: Take great care of your employees, because they sure do take care of getting things handle for those of us who delay on ordering. Thank you!!!!
Title: Saved my day & Christmas!!

Content: During this terrible COVID pandemic, we could always depend on you and your well trained couriers to help us.  They stuck to their schedule and always arrived on time.  We are grateful.
Title: Fabulous service with a smile

Content: Your app is so easy to use and the shopping experience can’t be beat, your return process is perfect.  Thank you for providing a wonderful way to shop Douglas
Title: So Easy

Content: Love shopping here great prices and always have what I want or need in stock ! Everyone should be shopping and buying from you ! Thanks for making it so easy to !
Title: Review

Content: Using this site is so Easy I had my 7 year old daughter place my Order I walked her through it over the phone but still it was that easy!!!
Title: Wow

Content: When you have multiple addresses and cards you use to check out because the check out glitches and is frustrating I have had packages delivered and charged to the wrong places and cards.
Title: Cart check out

Content: When it comes to the thanksgiving sales I get overwhelmed with the amount of stuff and when I actually pick something to look at and try to return to my original spot it boots me back to the top of the list and I have to start over looking
Title: I’m overwhelmed

Content: Easy professional process with updates of unavailable products.  Wishlist for unavailable products
Title: Shopping success

Content: Always has something for what you’re looking for and a lot to choose from
Title: Convenient and easy

Content: Everything I have order or returned has been just as it should be no one could ask for more it
Title: New start

Content: I do not like the updated order screen where I have to scroll to find orders that haven’t shipped yet (like preorders) instead of having them put first and all delivered items put after. It’s annoying. Please change it back.
Title: Order screen

Content: Give the customer what we paid for. And has it in a timely fashion. I’m generally pleased and will do business with them again.
Title: They get it right

Content: Totally reliable mite be a few days sometime but you know you’re getting your stuff and sometimes it comes before the dew date so no complain love it
Title: Best app ever

Content: I used to like the app. This update ruined it in landscape. Also they destroyed the interface to try to make it like the website. You can’t find things as easy as before. The website has never been that good anyway.  Can you provide the old one? Whoever you hired to fix what worked before has screwed it up so much that it is totally unusable.
Title: Ruined it.

Content: App used to open in landscape on my iPad. Then it started flipping to portrait and back to landscape. Now it just goes straight to portrait and stays like that. You can’t see the all items on that page. My landscape is locked on my iPad so that is not the issue.
Title: Won’t stay in landscape mode
