But they’re sure on time to take my monthly prime payment.
Title: Money Hungry

Content: Absolutely love this app. It’s so easy to move around and look for things and compare. Even easier when checking your account. I can’t believe I waited so long to download this app.
Title: So easy

Content: This was an amazing app I could buy anything up here all I know they sometimes come short because the quarantine and everything but it still works
Title: The

Content: Before I updated the app(I like the old look better btw) I would receive push notifications on my lock screen on my phone. But now, I only get email notifications which is annoying. Yes, I turned on the notifications from the settings.
Title: Push notifications

Content: Constantly tells me it's loading. The mobile website works... just not the app
Title: Constant loading

Content: Ever since this app has been updated I can not see the reviews. I have to go to the actual website now.
Title: No longer see reviews?!

Content: When I look at the item I want it says view in your room but when I click on the item it doesn’t have a button that says “view in your room.” And I am on iPad so that may be the problem. I’m not %100 sure.
Title: iPad problems?

Content: If you can’t get our stuff to us by the delivery date that you provide then maybe you should change the date to give you more time to make an on time delivery instead of make people stress over money loss because things are not showing up when your company claims it will arrive ........ more like Banggood every day
Title: Not what it used to be

Content: I was forced to update the app to even use it so I updated it. Now I’m fighting trying to sign into my account. It refuses to let me sign in tells me to reset my password so I do then go to sign in and it tells me to reset my password because it’s not secure. It’s happened over and over again. So I went to the internet browser  to reset it just maybe that’ll work nope it instantly redirects me to the app. 🙄🙄
Title: Forced update now won’t let me sign in.

Content: The latest version overlays a “back to top” link right in the middle of the screen making it difficult to see the actual product page.
Title: UI worse in latest update

Content: I go on this app everyday, with little to no issues in my iPhone X but today 28 May 2020, I can’t get on. Please resolve the issue as soon as possible. Thank you in advance
Title: App not working

Content: On IPhone, the menu bar on the bottom is annoying and takes up viewing area. Ditch the Bar
Title: I Don’t Like the Last Update

Content: With the last two or three upgrades on the app I have not been able my current or past orders. I’ve always been able to see them before on the app. Now I can only see them on my desktop computer through the browser. Please fix.
Title: Can’t see orders anymore

Content: We order a Above ground pool, and we want it to be delivered at Friday, so we paid extra charge for the shipping so we could get the Above ground Pool on that day, but it’s didn’t arrive. Never truth their date of shipping.
Title: Shipping

Content: I know you want people to explore beyond their usual boundaries but test these in people that use the app not just easy for the x that develop the apps.   Too many big pictures that slow the operation of the app and wesite.
Title: Changes

Content: When I type in search and the search assumes I miss spelled so It searches what it thinks I meant. Meanwhile it says what I wanted to search right at the top of the page “did you mean to say” like yes I meant to type it why is it changing. Is this that influencing purchases thing
Title: Auto correcting search

Content: Would be great to have a filter that allows for product searches by country where product was manufactured .
Title: Filter needed

Content: This new update is full of bugs. All my orders are gone that I just bought. And it is not user friendly. Do not update your app if you haven’t
Title: New update

Content: I no longer have a list to shop from only showing sponsored item. What ia the point of shopping on this app when I can’t browse anything?
Title: Only shows sponsored items

Content: When you are looking at the photos in reviews of a product, if you click on one of the photos to see it bigger, then click back after you’re done, it takes you to the very top of the list of pictures. Super annoying when you’re scrolling through hundreds of pictures in the reviews.
Title: PLEASE FIX THIS ISSUE

Content: For the past two days upon opening the app or while shopping I get the error message “oops something went wrong.” Also when searching I go to click on “new and used” items option nothing happens.
Title: Random Error Messages

Content: I have been a prime member for awhile and at first all my packages where speedy fast and always showed up when they where expected to, lately none of my packages have been on time or my delivery dates change with every package. I’m not sure what’s going on but I wish I knew that when it says arriving this date that I should expect it days after that.
Title: I love this app but..

Content: I have this app as a portable site for short shopping tasks. When I don’t have time to pull out my laptop I’m simply pull out my phone and pop open the search bar and begin to shop. 𝘔𝘢𝘬𝘦𝘶𝘱 𝘚𝘪𝘵𝘴 💎✨☝🏽
Title: 5 Star Review from Tec Ren 9

Content: After closing the app with this new update, it doesn’t keep me logged in anymore. It’s an annoyance that I can’t even view my wish lists or shopping cart with ease. I have to constantly sign in. Please fix!
Title: UNABLE TO REMAIN LOGGED IN

Content: I have had this app for about 2 years and I had lots of things in my cart. I was using the app when all the items in my cart got erased. I don’t know what caused this, but I’m unhappy with the app.
Title: It erased ever thing in my cart.

Content: Today my app has started only displaying 18-20 items per page and then I have to click Next and wait for the page to load. I can’t find a setting to change this.   Previously it was a continuous list of items. What happened?
Title: Why only 18 items per page?

Content: Bring back drag and drop for wish list. I have different wish lists and I don’t want to be constantly changing which one is the default.
Title: Wish List

Content: Unbelievable who miss up with the filters??? You removed the prime option from the filter !!! You have Changed the smooth animation when I selected specific filter  ? Now when I select a feature the screen flicking!!! There is no even update to fix this ?? So I have to go to the website to make my Daily shopping !!  Not fair the company gone so big and lost track of deliver quality work!!!!
Title: Please read!!!

Content: There is absolutely NO need for there to be a ‘next’ button after every 15 or 20 items... this is ridiculous and annoying. Fix that and whatever algorithm was changed regarding the way the search works. Oh, and get rid of all the Chinese/Asian knockoff garbage that has to be filtered through when one is trying to find quality products sourced from companies who have standards.
Title: Fix the glitch!!

Content: The app used to be fine, but recently it keeps giving me errors with pictures of dogs in the middle of using the app. It completely shuts down everything I’m doing and even closing it out doesn’t help. It’s incredibly frustrating. I’ve had to stop using the app and switch to the browser and it defeats the purpose of the app.
Title: So many bugs

Content: I’ve been trying to get into the app, and I really like to browse the catalogs. However, ever since the update I get into the app and about a minute later it kicks me out of the app. I’ve looked at all the reviews since the update and people say it’s really laggy. I haven’t seen anyone with the same problem as me, and it seems that restarting the app, the phone, and redownloading the app doesn’t work.
Title: Last update is REALLY laggy

Content: I don’t understand the need to have an App. Until Apps like this let users zoom in on a page, one of the main reasons to even use a mobile OS, I will continue to prefer a web browser so I can zoom in on an item quickly. Add the ability to zoom in, and you might get more people to use the App.
Title: Can’t zoom in...will keep preferring Web

Content: I don’t know if this is happening only recently, but once I noticed it I cannot forget how slow it is.   Any page / link I go to, it takes at least a second or two to load. Zooming on product images feels weird. Most pages look like it’s loading a version of a mobile web page. Just doesn’t feel like a native iOS app. It’d be a shame if this is actually a fully native app.
Title: App is so slow!!

Content: Something happened and all of my information is gone.  I had to re input all of my information but it says I am no longer a prime member.  I have no issues when ordering from my computer but from the app I am charged for everything and do not get any of the benefits of a prime member.  When I went in to try to change info it won’t allow me.  There is no contact us on here either.
Title: My Membership is gone

Content: Not as friendly and quick to navigate as it used to be. Removed "drag and drop" to wishlist. Added the "hearts" system which drops into a default list, which isn't ideal. Lists have never been great set up but drag and drop was my favorite feature and they removed it for the hearts system.
Title: Love the app but

Content: I am no longer able to drag and drop items to my wish list dock at the bottom of the app screen. I can't save items to my wishlist dock by dragging the item down anymore.  I have the updated app and have even tried deleting and redownloading. Nothing yet had helped.
Title: Usually ok but bug now

Content: I used to get app notifications when my items ship & get delivered. I have check all my notification & they are all on. I only get emails now. I would love the app notifications back
Title: Love this app but...

Content: This app was great. But until recently my list tray at the bottom of the app is gone. Now I can’t easily drag and drop items to my lists and the save and compare is useless to me now because I have to keep clicking back and forth I stead of easily switching between products at the bottom of the app. Please fix this problem
Title: Where has the list tray gone?

Content: Look like I have orders four of the same things, but two have ship, don’t need four only the two that have ship. Thank you for your attentions In this matter
Title: About my order

Content: When we create lists and add items, we should be able to see the total price of all the items in that list at the top. It is very helpful and would make the app 1000x better than it already is.
Title: Love the app, new Suggestion

Content: This app is easy to use, user friendly, and very intuitive.  I don’t use a lot of filters but the few times I have I’ve had no issues.  Open the app, search, purchase.
Title: Easy to use

Content: Thanks for fixing the issue that I previously reported (below)!  — I am using an iPhone X, and when I tap on “View Lists,” nothing happens.  Here’s how I’m getting there: hamburger menu \Your Lists\View Lists.  Please fix this!
Title: View Lists Fixed!

Content: This a better then the store JCPenny! And I’ve used this app for more than 100 years... actually I’m only 10 so not that long! But the point is I live this app it’s the best thing ever! Actually it’s not the best thing ever... but it’s up there!
Title: Amazing app!!!!

Content: I use the mobile app often but the ‘View Lists’ function does NOT work, which means there are many times that I have to wait until I can get to a laptop or pc.  This problem has gone on so long that I thought by now it would have been reported and fixed...
Title: ‘View Lists’

Content: I was charged for products that I ordered and after I received them another account was charged. I’ve been looking for a way to contact support and I can’t find it.
Title: Payment method

Content: You need to remove that because if multiple people use the same acct they can see if someone ordered a surprise for that person
Title: Your order preview on home screen

Content: Defect: As a user, I would like to be able to click the view lists and/or ... on the list page with one click on my iPhone X so that I can select other lists than the default list viewed.   Presently, this functionality is very difficult to use or unusable altogether.
Title: Issue Changing Lists

Content: I have multiple wishlists and when I click on lists, it opens only one of my wishlists. Then I click on “See all lists” in the upper right hand corner and nothing happens. It won’t take me to the page. If you could fix this, it would be really helpful.
Title: “See all lists” button doesn’t work in app

Content: I want so much to like this app but because it’s too buggy, I usually end up using the browser instead.   One of my biggest problems with it is the way it handles the product view. Once you view one product on zoomed view and move to another product, the zoomed view displays the previous product!   Please fix this!
Title: Very buggy!

Content: When I load the app I have a problem where Every. Single. Time. I search for an item manually it instead takes me to a product page for either Fire TV or Echo products to sell me, rather than the product I searched for. I then have to back out to the main menu and do the search over again. Can’t get rid of the bottom ribbon/bar. Your app is getting worse, not better!
Title: Problems on the X

Content: Never have I seen a worse update. Whoever designed this update must want people to shop elsewhere, because this version makes it much harder to navigate and find things. For example, try finding your Browsing History. It’s possible, but not easy. The Quick Access bar at the bottom is gone. What were they thinking, that more complicated is better?  Incompetence!
Title: Somebody Should be Fired!

Content: Neither FaceID works, nor just the plain old password. I’m forced to use my PC to view orders. Please fix. It used to work fine. Same goes for changing payment method once in the checkout. When I click on the payment method (in order to change it), it simply reloads the cart instead of offering me the option to choose one of my other payment methods. This app is a complete disaster on iPhone X.
Title: Constant “Oops, something went wrong” errors.

Content: No landscape mode for the IPad... I have an IPad Pro and not having a landscape display option is a disgrace...this is really a poor improvement without customer input! What you were thinking?
Title: No landscape mode for the iPad....

Content: I love this app. But here’s the thing. I can’t sign in with my thumb print or password when I’m trying to view my orders or proceed to checkout. Please fix this because I hate going from my phone to computer just to click a button, when I should be able to do everything from my phone.
Title: Thumb Print

Content: Could be easier when trying to order you have items that are there but no add to cart ???
Title: Products

Content: For two days I can’t get onto my account. They won’t close my account. They know that my account was hijacked to Canada. I’ve spent far too money through the years with them to be treated like this. Someone stole my account. They’re aware of it and they won’t help me.  Hopefully someone from corporate will read this and contact me.  Thank you
Title: Awful just awful. Won’t help with stolen accounts.

Content: My currency is set in India’s currency when I had never changed it, but my address is still the same. As well as when I add a different address (my same address just a different name) it still remains the same and say that I’m located in India but at my address in the USA.
Title: Currency issue

Content: Y’all returned the app interface to what it use to be for years. Having the return arrow and find window at the bottom was genius for one-handed operation on an iPhone Max. Perhaps instead, can we have a setting for top or bottom search…?
Title: What update?

Content: App works great never had a problem with it nor with updating it. Been using it for a couple years now with no complaints.
Title: Great App

Content: Doesn’t have any visual accessibility settings that I can find, and I’m normally pretty good at finding those. Disgraceful. ADA violator. I just wanted to shop for computer monitor covers to prevent migraines without getting a migraine in the process!
Title: Doesn’t have dark or low contrast mode. No accessibility settings

Content: Most of the time you’re better off searching on Google for a product. App is almost useless.   There’s a whole section in the app called your Shortcuts, there’s no way customize it, so how are they yours?
Title: Broken Search, missing features

Content: I use this app almost daily and i cannot get used to the search bar at the bottom. So much so that i resort to using the browser now.  Please change it back or give people the option to select what works best for them. I guarantee most people are unhappy with this change, messing with peoples muscle memory like that.  So unnecessary
Title: I wish I never updated

Content: The new version of the app has the search bar pinned to the bottom of the screen. It’s awkward, clunky, and the opposite of the website. There needs to be an option to move it back to the top.  I suggest using another app until this is fixed.
Title: Difficult and Uncomfortable to Use

Content: I wish they would bundle orders of multiple items at the same time. My packages have scattered arrival dates. The other thing is they should have freezer transportation for food not have the frozen items riding in the back of someone’s car all my food was basically unthawed by the time it got delivered.
Title: Disappointed

Content: Why is the search bar on the bottom when no one else has the search bar on the bottom?  And then that stupid inspire icon at a glance looks like a search icon. So I keep clicking on it to see this stupid feature I don’t ever want to see.   I feel like this is an annoying attempt to get people to use this new inspire feature
Title: Terrible ux update

Content: The only flaw about this app, is the VERY VERY high prices on food, sweets, and snacks, and let’s say there was 3 items in the cart, it says there is 26.  But other than that, the app is absolutely phenomenal
Title: Amazing app

Content: I have hit numerous pages that do not allow me to return the page I was on before…they trap you in the checkout process.  The only way to reset is to completely close the app and restart from the main page.  Also, I hate the search bar location.  Please put it back at the top.
Title: Missing back buttons in the new update

Content: Really enjoyed the previous familiar UI/UX experience of the previous app. Please move the search bar back or have an option to toggle its position like safari. Bring back the more familiar layout of the previous version!! That old version I would give 5 stars but this new update is so backwards, the new layout is disorienting.
Title: Move the search bar back!! Terrible UX choice

Content: I’m not a fan of switching the search bar to the bottom. Ever since the update I can’t checkout unless I log in on my computer and I get errors whenever I try to add things to my cart. I hope this is remedied soon.
Title: Problems after update

Content: shipping options are given and when I find same day is available it is exciting but then add another item and the option is gone for same day. Makes no sense and is frustrating why shipping options change within minutes and previously had hours available to finalize order
Title: shipping

Content: This new lists design is TERRIBLE. if you can’t make it better please just bring back the old list page.  I don’t need random groups of lists. I just need to see all my lists and friends lists without having to swipe all the way I’ve to find “see all” buried. Terrible user experience with this update.
Title: Lists

Content: Latest update added a floating “add to cart” button.  Now when scrolling down the description of the product you can accidentally hit the button.    No one needs this button, it’s as annoying as a pop up ad.    This was obviously designed by one of those “works” from home programmers.  Get back in the office and stop breaking the app.
Title: Add to cart floater

Content: Any and everything I need and want I can find on this website. I can also get it fast too. I have only had to return a few items with no problem.
Title: Love it

Content: I’m not able to view the customer feedback after chatting with a customer service rep. I was able to do it previously but seems like an update has broken it. I’m not able to save the conversation or leave a review if the person has been helpful.
Title: Leaving Feedback is Gone

Content: My full search history doesn’t show up anymore when I click the search bar, It only shows the last 2 things I searched. sometimes I want to re-search something I previously searched without retyping it in again
Title: Search history gone

Content: Please add Seller sent the wrong item as a choice for when we need to do a return. Of the choices you currently provide the choices put the reason for the return on the buyer, and that’s not always the case.
Title: Needs choice in returns to say Seller sent wrong item.

Content: When you order one thing and get the opposite and it’s a food item? Returning is kind of ridiculous. Refunding for the inconvenience is the smart move. At least with Instacart I get a credit I can use when they mess up. So that’s where my future business will be over 5 frozen dinners which cost me a surprisingly exorbitant amount of money compared to a bag of frozen potatoes. 👎🏼
Title: No Reparations

Content: The app is constantly buggy, super slow, and crashes. This is not just a problem on a single device, but multiple devices. This is an app issue, and it’s been happening for more than a year now. It’s annoying, and for a multibillion dollar company, we should be able to expect a better quality app.
Title: Buggy and slow

Content: My order is always on time and quick. I never had any problem with returning or replacing anything.
Title: A

Content: It used to be working fine until maybe a month or 2 ago. For some listings it wouldn’t jump to reviews when clicked and it wouldn’t load reviews and the rest of the description of scrolled down. Disappointing.
Title: Doesn’t load reviews and some of the description

Content: Every time I click on to view something the screen will go white. it is very annoying especially when you find something in the feed and you click on it and then it does that and now you can’t find it again.
Title: Keeps going white screen

Content: From not loading to constant hard resets this app needs a lot of work. Not sure what’s going on but it’s been buggy for a while now. Makes my phone get hot and doesn’t work half the time. Company this big should have this worked out you’d think. Stick to the website for now until they fix all the issues.
Title: Major issues

Content: Random crashes and freezing largely due to the stupid video ads that automatically start when you open the app. Give the option to opt out of automatic loading of this crap. It’s killing both my battery and draining my data because I have to wait for the video to start and close before I can buy whatever it is I’m trying to get.
Title: A mess

Content: This app used to be great! Now when I search or click on an item, the page loads and a couple seconds later goes blank!  I have to exit and rerun the search or click on the item and try again… so annoying! Please fix soon!
Title: Fix the blank screen bug!!!

Content: Hello! Wanted to report potential bug. When I look at my wishlist and try to filter out purchases verses non purchased items, I am shown nothing. I’d like to be able to use this feature so I can see what has been purchased from my wishlists.
Title: WishList filter

Content: I got this app during quarantine and it is awesome! It’s my go to online shopping site or app! So easy to use with great prices! I would totally recommend this app to any online shoppers!
Title: Amazing app!

Content: Totally Awesome!!! So well organized compared to other mail order sites. I’m 85 years old and I love it that I can send gifts and buy on line for home delivery:)
Title: Review of your services

Content: The app has made it too easy for purchases, however I have noticed a decrease in prompt shipping, I am assuming it has to do with world logistical issues.
Title: Continuing ease of use.

Content: Fast delivery, easy return, everything in one place. My granddaughter puts what the kids want and I click and it gets delivered where I want them to go. Love it!!! Kathy
Title: Great and Easy

Content: In the middle of searching for products with iPhone the search screen goes white and everything disappears. You have to start your search over. This is very frustrating and now happens on almost every search with the last way iOS update. Please fix this bug/issue.
Title: App keeps freezing. Worse with latest iOS update.

Content: I appreciate the ease I have to ship items to one of three locations with a tap to switch to the intended location. it is a great feature
Title: Shipping

Content: Ever since the last update a couple days ago, I’ll be on an item page for a few seconds and then the screen goes white, forcing me to go back to the search and reload. It’s making it impossible to use the app.
Title: Most recent update makes the app nearly unusable

Content: Amazon’s free return pick up for the disabled is very accommodating for myself as well as others in my condition. I thank them for this very considerate ‘customer service’ consideration❣️ Still reigns!
Title: Queen

Content: Love amazons convenience free shopping during times like this not having to go grab simple items is the best and waiting a day is so convenient when your not in immediate need 👍
Title: Yay

Content: Plus great people to work with, no matter what kind of help you are looking for!
Title: Fabulous place to find everything you could ever need

Content: Often the page goes white and you can’t do anything but minimizing, after that the page reloads but control buttons don’t show up so you can’t navigate. You have to restart the app
Title: Latest version is buggy

Content: I rated a 4 stars coz i do not have prime but hopefully they change that system to free delivery for everyone even under 25 $ coz i just needed that phone cover right now i had to pay 5.99$ for shipping
Title: Reason for the 4 stars

Content: Easy to place orders and shipping is quick and efficient. Hate to go to the mall or stores in person. This way you don’t have to deal with rude people who don’t want to work.
Title: Easy ordering, quick delivery

Content: Dozens of choices at my fingertips. I know when my purchases will arrive and notified when they do. The staff are polite and go above and beyond to make sure your needs are met.  Mrs. Bigfoot
Title: Efficiency to perfection

Content: It is so convenient to swipe and purchase needed items for my family. Especially when it is delivered next day!
Title: Happy shopper

Content: Stop telling me “for a shortcut to orders click here next time” It is not a shortcut. It is the same amount of taps as the other way that I like to get to my orders and I prefer doing it that way. If you want to make a real shortcut then I would probably use it, but the pop up suggestion EVERY single time I don’t do it your way is really annoying.
Title: Stupid pop up suggestions

Content: I can buy items you could never find in regular stores and great prices. Latest hobby aquariums what a great selection four tanks and counting.
Title: The future is here

Content: Every time I close out of this app when listening to music, it causes my music to skip/pause for a second. This isn’t a one-off as I can replicate it every time. Why is this app affecting my iPhones music playback? Is it truly that much of a memory hog/bloated app? No other app does this so it is directly related to this app.
Title: Heavy Memory Usage?

Content: This site won’t remove what I’ve seen on here but, I mostly use it to see what squishmallows are up and ready to be bought so I personally love it
Title: My findings

Content: Love the 2-day shipping. Easy to find what you want to buy plus let’s you know when you will receive the merchandise.
Title: Reliable

Content: I can’t believe how fast the delivery is and no matter what I need to do-they make it easy. I’m getting too spoiled.
Title: Super reliable and they make everything easy

Content: I updated the app and it’s having all kinds of issues in my account. I’ve been a customer for over a year and it’s not showing any of my orders, and when I try to order something that I’ve ordered numerous times, it says it isn’t deliverable to my address, and I get a “shop on the app and save” message, while I am using the app. Very confused.
Title: Something seriously wrong

Content: I received the lesser version of an air filter that I ordered and returned it. They did not want to give me a refund claiming I did not return the item I ordered but I received a different version so how can I return that exact one? I had to call 4-5 times before being able to get a refund but this is ridiculous. I’ve never had a return like this or talked to so rudely
Title: Wrong item sent and no refund

Content: On other purchasing sites and apps I use the sort functions heavily. By price and by price + shipping are my favorites. By payment options would also be good. Speed of shipment. Sort options on this app are terrible to useless.
Title: Not enough ways sort

Content: It’s been great using this app it’s more easier than say the safari browser but sometimes it does freeze when I try to check on my orders
Title: Better than safari

Content: I usually get my orders on time or even earlier. I just hope that it still continues, with what’s been going on.
Title: Most convenient online store

Content: User experience would be better if there was an option to retain last filters used whenever search is adjusted.
Title: Filters

Content: I just love that I can go shopping and get what I’m looking for plus some delivered right to my door return is easy if you do not like what you get I just love it.
Title: Shopping

Content: Too easy to buy. Great tool for comparative shopping and getting what you need when you think of it.
Title: Danger too easy to spend $

Content: Items desired were not able to view or purchase. Just a helpful tip ;)
Title: Upon tapping on items interested in I was taken to a page that would say “uh on! there’s an error!

Content: Always takes care if there are any issues with an order A++++++
Title: Great customer service

Content: When I think of something to order, they always have it, and there are choices if appropriate, I love it, make my day!!
Title: Anything in the world

Content: It’s alright but the thing is, it doesn’t have things I want, their either on other sites, plus they won’t let me push continue when I want to buy something, it pops up that I can then they take it off, please fix this bug
Title: It’s ok

Content: I love that you can add your smile charity to the app now. App is easy to use and you don’t have to navigate clunky websites on your phone’s browser. Great job keeping it easy!
Title: Smile

Content: When I click on the luxury store link, nothing happens it will not go to any of the luxury stores, when you look at items for her less than 250, it takes you to a luxury homepage, but does not allow you to access the actual store.
Title: Update causes more problems than before

Content: Thank you! I was missing the option to see the orders that were still pending and it just re appeared as not yet shipped.
Title: Open orders is back!

Content: Best prices without going to other stores. Also, no standing in line with coupons and irate customers…
Title: Easy shopping

Content: The new app comes up in an iPhone format which is vertical instead of horizontal. You have to rotate the iPad to get it back in a horizontal format and you still can’t see any of the buttons on the right hand side. I finally gave up trying to use the app on my iPad and went back to using the online version because it works correctly.
Title: New upgraded app is garbage

Content: Easy to navigate and simple ways to access different things.
Title: User friendly

Content: Since the latest app update my iPad Pro 10.5 has not been able to run it properly in landscape mode. Definitely a bummer as I rarely use it that way. I’ve performed various soft/hard resets as well as app removal/installs without success. Anyone else having this issue?
Title: Latest update makes app not tablet friendly

Content: I use an iPad and since I did an update, the app constantly reverts to portrait mode as if it is an iphone but I want landscape mode.I have tried deleting the app and reinstalling but no matter what I do, it keeps going back to the wrong screen orientation and half the page is blank and I’m unable to scroll to the left. Please fix ASAP as it’s very frustrating !!
Title: New update Frustrating

Content: I don’t know what happened recently, but this app no longer works well on the iPad.  It wants to go to portrait mode even when the iPad is in landscape, and either way the bottom half of the app is blank.    It’s been this way for at least a week or two. I just updated the app and the problem is still there.  Please fix!
Title: iPad version not working properly

Content: The app prompted me to do an update so i did. Big mistake, don’t do it. Now when i go in the app it only has the top of the screen and the rest of my screen is just a blank white color. Scrolling up or down is completely annoying. Can’t really even use it. Please fix asap
Title: Don’t update the app if it asks you

Content: Yet another update that is terrible on iPad. Do you even test your product before releases? Latest blunders include:  1. Content stops around 70% of height. Giant empty space takes up last 30% of screen real estate. 2. Forces into portrait mode constantly. I use the iPad in landscape. 3. Always changing interactions and placement of buttons. The only thing consistent with this app is its lack of consistency. 4. The fact that you can pinch and zoom indicates the app is just a lazy wrapper for the website. Doesn’t always function like a real iOS app should. 5. Poorly optimized, even on latest hardware.
Title: Always buggy

Content: When I type something and pinch the slanted arrow on the right, beside the suggestions of what I have written so that the suggestion gets inside the search box, it does not work.
Title: Search bar not working as intended

Content: the new update puts every item a different size as you scroll, so you can't look at as many things at once and its mostly putting "amazons best choice" items HUGE while other items are random amounts of the screen. Gross update.
Title: New Update BLOWS

Content: Everything I have ordered and received exception of one item, has been working out for me . Thank you for how easy  it is to shop snd get what I want without looking all over the place.
Title: Overjoyed customer

Content: It’s an amazing app like obviously, but my only problem is the age rating it says 4+ but there are many nude phone cases, clothes, wraps it’s very inappropriate and not for the age rating that has been but on the app
Title: Um idk

Content: I always find what I want, and it’s delivered promptly and with care to my door within a day or two.
Title: Quality products and service

Content: Everything you need and great people to talk with when you do have a problem they fix it right away and i love it thanks very much.
Title: Amazing

Content: I bought a gift card for $100 and when try to redeem, said that was redeemed. I want to now Who, where, when and time that was redeemed. Thanks
Title: Gift card

Content: I love how fast they are. They compare prices between sellers. Which is always great for my budget. Also the variety of products they offer is amazing.
Title: Love them

Content: I entered the wrong shipping address for a gift to our daughter and found it simple to cancel, reorder and change to correct address. Simple.
Title: So easy to use

Content: They got everything and anything. And shipping is within 1-2 days… better than going into walmart or any other store.
Title: Can’t stop shopping

Content: I can’t use this to purchase items because the item pages don’t load and I keep getting sent back to the home screen. It’s only working for tracking the status of my previous orders. Every once in a while I will see a brief flash of ‘Still loading…’ before getting the home page again.
Title: Item pages don’t load

Content: I don’t know what happened with the update, but since the update, when I click on a product to look at it, it automatically takes me back to the hone screen. I’ve closed the app, tried looking at different items, several things, and nothing helps.  Please fix this so I can place my order.
Title: Can’t do anything after today’s update.

Content: Best place to shop. Even if it’s a little more expensive, amazon’s customer service is worth it and the return policy is worth it!!
Title: Best place to shop hands down

Content: 30 days for return policy is ridiculous. Most stores offer 60-90 days. The number of things I have gotten stuck with that I can’t use is very disappointing and I believe I’m going to start shopping elsewhere with a longer return window. When you are shopping online, it’s harder to make sure you are getting what you need.
Title: Awful return window

Content: Very quick delivery and decent customer service. Customer service personnel are very professional and almost always ready to help you
Title: Good

Content: Way better than going to a store to find out I have to order online anyway.
Title: Easy shopping

Content: Needs serious improvements to delivery timeframe & actual delivery times. App has said 1 stop away for over an hour and delivery vehicles location keeps changing. Why pay for prime when can never get the delivery time that’s supposed to be guaranteed with paying the extra money….
Title: Needs improvement

Content: I must say, as an older American I look for a younger face to help me out.  This time I didn’t need one ... your app was easy to use and simple to follow... what a pleasure.. and very rewarding...  thank you...
Title: Easy to Use

Content: App offers good products but trying to find exactly what im looking for without being bombarded by every single other product is difficult sometimes. Otherwise, when I do find what I need, everything else goes smoothly.
Title: Pretty good

Content: unfortunately the last update scrambled the app. there are so many bugs and glitches it's barely usable at times. this is used on a day today commercial account on an iPad. in order to use most of the buggy functions I have to switch back to a laptop.
Title: severely flawed, tons of bugs

Content: I do not like the fact that when you guys disabled accounts, your orders get held back. They should be able to still come because you are not able to get your money back. It gets me very mad because i order stuff for over $80+ and i won't be able to get them.
Title: disabled accounts

Content: Please allow user to remove purchase history. Period.
Title: Great app use it daily still would like this feature

Content: We’ll appreciate more upgrades like deleted items list
Title: We’ll appreciate more upgrades like deleted items list

Content: You’re a multi billion dollar company. I’m sure the top retailer in the world. You know about all these demand issues going on and you have the brains of geniuses working for you. Please implement a bot protection, lottery, pre order 1 per account, ect. There are so many ideas and you know scalpers are taking advantage. Make a change or you will start losing a lot of loyal customers that have been with you for years.
Title: High demand items fix it!

Content: You’ve made it harder to locate. I typed “return” in the search, you give me results for a stamper that says return to sender, I search “return and orders”, you give me bras and face masks 🤦🏼‍♂️ for something so simple you managed to mess it up so funny. Please just fix it. I need to return something. It’s easy to find on a laptop and computer to print, but I live in 2021 and left my fax number and pager back a couple decades ago. Get it together guys!
Title: Returns and orders

Content: I use it so much, even when I am not buying anything it's nice to look at prices of things and a lot of the time you can find better deals on things than you could in a store.  Edit:  The iPad app has a lot of problems.
Title: Best app i have.

Content: They literally can’t even get groceries to my house from a store less than 5 miles away. After 2 hours on the phone with customer service and being transferred to 10 different people including a cold transfer to a closed store I couldn’t even get an email confirmation that my order was canceled and refunded and was told I was being ridiculous for requesting that.
Title: The worst customer service on Earth

Content: This app is so terrible. I’ve had my account locked for around a year and a half now and every time I call customer support they tell me the same thing. Then I do what they tell me to do and I get an Email saying “they cannot verify my account belongs to me”. It’s been a constant struggle to even try to get my account back. If I could give it less than a star I would.
Title: Terrible

Content: This is my second year paying for prime membership the reason I got the service was for the 2 day delivery service and I just recently renew the service and I never have received a package in 2 days
Title: Packages never on time

Content: Don’t get me wrong it’s an ok application, however it defeats the purpose of having a prime account if your orders aren’t delivered on time or there is no heads up when there will be a delay.
Title: Unreliable

Content: The app is fantastic but all the other major apps I use have a dark mode which makes them much easier on the eyes. Adding this setting might increase shopping time in the app too. 🤷🏻‍♀️
Title: Would love to have dark mode option

Content: I tried to share product link with friends and family but there’s no share option. So I have to find the link on safari and then share it. It’s annoying.
Title: No share button

Content: Still needs the following features: -Dark mode -Cycle through product review photos without having to tap on “all reviews” -Purchase or add a whole list to the cart -filter by price range and discount percentage simultaneously
Title: Biggest company needs the best app

Content: When reordering an item after performing a search the “buy again” button takes me to a matrix of other items I have ordered in the past. From that spot I have to go to the cart and select “Proceed to checkout.” Then I get another screen with “Place your order.” Not a very efficient system.
Title: Getting worse with each update.

Content: App has always been fast. Recently the look of the app changed and it is very slow. Very slow. When I search for something, it only comes up in text form. No more pictures of the items.  I’ve tried reloading the app, but it still does the same thing.  Hopefully it’s just a temporary bug, but it’s completely useless as it stands now.
Title: What happened?

Content: Previously this app allowed you to read the reviews. Now it won’t let you. I always like to read the good and the bad reviews to decide if I want to purchase. I don’t understand why they removed this feature. Please bring this back!!! Otherwise the app is pretty good. If you bring back the reviews, I would give this app a better review.
Title: Can’t read reviews

Content: I made an error on one of my orders I accidentally ordered the item times two when in fact I really only needed one I have been trying for weeks through email to get aReturn label so that I can get it sent back but I can’t get anybody to answer my questions
Title: Difficulty with customer service

Content: I love how this company is very reliable and one of the things I bought was a blackhead vacuum which came way more earlier than expected which is a very wonderful thing. That is one of the reasons I love this app.
Title: My package

Content: Great that links from search results open in the app. I would like more specific filter options. Even simple options like materials, or sizes would be really convenient. I end up using eBay more often as a result.
Title: Handy, but...

Content: Two stars off: one for fake reviews and one for the newly changed interface with too much blocking screen.
Title: I use this a lot!

Content: Like most reviews before me, the layout of the app is atrocious. Too many features have been moved or changed just to make the app look like a Facebook clone. I don’t know who decided that the user interface needed an update but whoever did needs to be fired. If it isn’t broke then don’t fix it, and if your “improvements” are met with a lot of backlash then listen to your customers and go back.
Title: Terrible App Layout

Content: Awesome app, seamless experience as if you were shopping on their website via your Desktop/Laptop. Very User friendly.
Title: Phone App as smooth as shopping on their Website

Content: My account gets locked every time I make a purchase, except this last time, every time I try to log back in, it opens up the usual “enter billing details” and I do, but when I click “choose file” It erases everything I had typed in before, I can’t contact costumer service because it will not let me log back in. Very frustrating, 1 Star
Title: Will not let me log back in

Content: Are use this app all the time and I cannot stand that they ruined the search filtering! Perhaps you’re trying to be more intuitive, but your intuition on what we’re searching for is OFF!!! And when it’s off there’s no way to access the filter do you actually need which is extremely frustrating. I was not a fan of having to filter and filter and filter and filter but this is ridiculous!!!!
Title: ABSOLUTELY HATE THE NEW FILTERING!!!!!

Content: This app has everything you can think of and there is a lot of cool stuff this app is better than eBay 😊😊😊😊.
Title: Very nice app especially for unlimited shopping

Content: I love this app but knowing that I ordered so many times this time it just irritated me.. I was supposed to get my last package on the 30th now it’s supposed to be here today and yet come back from work nothing ... like what is going on and it’s supposed to get delivered from a company I used to work for smh
Title: Has some good times and some bad

Content: Why is the navigate back button out of reach on the top left??? My thumb can’t reach it, making it inconvenient and risks dropping my phone.  Account is at the bottom, very accessible but rarely used. Why??? Version after version with the same issue.
Title: Back button on top left? Crazy?

Content: This app stopped working on iOS versions which support 32-bit apps.  It now insists on taking you to the AppStore, where pressing Update waits for a long time and then reports failure.  (I also tried it on a newer iPad, but searching by barcode didn’t work.)
Title: Stopped working on good iOS versions

Content: I’ve had to make multiple accounts to try to order something and every single time it logs me out and I can never get back into my account I call for help no one ever helps me they just tell me will just use another email I am never ordering anything from them again for different accounts for problems each time I don’t understand what the issue and no one helps
Title: Horrible experience

Content: the new UI was there and then it went back to the old one, i liked the new one, is it coming back? this one is so outdated.
Title: what happened to the new look?

Content: Whether intentional or not the new update removed function. I liked to be able access the filter function and change it from the side where I also had more control over price, type and etc. now I don’t have that ability and it’s actually frustrating.
Title: New update caused loss of features

Content: So now we have a menu bar at the bottom that covers the bottom page. Well actually the bar is not completely at the bottom. But it might as well be because you can’t read the narrow strip of the page below the bar. The font on the menu is huge so you have to scroll to see much of it.  Too many bad ideas in this version. How do I revert back and wait for something better?
Title: Ugh

Content: The search bar used to be good but now, when I search for models in a specific train scale, like if I search “n scale monroe models,” it shows one correct product and then, WEIGHT SCALE, NOT MODEL TRAINS.
Title: Search Bar being Somewhat Useless

Content: Very helpful. And I really enjoy going on and shopping. It has everything I’ve needed so far and it’s very accurate. I think I would so recommend it to everyone! ❤️ Have a blessed day everyone!
Title: Helpful

Content: The app won’t open anymore. Load screen comes up for several seconds and then the app crashes. Please fix!!!!
Title: The app won’t open

Content: I can no longer copy the tracking number in the app. This is pretty crucial because I like to be able to track items through the carrier’s app, since they offer text alerts if something is delayed or when it’s been delivered. Please fix this!!! My sister is having same issue, so I know it’s not just me.
Title: No more copy of tracking info

Content: It used to be that you could click on the stars under ratings and find out why people liked or didn’t like a product.  Now all you get is the stars.  I don’t know if you are trying to make it more like when you are on the web site but. You took the easy to use app and made it more difficult.
Title: Friendly app made unfriendly

Content: To write a review it requires you to have made a purchase of 50$+ in the last 12 months. My old account was deleted and I don’t have any need for unnecessary spending at the moment. Really mad cause I got a digital clock with a wireless charging pad that basically doesn’t work unless it’s very particularly arranged. Wanted to warn people not to buy this product but it wouldn’t let me. This is a stupid guideline and I’m just upset right now.
Title: Stupid app

Content: I would report my technical issues via the app if it didn’t freeze when trying to do so. The app won’t allow me to do anything in the settings menu options of my acct. I have more than one acct and wanted to add another and switch between them. Can’t do this anymore. I’ve tried restarting iPad and uninstall & reinstall. Please fix.
Title: Buggy App

Content: Since I can’t find anything anywhere on the site, how do I send an email or something about getting money back on my prime membership since my prime eligible products I purchase are considered non-essential and take over a week to ship.  I pay for the prime service and I expect my 2 day shipping.  If you can’t ship in two days, then give me back my money I pay you!
Title: Prime eligible products take too long to ship

Content: I’m writing this review because the app was failing to open. After deleting and reinstalling the app on my iPhone, it solved the problem. I saw others were having the same issue so I wanted to share what worked for me
Title: Reinstall fixes app crashing

Content: I find it frustrating and hard on my eyes that the app doesn’t have dark mode, but the website does. Please fix this.
Title: Make Dark Mode

Content: Very user friendly.. You can always find what you are looking for and the customer service agents are always helpful and understanding of your situation. Thank you you for a great platform to buy and sell Jeff Besos 💪🏽
Title: Amazing app!!!

Content: Keep getting logged out and getting this error when trying to login
Title: Something went wrong

Content: There is no way to contact customer service if supposedly your package was delivered but you can’t find where the driver placed the package. No picture was sent showing the package delivered
Title: Customer service

Content: The share button has moved many times. But now it is not present on many items. I have had a books/clothing I wanted to share but the share button is gone. If I change size or format of the item the share button will occasionally appear. On iPhone 8 Plus and xr
Title: The share button is gone on many items.

Content: The app keeps signing me out randomly, even while I am browsing. On top of that, now it freezers up whenever I try to sign in, so I guess it’s completely useless now.   Prior to this, I was not thrilled that the drag-and-drop feature for the wish-lists was removed, but at least I could still use the app.   When a company has this much money and is this popular, the app should work and not be so rife with bugs.
Title: Bugs galore

Content: Ever since they updated the app I have to log in almost every time. I have allowed Face ID to help me but that only works when I want to log in to see my orders. When I try to look at the lightning deals I have set alerts for I have to keep logging in! It’s such a pain! I have tried the remember me and that I don’t need the OTP to log in on my phone but it doesn’t remember my selections! Please fix this!
Title: Horrible since the update

Content: Don’t like having to click next to get to more products. When you have a poor signal it can take a bit for the next page to load. Didn’t have that issue with the old endless scroll I want the old endless scroll back. Other than that it still seems to be the same app.
Title: Disappointing update

Content: For some reason, the app has been loading the page very slow. It says “still loading...”  App developer, please fix this glitch.
Title: Slow loading app

Content: From last few days it’s a consistent issue that while using and browsing it crashes in the middle of it and this thing is happening every time . It’s so annoying and not good at all. And at that moment I switch to the other website and order things from there. Try to resolve it as soon as possible.
Title: Crashes

Content: A recent update took away the ability to infinitely scroll. This worked really well for me since I live in an area with limited cell service. When I hit next page I have to wait for it to load. When it does load I get to look at, what, seven or eight choices and then I have to hit next page again and wait. Fix it or I’m leaving. I don’t have time for this.
Title: Hate Next Page, Bring Back Scrolling

Content: I can no longer scroll down the list of products endlessly, now I have to hit the next button.  If it’s a data thing can it be made an option? The whole point was for it to scroll without hitting buttons all the time.
Title: New update takes away list size

Content: I’ve had the app for a few years now and it’s always worked perfectly. I’m not sure what’s changed but nowadays I am constantly getting an error page and it’s very annoying 🙄 I can’t access anything and sometimes it takes hours for it to work again
Title: Error

Content: Need an option on the app so it doesn’t show items that will ship from China. Too hard to return and I have not had good luck with items from there. When I’m in a hurry finding items I don’t always look at this.
Title: Shipping from China

Content: App has been relatively crash for me the last several months.  Like the access to past orders and notification for packages ( unless it’s delivered via OnTrac, in which tracking is mostly useless).    I used to like browsing the lightning deals but now there’s a forced video infomercial - like those cheesy home shopping networks - that you cannot shut off (only mute).
Title: Ditch the infomercial

Content: Love the app. It's easy to buy things. The only thing I wish I could buy is downloadable books for my kindle. Will that change soon?
Title: Kindle purchasing

Content: So I love this app it’s great but for some reason when I go to save something to one of my lists it isn’t loading. I thought maybe it needed to be updated, updated it, still not working and really frustrating 🙃
Title: List problems

Content: There’s no way to enlarge the type in this app. I have to go back to Safari and look up the same item so I can enlarge the type and read it. Not a hard thing to do... Why don’t they either have a font size selection or the ability to enlarge certain type?
Title: Can’t enlarge type

Content: I like the app but I'd sure like to be able to manage textbook rentals and buy kindle books without having to go and pull up the desktop version separately.
Title: Missing some features from the desktop version

Content: I’ve updated the app already, but anytime I try to check the ratings and customer reviews for a product all of the reviews belong to another product. I was looking at headphones and reviews were about screen protectors and phone cases. It’s been frustrating.
Title: Reviews don’t match product

Content: I can’t get to the invoice page for each of my orders. Because I order for my mother, I need an invoice. I also need invoices for business purchases. In addition, I found the app frustrating overall. I will keep going to the site via safari on my phone, so I can access everything. Frustrating as well, but at least I can get what I need.
Title: Frustrating App

Content: I have been trying to login to my account for days. I have changed the password several times and I even get emails that say it’s successful. However, it still says my password is wrong when I try to log in. I would try to go to customer service but I apparently need to log in to get help which obviously I’m unable to do. It would be great to be able to know where my package is.
Title: Password Problems

Content: The new tray at the bottom is so annoying. I am constantly accidentally adding things to it. I have to hide the tray every time I open the app. Then if u barely hold down on something for too long it adds it to the tray. I am scrolling the page and accidentally add stuff all the time. I want it gone.
Title: Cannot stand the new tray

Content: Everything was fine then suddenly it started to send me my messages in Spanish, at first it was one or two but now they all are, I call customer services and they don’t know how to fixed and it won’t let me erase my email so I will not get more of this messages.
Title: This is not my language

Content: Started out to be a great app a few years back. With each release, the quality and usability of the app degrades. First the print label takes you to a screen where you can’t print. Then the navigation disappears. Can no longer discover new products or promotions to binge buying.  You will definitely decrease your iPad users revenue.
Title: Gets worse each release

Content: Not great. To download a book to a Kindle you need to use the website in a browser because this app doesn’t work. (I had to use the help section to figure out why it wasn’t working.) and as long as the app was on my phone, I couldn’t use a browser because it kept automatically opening the page in the app.
Title: Bad for Kindle Users

Content: Please fix this annoying bug. I can't order anything or check out certain account details without it asking for my password, then a pop up window saying something's wrong try again, then going back to square one! I haven't ordered stuff I need in months and forgot about a Christmas present I wanted to buy because of this. This is pretty ridiculous.
Title: Asks for password a million times

Content: Not sure where to go, this will be the 4th time in a row that my package will not arrive on the day promised because it’s either shipped to the wrong spot and then it has to backtrack or because it’s just “late” I don’t know what the heck is going on but I’m seriously thinking about taking business else where when it comes to ordering online. First two times I can handle, not four times in a row.
Title: App works fine, shipping not so much

Content: States no internet connection so I made sure it can connect to cellular data, but it still isn’t working. I’ve deleted and reinstalled app. All other apps and internet work
Title: App stopped working

Content: This app can’t get any better! I absolutely love everything you can but on here and I mean anything. It’s such a simple app to use and it can save you more money than actually going to the store.
Title: Simple yet excellent!

Content: If u ever need help with a glitch, it’s really hard to talk to a live person! And when u get a live one, they don’t speak good English & their annunciation is so bad u can’t understand a thing they say! After awhile I just give up. ANNOYING!
Title: ANNOYING!

Content: Over its good but with the latest update the app is stuck in portrait view on my iPad. Annoying because I use the iPad almost exclusively in landscape view.
Title: Latest update stuck in portrait mode.

Content: This really needs to change. I have saved items for future gifts, decorating ideas, etc., and can't scroll past the recently viewed items. If I was interested in the recently viewed items I would have saved them. Please fix this. Other than that I have no other issues with the app.
Title: Can't See Saved Items Quickly

Content: Since installing the latest update for iPad I’m unable to view any of the content in landscape mode. You have to view the content in portrait mode which makes the font very tiny and unreadable. I haver hand this problem with the app before and other apps work in landscape mode it’s not a settings issue.  Please the issue otherwise I will have no other option but to use safari.
Title: No landscape view for iPad

Content: It does what it should do. My biggest complaint is that it doesn’t have a dark mode feature. My eyes are sensitive to light so I use dark mode whenever possible.
Title: Not bad overall

Content: For whatever reason, when looking at reviews in the “See More Reviews” page, the top bar (back, home, drop down menu) will freeze.  Unable to go back to actually buy the item or compare further without closing the app.  So frustrating!
Title: Convenient, but...

Content: I am trying to get my Old Account Back I accidentally deleted It  while I was trying to delete an old app can I get my account back?
Title: My Account

Content: Honestly you can do better on the skip option on the prime app you… don’t worry I’ll skip back a few episode to make it right… unless you have a better idea. Thank you still doing okay tho appreciate it a little!!!
Title: Honestly

Content: I ordered a laptop off here. They called me the next day saying that they would come by 6’o clock, they never came. They claim that no one was home when I didn’t even hear my door bell ring. I was home all day long. Then the next day they say my order is out for delivery since 11 and now it’s 7:06.
Title: Delivery order coming late

Content: Why is search so bad?  Searching for something within a brand is nearly impossible.  There is no free form scrolling you keep needing to press next.  Switching countries is always an ordeal on an iPad, though it’s ok on an iPhone.  Much work is still needed.
Title: Poor search and difficult change of country

Content: I’m giving it 2 because I did get my 2 orders I ordered but I order a defused for my hair and I paid for it which was $32 and it keeps saying I gotta revise my card but my card is good and it changed the day it was supposed to arrive like it was supposed to arrive Tuesday then Wednesday then tomorrow Thursday now FRIDAY it’s unbelievable pls fix that
Title: I don’t understand

Content: This latest version changed the Lists view.    While the icon groupings of list items may eventually prove to be helpful.   Instead of the organized column of Lists at a glance, now we have to scroll and search through a row of icons to find the desired list?    The developer should be making things more user-friendly, not less simple and intuitive. This gives it an interactive feel of being disorganized.   Developers please put it back to:  <tap> Lists, <tap> list.   Versus the new:  <tap> Lists, scroll, scroll, scroll… where’s that list?
Title: List View

Content: Who thought it’s a good idea to use percentage and review score to replace review count and score?  Don’t try to smart design this. Percentage is not the same as total score / number of reviews.  You don’t understand that number of review is very important????? Bring the old review score display design back please!
Title: Bring back the review count please

Content: Why is there no option for writing a review directly from an order? Can’t find any way to do that which means I have to do it on the big computer, then send my pictures over… What am I missing? Write a review should be right up there with return items!
Title: Can’t write a review from an order

Content: When I try to slide over and look at different sizes or options, the whole image/page moves and I’m not able to. Not sure what happened in the last couple updates but dear God, developers, FIX THIS!!! I’m a loyal shopper and millions of us MUST be super annoyed and shopping LESS now!
Title: New bad design - developers need to fix!

Content: I’m always looking for new stuff and always refer back to my wish list or private list to do my purchases. With that said since the update I haven’t been able to look at both, when I click on my list it tells me an “error on our part”. So frustrating!!! Please fix this issue!!!!
Title: Can’t see my liked list or wish list

Content: Was glad to see the update today, however my problem and others as well still exists, keep getting uh oh something went wrong on our end for over a month! Deleted app reinstalled sign in out problem still there. Frustrated as I placed things in there and can’t get access to it.
Title: Wish list not available

Content: Rather annoying that I can’t manage my account with ease. For some reason it won’t let me log in or change things. It takes too long to load. There are also so many ads it makes me uncomfortable to even open the app so I opened a business account so I don’t have to get bombarded with ads every time I open the app.
Title: still loading…

Content: I really like using this app to do any type of shopping or getting gifts & it’s the best thing to go to. Or even when I needed some new AirPods which were on sale. 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
Title: It’s amazing!!!

Content: Still giving the App one star but wish I could give it zero since the search bar is still at the bottom. I’ll be deleting the app and using the web page since at least it’s still at the top on there. Worthless app still the search bar gets fixed and moved back to the top.
Title: Search bar location.

Content: please move the search bar back to the top of the screen or at least give users the option to change it back to how it originally was
Title: Search Bar Location

Content: Each and every time you say the update is about providing easier access and an updated design. We'll, it hasn't ever provided me with anything of the sort, so why am I clicking on the update button? Please give me a reason to update, because at this point I'm just assuming updates are just another way to amass data...
Title: I'd like to know what updates include

Content: I absolutely hate the search bar pinned to the bottom of the new app update. Please give the customer the option to move the search bar to the top or the bottom of the screen.
Title: Hate search bar pinned to the bottom!!

Content: Please please offer dark mode capabilities for contrast.  The font and writing is so dim and hard to make out for someone with low vision.  It will significantly help to navigate and read descriptions.   The only place I see contrast is in the video reviews of products.
Title: No Accessibility features for Low Vision

Content: Search bar at bottom of page is annoying and takes up space to view items, leaving less screen area to scan. I hate it. View is skewed with thumbs in way while trying to type information into search bar. It needs to be on top of page, in clear view.
Title: Search bar moved

Content: I hate the search bar being at the bottom.  Certainly, some people like it.  Why make everyone use this interface? To me it makes the experience less enjoyable.  I’m not excited to use the app, but rather it irritates me to have to navigate it now.    We’ll be buying less, since it’s a pain in the rear.
Title: Let us move the search bar to the top if we want

Content: I absolutely cannot stand having the search bar forced to the bottom. I hated when apple made this the default and changed it immediately. I also don’t have any need to have what my default shipping address is as a drop down at the top of the screen. I rarely will leave a review but this re-design of the UI is so bad to me personally I felt I had to.
Title: UI Updates

Content: There was no reason to change the location of the search bar. It doesn’t feel natural at the bottom. There should be the option to set where you want it the same way you can with safari.
Title: Some one thought they were clever.

Content: It is annoying and so out of place at the bottom. It makes zero sense to put it there when everything else like filters and such are still at the top. PLEASE put it back at the top!
Title: PLEASE put the search bar back at the top!

Content: I had all of my wishlists organized in a certain fashion. You took that away and now organize them FOR me. Your recommended category may not be the same as mine, and now everything gets saved into my Dining Room wishlist. Give me back my control over how I keep my lists organized.
Title: Bring Back Wishlists MY Way

Content: It’s usually a good app. I like sorting my stuff but anytime I try to move an item from liked items to another list and it says error. I updated to see if that helped but it didn’t bruh. I tried to remove my sisters christmas list from my list of lists (lol) and it didn’t work either. PLEASE FIX UR APP SENPAI BEZOS😫
Title: FIX UR APP.

Content: For weeks now, and including the latest update, tracking through the app does not work. I must go to the website directly to see where my package is. Very annoying. Please fix.
Title: Tracking not working

Content: I buy items per say I bought something what they do they let you check out (might be only me) but it will sign me out after I order something and I have already payed for it and it has done it to me 3 times out of about 200$ or more and I never got my money back eBay is better by far honestly but go about this hover you want to
Title: All around garbage

Content: This app gets worse each time they update it. The latest update makes my watchlist unusable. When you choose to view your watchlist for upcoming items, it gives you a very brief glimpse of your watchlist then defaults to to the All Deals category. Just the latest example of the lack of skill, oversight or accountability these app developers have..
Title: App Team Needs to Go

Content: After this last update, things have been very wonky in the app. Has tremendous trouble loading pages, Freezes up. Hoping this gets fixed because it makes me not wanna use it.
Title: Usually good but latest update is very wonky

Content: I can no longer track active orders on the IPad but it works fine on the Samsung. The only message that comes up is sorry, a problem has been detected, we are working on a fix to it. (CS11). Trying to find a way to get a hold of tech support on the app is impossible.
Title: Impossible to find tech support

Content: Waste of cash, there’s no difference in how long it ships, if anything it’ll take longer. They claim 1-2 day shipping but even when I placed an order they told me 5 days when it was only a few cities away and then it got delayed two days. Idk wth they were talking about. This isn’t my first altercation with this. Don’t spend money on any membership they offer
Title: Prime membership

Content: Under orders and returns I’d like to see at a minimum a filter that allows you to see only the items you’ve started a refund for. Or a button that brings you to a separate page for your started refunds
Title: I would really like a separate return hub.

Content: Fast, competitive and functional. Makes getting what you need quick, so you can live better.
Title: Fast

Content: I have ordered some led light from them and the packaging they came in was messed up, then i opened the box and the lights were used. The I ordered a bath and body works set for Christmas and it was the wrong set they said I couldn’t return it even though I didn’t use it. It was a complete waste of money and I couldn’t do anything about it.
Title: they never get my order right.

Content: Okay over all the app is great i just hate how i have to sign back in every time i buy too much stuff, it gets really annoying because i love to buy everything i see😔
Title: Let me buy everything i see without getting signed out😔

Content: Constant issues with the app it tells the delivery person I’m across the street for some reason so I have to go outside to get it an multiple times they left my package infront of someone else door an I have to figure out which apartment it is before someone steels it an they have my number bc I’ve had them call me before but it’s like 50 50 if ur gonna get ur package so good luck
Title: Delivery

Content: So me and my dad ordered a ammo can to hide for a geocache, the mail man came 2 times and none with my package in it! Then the UPS driver saw the open sign off so left and there were people in here too! So we got a notification saying that there was a problem!
Title: Messed up

Content: I have been locked out of my account twice in the past week and it won’t let me reset password or anything. I’ve contacted customer support and they just said to make a new account, which I did. Customer service is really hard to get through, and to be honest it’s not worth using the app if I have to make a new account every week
Title: Locked out

Content: With this newest update, I have to cover half the screen when scrolling and look only at the listing title on the right hand side.   I know your advertisers matter more than your customer’s comfort, health, and welfare. It couldn’t be more obvious since I can’t toggle this feature off. These constant reminders of my irrelevance are just wearing me down.
Title: Autoplay videos making me dizzy and sick.

Content: Beware you can accidentally delete your account when you mean to delete your Audible account and there is no way to get your account back, or make any returns on previous purchases & they cancel all of your pending orders. Customer service was not helpful whatsoever even though I called less than an hour after this happened.
Title: Beware

Content: The app was good for Shipping and delivery notifications. But the last few updates has made me think it’s time to uninstall. They are forcing auto play ads into the app that are sucking up bandwidth and taking over the audio on your phone. I’m already shopping stop trying to push ads to me that override my phone.
Title: Getting worse with every update

Content: Has anyone else been getting used or roughed up products for the price high quality/new items. I thought the first couple of times it was a mistake but lately each product looks like it’s been either sitting in the warehouse for months collecting dust or was completely used and poorly repackaged sold for the same exact price
Title: Quality

Content: No longer shows used prices in watch lists. Notes in watch lists aren’t updatable, it won’t keep your older notes. No idea what it added, but it must not have been anything too exciting. Definitely like the last version better.
Title: Latest update added some bugs, great…

Content: The text is so small, I need glasses to use this app with its micro text.  Trying to see reviews requires going in a circuitous route for all reviews.   The background is light colored, another reason  the  text is so difficult to read on the mobile app.
Title: Not for the sight impaired.

Content: Never had issues with deliveries! Ever! All of a sudden items are being lost, my delivery dates keep getting pushed! I had ordered something that said I would have it the same day (Sunday), now it shows 2 more days! But when it comes to a refund it takes a whole week!! Get it together! Stop giving estimated deliveries if you have NO CLUE!!!
Title: Delivery is starting to be horrible!

Content: Is there a way I can warn my Delivery person literally follow the instructions because I have nosy neighbors and acting like it’s me and stealing my orders   I literally put back porch and literally was in the downstairs porch
Title: Help

Content: Please add a quick add to wishlist feature on products while i’m scrolling, instead of having to click on the item, scroll, add to specific list, and then back out.
Title: Wishlist

Content: Like the timely shipping and are extremely professional. Have not had a lost or any issue with orders.
Title: Quick, timely and efficient

Content: Most everything I would need, ya’ll have it!! Not exactly what I’m looking for just return it!! NO HASSLE!  and credited to your account. Again, NO HASSLE, No questions asked!    That’s a great business!   THANKS!
Title: Products!

Content: 1. constantly goes blank - using any features like look inside book, or even just click on item you want to see will result BLANK PAGE 2. Unable to swipe back and forth while viewing photos from reviewers. Photos from same person, yes, but in order to see photo from different person, you have to go back out and in again, click on specific one instead of just swiping  3. Most of the time, you can’t even read reviews by clicking on reviews, you just have to scroll through the whole page to bottom manually because clicking on Reviews does NOTHING.  MAKE YOUR APP USABLE!
Title: Close to useless on ipad

Content: I like the website . the delivery person just to deliver to my apt door now just they dropped in the lobby in my building and any one easily can take my package. Not even notified me ringing my bell or something .Im a prime member very disappointed ☹️.
Title: Problems with delivery person not follow my directions

Content: I wouldn’t know what to do without it anymore. Like what is going outside anymore. Why put yourself in harms way, just get the app and live your best life in the comfort of your home.
Title: Love it

Content: What happened to kindle. You can download a sample but you cannot purchase the entire book. Why?  Please explain. Thank You.
Title: Kindle?

Content: Shopping for me as a grandma is great. When I place my order. I’m done shopping. Don’t have to drive to a store and hope they have what I’m looking for!
Title: Shopping Made Easy

Content: They took my money but canceled my items and said the payment was declined. Then proceeded to just tell me that I had to call my bank and wait for them to fix it. If you don’t like your job maybe you should not be there! They get one star because I can’t give them zero and give people a heads up this might happen to them.
Title: Pretty sure this is illegal!!!

Content: Latest update introduced a bug. At random times while browsing or reading an item description, the screen goes white or blank. All you can do is go back to the last screen. The item you were viewing is gone so you have to search again. Annoying bug which should be fixed.
Title: Screen goes blank

Content: Recent updates have caused it to where when I search, the results will turn to a blank white page and have to redo the entire search. Other than this issue, app is fine
Title: Blank search results screen
