Content: I accidentally created more than one account and needed to combine them so my books all appeared on my Kindle. Took over 20 minutes to figure out the website to get to chat. I still haven’t been able to combine them due to running out of time. Disappointed.
Title: Chat and customer help

Content: I do not Ike shopping and looking around for an item I need.  I just type in what I am looking for and my selection comes up.
Title: Always find what I need.

Content: I wish there was still free shipping on all items like there used to. Some things still have it and it really made me want to order something I needed but now I’m more likely to check Walmart first.
Title: Miss free shipping

Content: Haters this app is amazing your saying it’s bad for the littlest things so that’s really hurting the owners feelings so I think if you don’t like it the. Just don’t use it instead of hurting the owners feelings  and have a great day
Title: This IS FOR ALL THE HATERS

Content: Latest updates consistently gets stuck at still loading when clicking into pictures or videos of a product. Have to completely close the app and reopen. Then when you repeat same process it gets stuck again at “Still Loading”
Title: Still Loading…

Content: Starting yesterday the app randomly started messaging notifications me in Spanish, which would be fine, if I knew Spanish. I’ve attempted to find a setting where this can be changed, but no luck yet. So now I have no idea what I’m getting.
Title: App switched languages on me

Content: I’ve been very cautious about ordering things off the internet.  But…. I’ve found exactly what I want, and after placing a number of orders now, I’ve been very satisfied!
Title: Nana🥰!!!

Content: I’ve already a ordered a laptop gaming before , and you didn’t have . And asked again . I hope you have the request . Thanks
Title: Plaise

Content: Gives the option to send cards instead of having to guess at what gift will be welcomed by recipient
Title: Helpful

Content: I ordered a crib mattress for my daughter. Everything was fantastic. Arrived on time and all. I was going to write a good review but apparently I don’t meet requirements to leave a review?! This is pathetic. Why have your customers meet certain requirements for reviews?🧐🤨 I just wanted to give a good review and came across that. SMDH🤦🏻‍♀️
Title: Writing reviews

Content: I can’t always make it to a store because I work so much so this is a perfect alternative for easy shopping
Title: Love how convenient it is to shop

Content: Always have what I am looking for never have to chase around to make a purchase. Never missed a delivery date in all the years I used the app.
Title: Best app.

Content: Thank you so much for doing a great job out there for me for everything you do thank you so much keep up the good work
Title: For all the products

Content: I always find it impossible to locate the share button on the application itself.  It would be great to make it easier for us to share links with friends and family.
Title: Please add a larger share button

Content: For some reason I can’t login to my prime video account. It says my password is incorrect even though it’s the same password for my account and I just used that password to place an order. I wish customer service was easier to reach when things like this happen. I can’t seem to get in touch with a human to help me sort this out.
Title: Logged out of prime

Content: It’s a pleasure to use we have confidence to buy what we want and get the quality we want with great customer service if there’s any issues
Title: It’s a pleasure

Content: Delivery times are rarely accurate. I would appreciate more accurate delivery times, as sometimes I need something by a certain date. If I cannot get it delivered by that date, they I might be able to go out and buy it locally.
Title: Delivery Times

Content: Occasionally I get my order, but more often than not they deliver to my neighbor or not at all and just mark it as delivered. The delivery guy has stopped taking photos of the deliveries as well so I can’t even track what door it was placed at.
Title: Sometimes I Get My Order

Content: Accountability, short hold times etc. very pleased
Title: Great shopping and great customer service. Thousands of items purchased over 5 years!

Content: Great stuff. Just wondering why I still pay the prime membership but have to wait a week to get my stuff. When I dined up it was for two day shipping.
Title: No prime 2 day shipping

Content: It will not let me close review photos when I tap on them from the main product page. On my iPhone app. Only way to clear it is to completely close the app. Then I lose the product I was viewing. Please fix.
Title: Photo review bug

Content: Is anyone else noticing that the shipping isn’t what it used to be. You put stuff in your cart because it says one day free shipping, pay for it only to get a notice the next day saying really it’s going to be two additional days and you can’t cancel. Why  exactly am I paying for prime⁉️ Maybe Besos needs to stay out of space and get back to working on his billion dollars companies promise🙄
Title: Shipping

Content: After the last update, the app lags hard.  I have to press any button several times.  To swipe through pictures of an item it won’t swipe, or it takes 3 tries to swipe the pictures and then it goes crazy and swipes through all of them.  (iPhone)
Title: What happened

Content: Every time I go to “Buy Now” button, it ends up showing up the price for my entire cart instead of the individual item. Only way out if it is if in order something through the “Buy it Again” section.
Title: This app makes the “Buy Now” feature unusable

Content: When reading reviews, if you click on a customer picture of video the X doesn’t work to close it. You have to quit the whole app and lose your place. Please fix this!!
Title: Can’t close pictures and videos

Content: I love the app but there is a glitch right now that started about three days ago. I’m not able to add or delete from my cart or adjust sizes. Help
Title: Issue

Content: Make the “Log Out” option easier to find.  UI needs to be improved to access personal shopper, messages, lists etc…  I found it’s easier to just delete the app and go straight to the internet browser.
Title: App needs work

Content: The update to this app is horrible. I don’t yet see how it improves the user experience at all. Difficult to navigate, SOOOOOO many menu options. Not to mention the app design is weird and bland, does not stand out. But that’s just me being nit picky. Please simplify this insane shopping space!
Title: App functionality has gone way down.

Content: Wish the buttons didn’t move when the upgrade happened and that the app would let me see picture reviews.
Title: Satisfied

Content: This app WAS amazing. The new design is hard to follow and it’s now so hard to find things! It’s like the developers tried to cram every possible thing into each screen. Very poorly designed and frustrating to navigate.
Title: Ugh… Why change a good thing?

Content: When I search for parts I hate being suggested things that have nothing to do with my project. You think giving me everything for my project at once helps. It doesn’t it only adds to my stress
Title: Too much junk added in searches

Content: Listen this company does not let me down even if they do the return process the resolution process is always nothing less of perfect. I love it here !!!!!
Title: Obsessed

Content: The latest update is not iPad user friendly. It opens in portrait mode, so I physically turn my iPad to portrait and back to landscape to get it the way I want. Then when I go to search another item or to checkout it flips to portrait again.  This is so frustrating AND annoying!  Is there a way to lock it in landscape mode for my iPad?
Title: Latest update does not work for iPad users

Content: Everything still works…but for some reason it keeps switching to portrait mode even though I have the orientation locked. Has been doing it for the last few versions it’s just very persistent now.
Title: Keeps switching to portrait

Content: Since the last update, I cannot add items to my wish list, the only option is to add to cart.  I’m trying to make my Christmas list so…. Please send out another update.  I’m using an iPad and have never had issues before.
Title: What is going on?

Content: I am a frequent customer and everything is always shipped on time and by a nice delivery person, which is a bonus.
Title: Great buying experience

Content: Not only is the bottom half of my screen white and blocked off when I open the app but it flips my screen to portrait every time I open it!  These things didn’t happen before - what the heck,is going on!  I started using safari again - I’m about to delete the app if this isn’t fixed in the next couple of days.  Annoying!
Title: New Update is not good!

Content: The new version won’t stay oriented one way or the other, keeps flipping while I’m trying to browse. Also have a huge white section at the bottom of the screen that disallows full viewing; can only see two and a half products at a time. I’d appreciate it if these issues would get fixed. I hate the new version.
Title: Old app view was better

Content: So many issues with this app. Two of the more annoying are the inability of the app to stay in landscape mode. No matter how many times you close & reopen it, it will always flip itself into portrait. The bigger issue is the lack of tracking. If I am tracking a package via iPad, I have to go to the mobile site. The app itself is useless for that.
Title: Awful.

Content: The site should add a day or two to the expected arrival date. That is when my orders have been getting here. Neither the expected arrival time nor the actual time are the one day service Prime said we would have.
Title: When late once it’s an accident…

Content: It’s been working great for months and months. Then today, everything is in a different place. For my convenience I assume. Oh yeah, and it won’t stay in landscape mode. Which of course is also super convenient for me as well.  Why do companies constantly have to change everything? Just leave it like it is. It’s not fresh and hip. It’s garbage.
Title: Why do you need to make it worse?

Content: Myself, and my two teenaged girls use you weekly if not more & always have prompt service!  Your drivers have been nothing but amazing & courteous !!
Title: Service

Content: I’m using this on an ipad and it works fairly fast.  A bit easier than website.  One problem is has is that when I view in landscape and click on pictures from reviews it goes to portrait mode after finished viewing the picture.  This is very annoying.
Title: faster than website but has problems

Content: This is a easy app to order and shop for anything you may be looking for easy check out and fast free shipping.
Title: Ordering

Content: I love prime and that I can order something quickly.   I HATE HATE HATE having to search and not being able to filter by country to buy U.S. products. The search feature reminds of digging through bins at a flea market, Walmart or at Ross. Messy and annoying.
Title: Love prime Hate search

Content: I just looked up something for a friend but could not find a way to email a link to the item. I’m sure I used to be able to do that. This is on an iPad Mini 5 with the latest version of iOS 14. I ended up doing a screen grab and sending that instead.
Title: What happened to sharing via email?

Content: I’ve used this app for years and it’s been fine - not great (tedious filtering process, etc) but there must have been an update and now the view of product photos is terrible. Please bring back the old layout!
Title: Not a fan of the new layout

Content: Amazon’s platform is efficient and comprehensive relative to its inventory offering of products! It is a key ingredient for our success - it allows us to be productive and get the job done! They go above and beyond!
Title: Above and beyond

Content: The shopping experience makes everything so easy - searches, reorders, returns, etc!  Job well done!!!
Title: Most user-friendly site

Content: I wrote a review.. it wasn’t and just stated I wouldn’t use again because I had sensitive skin.. they wouldn’t allow my review to be posted. They pick and choose when they will allow your feedback and that doesn’t really give an accurate viewpoint for shoppers. This is very disappointing.
Title: Don’t bother writing reviews.

Content: The app takes forever to load. Or not at all. Even after the update. Same thing
Title: App crashes

Content: Redeem points, maximize attention to your time at work or play and you get reviews and recommendations. What is there not to like?
Title: Practical shopping, safe, environmentally correct, excellent, polite staff and workers

Content: Love this place. Has hard to find items. It has need it fast but no one can find one. They got me out of some spots. Love the place
Title: Best, place to spend your paycheck

Content: Today I could not open items to check them out it booted me back to the Home Screen there’s maybe a problem please fix it or help me out because I checked to try to update my app but everything looks fine !!! Help please...
Title: Today

Content: Easy overall!  Offerings are well organized, returns are effortless, and everything I need is in one place.
Title: Easiest and most trustworthy online retailer that I have every dealt with!

Content: Needed few things without going out in heat and dealing with traffic. Picked out few things and now I can continue my day.
Title: Easy Shopping Great Deals

Content: Twice I have ordered from Whole Foods. The first time I ordered beer and a few other things. I got nothing. It was probably partly my fault as I did not that I had to be a Prime member. So I joined Prime and ordered a number of things including beer. The only thing I got was half a marionberry pie that with delivery charges, tip etc came to $16.  I am opting out of Prime and going back to Freddie’s for what I need or want. Jim Toncray
Title: Experience with Whole Foods and Prime

Content: Many options to buy and the products are of excellent quality
Title: Excellent

Content: You guys made it possible for people to buy things that you normally can’t get on the average platform , great prices , clean simple layout and “SUPERB” product list from vendors 👏🏾🙌🏾🧑🏾‍💻
Title: Game changer

Content: An item on your site should not be marked “Prime” if it will take more than 2 days for delivery. Some items I have pulled up tell you at the very end of the ordering process that it will arrive in one to two weeks. I think this practice is very deceiving.
Title: Prime items

Content: I have ordered with the lighting deal before and all of a sudden I can’t get free shipping, even though I have received it before. It’s like the more I order, the less I see free shipping. I don’t have a problem waiting for weeks to get free shipping, but now it’s not a option.
Title: Lightning deal

Content: The app needs similar search capabilities as the web app. The iPad app provides too many unrelated results to specific search terms.  • Filters are too limited • Selecting specific departments is also way too limited.
Title: Poor quality search

Content: Excellent App so far I haven’t had any problems everything that I’ve been looking for I was able to find keep up the good work.
Title: App

Content: Very happy with being able to order and receive my purchase in a timely manner
I’ve been very happy with the option of returning items that have not been up to my standards with no problems whatsoever
Title: Great Service

Content: Convienent. Downside: I upload my Gift card and it dosent allow me to use them. Still has faulty features, needs developing.
Title: Convenient but needs work

Content: I wish they could add a dark mode. Also I miss the old logo but I think it is good to make new designs based on the old.
Title: Always room for improvement

Content: Every time I search I found what I’m looking for! Is amazing the variety and great prices! If you add how fast they get the product to you, what else we can ask?! Love it!
Title: Great buys!

Content: Trusted merchants  dependable service with out leaving home
Title: Don’t go shopping @ places of business when you can virtually in YOUR own time!

Content: Pages load quickly. The search function picks up on Key words to help me find exactly what I need, quickly.
Title: So easy to navigate!!!

Content: You can only use this app on wifi - might as well use your computer. They took away convenience.
Title: Don’t bother

Content: all of these boomer are complaining about alot of Problems like the app is slow and they dont have the item they want and etc. SO SHUT THE F@&$ UP I HAD THE SAME PROBLEM AS WELL BUT YEARS LATER I GOT USE TO IT BECAUSE ALL COMPANIES ARE LIKE THAT AND IF THEY DONT HAVE THE ITEM YOU WANT   SEARCH👏OTHER👏APPS👏OR👏WEBSITE👏STUPID👏
Title: Shut up boomer and learn how to use it

Content: Cannot talk to a customer support person they can’t call me becuz of filter go round and round trying to set a new password. Think I may have been hacked. Nice stressful no help. WTH
Title: Customer review.

Content: I’m never the type of person to just hate something new, I usually go with the flow but I seriously dislike the changes.  I can no longer choose what type of recommendations I want which leaves me getting recommendations based off gifts I bought, the random thing my kid needed for a school project and that cleaning supply I buy once a year.  Bring back the old “Improve my recommendations “!
Title: Hate the latest changes

Content: I buy prime for the quick shipping but now it takes a week or two to get here, when it says it’ll ship in 2. Their customer service is horrible, they won’t let you cancel an order no matter if it hasn’t shipped or how late it is. I had to talk to 5 representatives and they still did not help with anything. Company is going down hill and I am canceling my membership. Not worth it anymore.
Title: Gone down hill

Content: The new design look is awful the new features are bad too
Title: Hate everything about the mew app including the new look

Content: It looks like a cardboard box. Who has designed this!? More importantly who has approved it! I will not have this on first screen for sure... which might result in less shopping... now I am not sure I should be mad that they are ruining a good brand with bad design or happy that I will be shopping less.
Title: Please change the app’s appearance

Content: You can’t scroll without it skipping and jumping to another part of the list. Very frustrating!
Title: Needs work

Content: I work an 9 to 10 hour day, 5 to 6 days a week. The company makes it easier to purchase what I need without loosing sleep time.
Title: Time Saved!

Content: Received my REAZEAL clear power duo , and am telling you it’s amazing not only is it great quality but excellent quantity ready for my second and many more reorders to come .. honestly the best I absolutely recommend💯👌
Title: Reazeal!!

Content: Still no option to filter shoes by size. I have a larger-than-average shoe size and it’s frustrating to search shoes in my size and be presented with pages of shoes that don’t fit until I give up. I’ve been hoping for this option for at least 5 years, but they have yet to deliver.
Title: No filters

Content: The boxes are so big, and they send multiple item orders in so many shipments each item in a box big enough to bounce around inside. And if you don’t have recycling near you , it means a trip to town to get rid of all those big boxes.
Title: Too many boxes

Content: They use the same sellers from eBay and it’s a pain to return stuff and then they decide to get political which alienates half of their shoppers it’s wrong and systematically wrong! I will go to Walmart from now on and it’s a sad day for me and my family! They are siding with the people that call someone that doesn’t agree with them racist/ nazi when we would be the first to stand with any person of any race against hate!
Title: Disappointed

Content: I can’t decide if the search engine in this app or the walmart app is the worst of what I use but dang it’s horrible. Most of the returned searches have zero in common with what you searched for and brings up a ton of junk. If you can find what you’re looking for then it’s not so bad, but it’s a crap shoot.
Title: Horrible search engine

Content: I’m using an iPad and for the life of me, I cannot comprehend why they would make the app work like the website. I used to love this app because it was so very easy to use. After the last update however, it’s the same as using the web version. WHY??? Not to mention the share button is nowhere to be found!!
Title: This app has gotten really bad.

Content: There is no continuity between the last design that had simple navigation to the present version. For example: routinely navigating to the orders tab was simple before. It takes more steps with no sense of layout. What a pain.  Update I am still unhappy with the layout. The icons mean absolutely nothing to us. I don’t understand how this is better honestly. It requires too much effort to navigate.
Title: Poor navigation

Content: The app can be glitchy. Sometimes when I hit the general search or order search, the iPad keyboard won’t show. I have to restart the app.  Also please add a filter for undelivered orders. Some vendors are taking longer and it would be easier to keep an eye on orders that take too long.  Thanks!
Title: Please add orders filter for undelivered packages

Content: When I try to scroll down my wish list, it keeps getting stuck and refuses to let me continue scrolling. This has been going on since a few updates ago. Since I use this feature regularly, it seriously diminishes the overall experience of the app. Please fix!
Title: Wish list glitch is super annoying

Content: I love being able to find and order everything I need and it’s delivered to my home. The convenience of that means the world to this busy single mom.
Title: My personal life saver/hero

Content: On the iPad, when you click on the ratings of a product it doesn’t do anything. You have scroll all the way down to view the ratings and comments.
Title: Ratings not working when clicked

Content: One suggestion I would like to make is for the option to get a push notification when an item in your cart changes price.
Title: Doesn’t let you look at lower prices

Content: I absolutely hate!! When you plug in an item you are shipping for and it pull duplicate items and non related items!! Can I just see what I want?!!
Title: Searching

Content: Need to move the shopping cart back to the top I’ve the shopping cart to the top please
Title: Need to move the shopping cart back to the top

Content: I love this app. But I don’t like the new updates. I liked when you can save the item to the wish list without having to open the item up. I don’t really like the new update, or the sectional columns.
I order often.  In several years I have only had one package lost them found delivered very late, and one package lost and never delivered.  Very reliable I love shopping online
Title: I order vetry often.

Content: Love the new look. Looks fresh, clean and modern and it also made things easier to spot for my account on what I’m following, what I bought and my account. Nice 👍🏼.
Title: New look

Content: I'm no longer able to open the app. This is very annoying as I cannot review my subscriptions nor orders.
Title: App no longer working

Content: I’ve been using this for years. The experience isn’t as good as the web site but at least it allowed for quick access on the go. Now, it’s requiring a finger print which a “required” finger print is against Apple store rules I believe. It won’t allow me to sign in now through the app even though I can sign in on desktop.
Title: Requires fingerprint now??

Content: Why isn’t this able to link me to paying my card? What can’t it allow me to search for a wishlist? Basic basic stuff.
Title: A Mess

Content: Unable to access my orders page and unable to checkout my order , so used webpage to do checkout.
Title: New app changes are worse

Content: Used to be able to copy & paste tracking information into my USPS or other competitor app, but that functionality left with the last update. The mobile website is more functional than this app on iPhone 11 Pro, which is unfortunate.
Title: One issue makes this app useless

Content: I like this app very much the problem is that it doesn’t have some things that I would like to buy and I can’t put in some coupons when I want to buy something but is actually pretty good.
Title: Products

Content: I hate that you have to constantly go to the next page to continue scrolling! I hate waiting for the page to load time after time. Bring back the endless scrolling. It makes shopping so much faster. I get frustrated and end up giving up and using Walmart. They have endless scrolling.
Title: Bring back scroll all

Content: Unable to sign-in or go home with latest update. On latest version of iOS and have rebooted, deleted and re-installed the app.
Title: App Update Didn’t work

Content: For some reason, latest updates  change order confirmation page to desktop mode and also touch to star ratings no longer takes users to ratings. Not sure these changes are intentional but I can assure you, they are not user friendly.
Title: Latest update, touch access to star ratings does not work.

Content: New updated UI is very plan and tacky. The top two bars: search bar and location bar are too plain and feels very trippy and the new floating navigation menu bar at the bottom of the screen sticks out like a sore thumb. I want a full screen scroll list because I don’t often use the home and cart buttons. This app is poorly designed; not sure what the team was thinking.
Title: Bring back the old design!

Content: I have had issues on My Orders page where it shows duplicates of my purchases, and they show that they are sending the duplicate items on different days. Might be a bug if the items I order change their shipping date, usually happens when it comes a day earlier than expected. Please fix so I know when to expect the true item coming, thank you!
Title: Issue with Orders page

Content: I had a problem with delivery but the driver immediately let me know what happened and how to fix it. When I called the women who helped (jailey....I’m not sure how to spell it) helped me and was so nice and positive. She deserves a raise 😂
Title: Customer service

Content: I buy a lot of stuff here but when I bought an album it didn’t come for 3 months and said there was nothing in my orders I think that should be fixed over all it’s a great app
Do not like the new format.  Browsing is now cumbersome and difficult. I will be much less likely to use it and will likely drop my prime membership.
Title: New format is terrible

Content: If you guys could implement Dark Mode, I‘m sure that all of the indecisive shoppers who spend a fair amount of time on your app/website would greatly appreciate the fact that it would be easier on their eyes.
Title: Amazing app, it’s just missing one thing

Content: When I buy a item it won’t show for tracking
Title: Items missing

Content: When it was my birthday  I wanted tobot Adventure X but I also wanted tobot qatoron too so I got qatoron But at 2020 I can’t find tobot  Adventure X in 2020 and 2019 which is bad The only tobot Adventure is Y can you please fix that Like adding back tobot  Adventure X can you also add tobot Adventure Z too please I am begging what a pleases
Title: It’s not that bad can you please fix the changes in the comment

Content: When you search for a specific manufacturer or item you receive ‘sponsored’ items that are irrelevant and you also receive items not even related.  Your search algorithm is terrible.  Forcing customers to use other providers that will provide what you searched for saving time and money. Just give us what we requested in the search!
Title: Search shows non related items and manufacturer

Content: I used to like the app, but they changed the shopping interface that has made it “simpler” and all it shows is large icons that take up the entire screen without all the detail and functionality that used to be there.  This is an AMAZINGLY bad shopping interface and experience and I am amazed this rollout got through whatever quality control screening they have
Title: HORRIBLE new interface

Content: The new search is confusing and inconvenient. This was obviously done for paid advertising. The search and filter format makes no sense.
Title: Horrible update

Content: The last two times I’ve called because my stuff hasn’t been delivered, I have received horrible customer service. My items not being delivered and a traumatic experience happening to me and support was not helpful at all. Over it. I will not be renewing my prime subscription. I was told I’d receive credit on my account for the aforementioned traumatic experience, but I never did. I am done.
Title: I would give zero stars if I could

Content: When there are price changes in your cart, it would be very helpful to tap the item and go to instead of having to go down the cart list to the item. The browser allows for this linkage. Just add it to the app. Thanks
Title: Good, but please add...

Content: I’ve noticed that everything on the app is EXTREMELY slow lately. I always seem to get “UH-OH Something went wrong on our end” error message.
Title: Slow, slow, slow

Content: Bought gifts for my girlfriend and she wont get anything bc when I “purchased”the items i went out shopping for everyone else. Then i didnt have money for the stuff for her bc it didnt fully purchase so now its the 23rd and she was supposed to get the stuff tomorrow. So thats just great!
Title: Takes too long to purchase

Content: Never fails. I go to sign and the app forgets my device and/or my password. I enter the information and it doesn't work. I have to reset my password and it doesn't recognize my device, email or phone number. If by some chance it does, the app doesn't send me an email to reset which then requires me to call someone to get it straightened out. This happens more than 6 times a year.
Title: Constantly forgetting my device

Content: Normally, this app works seamlessly. The last two days, however, have been enough to try the patience of a saint. It doesn’t let me sign in, cart empties itself, doesn’t recognize new password, flips back to previous screens when trying to re-sign in. Augh!!!!! I have deleted it and shall try again, but just in case others are having these problems, I post this now.
Title: Major malfunction this week

Content: Keeps logging me out and when I put my password back in, it just freezes and then I can’t do anything.  Come back a couple hours later and it has magically signed me back in again. Search through a few items and it kicks me back out again and I have to redo this whole fruitless process again. By far the worst it’s ever been and that’s saying a lot here recently
Title: Can’t sign in!!!

Content: It’s keeps asking me to revise my card payment which I have done several of times and keep delaying my order I’ve been waiting for 2 weeks as well bad service 🤯
Title: Bad service

Content: Customer service is rude and cant spell worth a dam. They transfer you from chats to phone calls and back again. Please improve your customer service representatives skills and training. They desperately need it. Is most of the work being outsourced? It shows
Title: Awful customer service

Content: It’s so easy to shop and find your favorite things in this app I can not stop finding things that are so useful and want all my kids love all the stuff on this app to
Title: Easiest way to shop

Content: Very user friendly and easy to use. I find it handy to be able to order things and track purchases from the app.
Title: Easy to use!

Content: i normally like this app and used to use it all the time to add things to my wish list, but since the whole ‘drag and drop’ feature is gone when it clearly used to say i could drag and drop an item into my list before hiding said list, i’ve opened it less and less. hopefully it returns because a lot of people are annoyed that it’s gone. please, please, PLEASE bring that feature back.

This frequently doesn't load pages in a reasonable amount of time. And often results in the “we couldn't find it” page coming up. How could you not find my cart? It does this no matter what wifi I use or even on data.
Title: App is slow, barely functions.

Content: Can not find the link for prime day at all. Supposed to clock on deals of the day and that option is not there. Not good right at the start of prime day.
Title: Deal of the day option is missing

Content: Great app. I’ve loved the convenience, except when the list menu keeps disappearing and there’s no way to get it back. Can’t click and drag item to list anymore. Favorite button disappears frequently. Still think it’s worth having, but best feature for me is all wonky.
Title: Fix list menu

Content: I’ve not had any problems or issues with this app until the most recent update. The fact that you have to click on an item to add it to your wish list is garbage. After I favorite an item and go back to the search page it ALWAYS loses my place in the search and have to start over from the top and it is so annoying
Title: Bring back drag and drop feature 😡

Content: I’ve had this problems since a few updates ago. When I type a product it brings me results of thing im not even intersted in buying. I can search them on the website and have no trouble. But if I type the same thing on the app it brings me useless results from unknown sellers.
Title: Show all kinds of products except what you want

Content: It’s funny that when you have a bad comment about a product Amezon don’t accept your comment. I order a product, that never showed up after two weeks. Even tho I did get my money back I feel like it was just fair to other customers that a leave a comment about the product. Don’t believe all the reviews they never accept the negative reviews about a product..
Title: Amezon don’t accept all comments

Content: I don’t know wether it only happens to me but whenever I order something that has to be shipped internationally the package is always lost then u get the refund after waiting for so long and then when u want to order the next time the price is increased and things that are internationally shipped are 5 times priced to the actual price still u don’t get the product this whole process is so annoying
Title: No good experience

Content: This app is the worse. False information on items. Tried purchasing items and I never received them but they took my money. Worse. App. Ever.
Title: Get EBay instead

Content: The prices are inappropriate, and I am paying for prime account everyday month even though the delivery time is 2 days.u can also get that with regular account membership , since there are funny deals , it’s offers Samsung S9 price 20% off as Black Friday deal , even u can get thats in official Samsung site  , the product could be more  accurate when you buy in official site  .lot of bad experience I have faced .
Title: In appropriate prices

Content: Since the update the format on the product page is cut off, making it pretty unusable on iPad. Going back to web page for Time being.
Title: Bad update

Content: Since the update installed this morning the app gives me beep-boom-beep loading message for a very long time seems to be having trouble loading anything from the home page to items even on WiFi
Title: New update

Content: After typing the item I’m looking for in the search field, I am sent to the home screen with no record of or reference to my search. I have to type the item in again for a second time in order for the app to generate my search results. This did not used to be an issue 👎🏼
Title: Major flaw in search feature

Content: The new update is horrible! When I search something I just want to scroll down and see what I was searching for not “inspired by my views” just let me look and also I pay for prime now every five items I have a sponsored by add why?? Please remove these features we had a great thing going.
Title: New update

Content: Lately it’s very hard to read the pages as everything that follows the main product description is crammed into a narrow,long column and squeezed all the way over to the right, leaving most of the screen a big white blank space. This results in having to scroll and scroll and scroll. Updating the app did not help.
Title: Amateurish web design

Content: Newest update is buggy on iPad, select an item, change the size or color, and boom add to cart and save for later buttons disappear. Want to read about an item full screen? Landscape view only, otherwise it's the right half of your screen. Used to be great, except it's never shown the customer images like the iPhone app does
Title: Buggy on iPad

Content: Since the latest update (Aug 7, 2018), the formatting on my iPad is wrong.  Everything is smashed on the left hand side of the screen.  It makes the app difficult to use.  Hopefully it will be fixed soon.  I wish there was an easy way to report problems like this other than public reviews.
Title: Latest update (Aug 2018) not formatted correctly

Content: I check this app first when looking for products. Like the barcode scan feature. Funny to me all the anger people have in these reviews. Thanks for continuing to improve the app.
Title: My go to

Content: Comments that they deem unfit for their reviews, will be subject to not being posted in their review sections. Tried to post a comment about a book, simply saying to forward this book to a friend, and spread the message. Even gave a little info about how good the shipping was, and condition the book was in which it came in. And, of course, my comment didn’t go through. Guess what book it was, a book on the NWO, and Illuminati secret societies.
Title: Violates your 1st amendment, freedom of speech.

Content: I use the ratings a lot. It's pretending when an item get hundreds/thousand of review over a short span and they are all 5 star but not verified purchase. I can see that in books but not merchandise. I'd like to sort the reviews by verified purchases. Very skeptical that review may be posted by a bot.  App is user friendly.
Title: Ratings on products

Content: This app needs one important feature added to it to be truly useful; the ability to save you preferences between sessions. What I mean is I do not want to search through 1000 Chinese listings to get to one local seller. Neither do I want to have
Title: It is a useful app but....

Content: Can you please fix the shopping car in the iPhone app. When yo pull down to view your cart, the app jumps over items and you miss them.  I don’t need recommendations in my cart.  Thx
Title: Shopping cart

Content: I’m not sure what is going on. I’m frustrated. I try to look at my previous orders or to check on my order history and the app freezes and then closes. Every. Single. Time. I have restarted my phone. I have checked my space to see if that is a problem. All it does is freezes and shut down. Someone needs to fix it
Title: Frustrating

Content: Right now I’m pretty disappointed I can’t access anything on my account through the app but as soon as I go through the safari it works. Please fix it or I’m going to delete it. It shows up an error any time I try to order anything or go into see my previous orders.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I use this app often. Since the latest update, when I am looking at an item. If I touch the back arrow, nothing happens. Most times nothing in the top toolbar works. Sometimes I can get to my cart. But not BACK. Like back to my search or list from viewing an item.  I usually have to force close the app. Then start my search again. Please fix!!!
Title: Frustrated

Content: I have never had a problem with this app. In fact, it was always great as far as I was concerned. Since the latest update today, however, it constantly freezes. You have to shut it down and reopen to get to another screen. Very annoying!
Title: Freezes

Content: During return, there is an option now to select multiple items to return but I can't get back to the original screen after I click he other items. Must close app completely to get to it again. Then I have to select each one separately. I want to Return them in one box. Not separate.
Title: Please fix return issues

Content: Every time I try to view my orders it says there is an error. Every time I try to checkout there is an error. Every time I try to change my list settings there is an error. But I can get on my laptop and do everything just fine. Fix this bug please it’s so inconvenient and renders the app completely useless.
Title: Would be great if it actually worked...

Content: Listen to your users.  Your order button does not work. Says there is a problem with your internet connection.  Really?????
Title: Ordering button not working

Content: Ever since the new iOS I can “sign in”. What I mean by that is it shows my photo at the top when I’m browsing but if I was to go purchase something is makes me put my password or fingerprint, then gives me “oops something went wrong”. So annoying. Let me know when it’s fixed, until then I’ll be using the website on safari I suppose.
Title: Bugs with the new iOS

Content: I am not sure if they changed the app settings, but cannot get online without Wi-Fi. I like the fact that you can get your prior order and order them again. Search functions are good but would be better if you could use the app over cellular.
Title: Can only use with WiFi

Content: The latest update has taking away the preview button from the cart. What I mean is when I’m checking my total of the items in my cart there used to be a tab that I hit and it shown me the shipping and handling also the estimated tax to be collected.
Title: Update stinks

Content: When you sort by price all of a sudden you go from 12,528 items to 13 items? It is really that hard to make your app show all of the items in order of price? How about letting us filter between prices. You know, min price... max price? Lots of other companies do it.
Title: Price searching

Content: Seriously you guys need to check out the glitch in the "Your Orders" tab. Every time I make a new purchase it disappears. So I go back and buy it again. I could be spending extra money and not know it because my purchases aren't showing up! And it's extremely frustrating and very aggravating.
Title: Um

Content: I use this almost daily both to investigate and buy. And given recent issues if authentic reviews, this one is real.
Title: For Real

Content: I love the app for finding items but there is a glitch that doesn't allow you to add a new shipping address which is so frustrating...you put in all the info...you say "use this address" but then it is no where to be found in the list of shopping addresses...ugh!!
Title: You can't add a new address :-/

Content: Five items are in my shopping cart. My credit card is good. Items appear to be in stock. When I try to purchase, I just get sent to the same delivery screen over and over again. Unable to complete the purchase. No error message, just an endless loop of back to the same shipping options screen.
Title: Can’t order with my iPhone

Content: The shipping takes so long and it’s not possible to cancel after they have already shipped item. I could do nothing but keep tracking my item for 10 days. I would Better choose expedited shipping options in eBay for free in future
Title: Worst shipping experience unless you are a prime member

Content: When you get your hands on something can be a deciding factor and your app stated delivery the same day then when bought to be delivered tomorrow what a farce
Title: Pier

Content: So I bought this costume for Halloween and I ordered a medium and they gave me a small. And plus it’s sooo expensive for everything . I prefer Temu idc if it steals my information I just care about the price . Now I have to order it again and I have to return it.
Title: They gave me the wrong package

Content: Very aggressive delivery service. I won’t buy anything that can’t be delivered to a locker. If you are not home, they call your phone incessantly and bother your neighbors to receive the package on your behalf. There is no opportunity to have it delivered to a physical location for pick up or another day like a traditional shipping company.
Title: Shameful delivery service

Content: Why is an act of God to find My Subscriptions…  Should be #2 in my shortcuts, right behind My Orders..  And why when I find an item, it says same day delivery, and i Buy Now does it default to a 3 day later delivery instead of today, when I needed it?!   Bunch of bait and switch happening.
Title: Upsetting and frustrating bait and switch

Content: The most recent update has made the user experience terrible, it’s really hard to navigate to speak to customer service and the search bar being on bottom is extremely annoying. Literally hate this version of the app, hoping for a change in the near future
Title: The latest update is awful

Content: I have a nonprofit that I order for so I have tax exempt on my account. The app used to have a button to remove that tax exemption so I could personally order however someone removed that so half the orders I have to wait and order from my computer… frustrating. Do they test stuff? How was it removed?
Title: Can’t Remove Tax Exemption

Content: This is a great app with amazing overall performance although it could use a section on the Home Screen for recommended items
Title: Good but needs improvement

Content: Can you please move search bar back to the top or give the option of choosing search bar location (bottom or top).   Thank you, James
Title: Search bar

Content: But I don’t like having to change the delivery date for free shipping.  I also hate trying to place an order without subscribing to monthly deliveries.  These things are deceptive and not good business!
Title: Mostly great!

Content: Why would you move the search bar??? And the back button!!! This last update was just stupid… if you need to bug fix that’s fine just don’t make us hunt for common functions. Just take my money and send me stuff stop trying to redesign a working UI for the sake of making people think something is better
Title: Stop moving stuff

Content: This site has everything need, and has great  quantity of their productcts to Consumers. We have nothing  but have bought great items…………………"………….THANK YOU I.                                                               VALERIE VALLELY
Title: Everything I need!

Content: 10 out of 5 I love the staff named Kimmy that helped me out in a hard situation I loved the help and support I got  she was so kind and nice also very patient with me she deserves a raise tor being very genuine and kind. 😊😊😊❤️❤️❤️
Title: Wonderful staff

Content: Loved the app until they moved the search bar from the top to the bottom. No directions how to change and never received notice or request for our opinion before the change was made.  Too congested with it in the bottom - please change it back
Title: Review

Content: the search at the bottom is terrible not to mention if i put anything to subscribe and save there no longer is a back button to continue shopping within my same filters and list so i would need to start all over again. SUPER annoying and not liking this at all
Title: really dislike the new app layout

Content: If you are experimenting with the location of the search bar, give us an option in the app settings to move it back to the top.   It’s stupid at the bottom. Seriously. Stop it.
Title: Search bar at the bottom? No!

Content: It’s so annoying that the new update has the search bar at the bottom! When you scroll down you accidentally click the search bar and have to retype your search. Who is the genius that made that?! Nobody likes it! Put it back!
Title: Hate bottom search bar!

Content: We used to be able to click the product from reviews and shop for it. Now if you click on it, it navigates you to just the review w/o the product. How can we purchase the product being reviewed if we can’t even see it? Smh this makes no sense. Please bring this feature back as it is very essential. Thanks!!
Title: Updates with Reviews

Content: Ok I lied! this app is amazing it helps makes it to easy for me to buy stuff. it has helped me avoid going to the big box stores that have blue and yellow color scheme.
Title: I hate this app…

Content: When I try to buy stuff it won’t let me because it asks me for my address and I click on mine and it asks how will I pay and I click on my card and then I click continue and it asks continuously how will I pay and it won’t let my buy anything and it’s stealing my money by somehow letting random people use my card
Title: Stuck in a loop

Content: The new inspire button is a way to serve you video adds, it chews through cell data and there is no way to turn it off or disable it. None of the additions you made help. They make the shopping experience worse.
Title: The “Inspire button” is use less and chews through data

Content: Every time I try to change the settings of a wishlist, it never loads. Sometimes the app just crashes. I’ve updated the app, closed the app, restarted my iPad and other things. But aside from that, it’s fine
Title: List settings won’t work

Content: When trying to track packages, the iPad version gives cs11 errors. The iPhone does not nor does checking tracking using a web browser. I've contacted support and they suggested removing the app and reinstall. That worked once then it stopped working again. It used to work. Not sure what's happened
Title: Ipad version has problems

Content: When searching for a product on my mobile device I can only see one item at a time which is rather large in scale. For me to explore through the items I am doing endless scrolling. There is no option to change my view and now sponsored items are saturating my feed. Horrible update.
Title: Mobile app update is awful!!!

Content: I can’t seem to find an American worker to process anything. Not sure why but out of all 6 of my last orders I gotten only one which was a book. One order never showed up, and another was ‘refunded’ twice yet still never showed up. I recommend when called for help on missing packages to ask for a ‘us’ representative
Title: Wish it was better

Content: I was happy with no issues. All of a sudden I can’t get on to the app or report the issue because there is no internet connection. Not the case! I have an internet connection your app is not working! This is ridiculous as this is the only way for me to contact you. This needs to be fixed ASAP! I have items pending and need information.
Title: Unhappy

Content: Honestly trash algorithm. Same 15 products on an endless loop of regurgitated data. You’re better off using google to find a specific item. Unless you like scrolling thru 10,000+ search items. Jeff you gotta come down from that billionaire cloud and realize your product is spinning out of control. Spreading wildfires of cheap crap

Content: I would really like to see the app go back to the way it was when it just kept loading more results for your search instead of clicking to go to a new page of results thanks.
Title: App works great but...

Content: I used to love this app but now for some reason every time I leave it and coMe back it goes back to home screen instead of where I left off. I have checked my settings and only have maybe 2-3 apps open. It’s very frustrating.

Content: This app is a joke. I created an account ordered $2000 worth of stuff, my account was froze and I have been calling and trying to get help for over 2 weeks now. They keep telling me my account is froze that I have to wait over a month or two for it to be resolved. I am very upset by the customer service and very dissatisfacted with this company. Plan to contact the BBB and the postal service.
Title: Crap customer service

Content: input the password and it appears to take it and just stays there saying Still Loading for minutes on end.
Title: Authentication doesn't work

Content: Where is the drag and drop compare list at the bottom?
Title: Where is the drag and drop compare list at the bottom?

Content: Why add buttons and other features that slow down searches? Endless scrolling was easy; a constant stream of “next” buttons isn’t when you have hundreds of results. Also filters now open in a new page instead of a drop down box. Again, why more steps?  Bring back the simpler version. This one has me shopping elsewhere for now.
Title: More buttons, less simplicity

Content: I used to love how easy it was to scroll through the search results. Now you have to click next page every 10 items or so. Also you can only go back one page at a time, so on the 4th page when I wanted to go back to page 1, I had to click through 3 pages again. Why make searching harder than it needs to be? I finally just gave up.
Title: Awful update

Content: Can we go back to the old style when searching for a product. The continuous scrolling for a product was nice. The search tools don’t allow you to pick filters all at one time. It would be nice not to repeatedly click filter and add one at a time.
Title: New update

Content: What have the developers done to wish lists? There isn’t any way to save an item to any list other than the one you have set as the default at the time. I constantly have to reorganize my lists and go back and delete things off of lists that were set as the default at the time I was looking at an item.
Title: Lists are for the birds!

Content: My app keeps closing after a few seconds. None of my other apps are doing that and it was working a little bit ago.
Title: Trouble

Content: Since the update your app is ruined. I use the drag and drop feature al the time and now it’s gone! Replaced by clicking a heart and saving to whatever list you happen to be on, with no option to easily change items to other lists.  You have ruined a good thing and have made the app unusable for me until it is changed back.
Title: Bring back drag to save feature!!!

Content: It is amazing how long these roses last! I have had one of four for over a year and it is still looking like they bloomed yesterday:) just ordered another one for a friend and I know it will not disappoint;)

Content: I love the app my only problem is that whenever I select a item to learn more about it, it goes back to the top of the search results!!! Please fix this then I will give the app 5 stars! 😃

Content: Glad it could be updated for the new iPad pros. I removed a star for the incomplete rendering of the texts of item description in the carts on my iPad Pro 11. Example: “ IPad Pro 11 Inches - Space Grey 2018 Lates..” What I mean is the description is truncated until the item is opened.
Title: Finally, an update that fits the new iPad Pro

Content: The main app works great and I give it 5 stars but the widget isn’t working and says unable to load when I try to refresh it. Anyone else have this issue? Please help

Content: I’m not terribly impressed with this app- too often I search for an item and I see the words “This item is not available for purchase from this app.” I see this so often, I’ve stopped using the app. Why should I use it if I can’t make purchases from it??
Title: Not available for purchase

Content: The app is good but I would love for them to fix the glitch where it never moves things to “save for later” and just gives me an error message. I always have to go to the online site to do it and not the app. Very frustrating.

If any item has a color choice, etc - you cannot choose the options. The app does not open to the pop up window to see the options. So.... can’t use the app to order at all.

Content: This only started happening with the latest update. When I try to search, type in a search phrase, and click on any result, it goes back to the home page. This only happens on the first try; the second attempt always works.

Content: After the last iOS update if I tap a product’s picture to enlarge it, no problem, but when I tap on other product’s picture, the first picture pops up again.  I have to completely close the app to be able to look at another product’s picture. Other than that, it’s a good shopping app.

Content: The app has improved, and I am delighted with how easily you can navigate the app, just as well as the website.
Title: Improving

Content: Why can’t we organize product review categories by Recent/Top anymore?  The screen pauses after tapping Top Reviews and never allows us to select Recent Reviews. Lastly, the inability to completely remove the wishlist tray plastered on the bottom of the app is without a doubt ATROCIOUSLY AGGRAVATING!
Title: Too many unfixed bugs to count so I’ll name two!

Content: I have used for a couple of years with no issues ~~ but this latest update (today) the “Back” arrow/Button won’t back out of a product screen to the search list anymore. Have to close app completely and restart.... works well when it works, but this needs addressing ASAP. iOS 11.2.2 iPhone 8+
Title: Fail / Last Update Back Button

Content: Not terrible, but many things are just missing.  For example, if you try to update your 1-click settings, it takes you to a dead end.  No way to do it even though there’s an “Update Your 1-click settings” link.

Content: When things inevitably go wrong with my orders there is no easy way to navigate to customer service within the app. Some of my orders have not arrived on time and it is very difficult to figure out how to remedy the issue without customer service prompts showing up until after the order has been delivered. Not intuitive at all.
Title: FIX LACK OF CUSTOMER SERVICE PROMPTS

Content: So sad...new version is no allowing to rotate screen, is only matter or view preference. Personally is better wide screen for search products.  Wow has been fixed in less than 1 hours.

Content: The biggest problem with this app is the search engine. It’s absolutely useless. 90% of what it brings up does not match the search I put in.  You would think by now they would’ve fixed the search engine to be specific to the filters you put for the search. Unfortunately they haven’t.

Content: With the new update it is making my phone run very hot to the point it dims itself till it cools down. The app is very choppy when scrolling. Please make up your mind if the search is going to be at the top or bottom of the screen

It “tells “ you that you can pay annually or mske payments, but yet when you go to do it… it only gives you the option for annual payment and the customer rep says they can’t set it up for the monthly payment on their end. Whst a croc’
