Content: Shopping online is. Made easy  enough helping potential buyers choose the right products with confidence all the time
Title: Ronnie

Content: What the heck happened? I want the add to cart button back where it was. I do a lot on my ipad and I like the horizontal view. Now it flips to portrait. Hate that. Why do you have to take something that was working great and change it. What “great” mind was behind that one? I wont be using the app anymore. I really dont want to give it any stars, but to send my review I have to give 1
Title: Terrible update

Content: Newest iPad update is glitchy. I normally use my iPad in Landscape mode, but the app now opens in portrait mode by default and the screen redrawing fails when i tilt the iPad, rendering the app unusable unless I force quit and use in portrait mode. Please fix what was not broken before.
Title: Glitchy

Content: Do your drivers read the notes about deliveries? I’m going to say no, no they don’t. Why? Because they leave the packages everywhere but where I ask them to. I ask for them to be put inside the porch. Not next to it. Not at the other door. And most certainly not out in the rain.  I agree with the other reviewer. Give us a space to leave comments regarding the delivery. I always choose ‘didnt follow directions’ (or some similar); no ever reaches out and the next delivery is left wherever they want.   You guys used to be the best.. now you’re aligning with USPS.   Do better
Title: Delivery Issues

Content: Overall not a bad app. Since the update it won't let me add anything to my cart though. It's sort of a pain in the bum to have to sign into the desktop to shop when I have an app for that. Otherwise this app is what it is, and does what it's supposed to.
Title: Ok

Content: I don’t understand the app use to work fine now it lags takes forever to swipe , or when I tap something I have to use my browser then I made an order with my EBT and the next day didn’t recognize the payment and was acting me to revise it I don’t like it
Title: What type of update is this

Content: The last three updates have made the app barely usable. Nothing loads, lists don’t work, cart doesn’t update. I keep hoping the new updates will fix it, but they honestly just make it worse.
Title: Poor updates

Content: The app is good - does everything it’s suppose to do. Two big flaws: 1. Cannot share products on my iPad. Like if I want to text or email a product to another person. 2. No search function for the reviews.
Title: No Sharing on iPad

Content: I usually can get anything I need with a few touches on my phone screen in a few days! 😁
Title: Convenient Shopping

Content: Messages from sellers does not open in app when clicking on link in email.  Opens up webpage instead  and need to login. Cannot find Messages in app either
Title: Messages

Content: Because I am homebound due to my fourth stage cancer I do not know what I would do without this company. They are incredible. Their customer service is absolutely outstanding.
Title: Lifesaver

Content: Love having the ability to shop at the touch of my hand. Items arrive on time!
Title: Great Customer Service

Content: I love if I order something and complete payment and it’s delivery time is not suitable, I can cancel the order and find something that is.
Title: Delivery time

Content: Sooo I have been using this app for quite a long time now but now when I search something I press on it omg it just takes me back to the home page I updated the app and I press on something again and it still does the same thing!!!
Title: Ok sooo

Content: Perfect especially with prime they are so understanding about payments. I forget about it sometimes and they are very good. I feel like they are family
Title: Prime lover

Content: Just updated, app opens to main page then closes.
Title: Latest update crashes

Content: Need app support for glitchy app but the app support takes you to the app which just comes up and then immediately closes. Worn out from Prime Day?  Otherwise, I have loved the app!
Title: App Support Takes You to  Glitchy App

Content: please, I need a dark mode!!! I’m addicted to online shopping. Meaning , I’m awake all night on your Website … I can’t stand this bright light anymore. I beg you. Dark mode please !
Title: Dark Mode please

Content: I am lazy so I like not having to go to the store and look for the items, instead I could search it up. Also it is a good app to find ANYTHING, and I mean ANYTHING
Title: Why I gave 5 stars

Content: This app is easy to navigate. I am super happy with how simple it is to look for items and all the way to placing the order. One  improvementI would like to see is more accurate search results!
Title: Neat app design

Content: This is my go to store for literally everything I need from food to clothing, furniture pretty much anything you can think of! Try it! You’ll see!
Title: Superb

Content: Although the “searching” feature could be better, I eventually find what I am looking for.
Title: Makes shopping too easy

Content: Always quick, returns are easy and if there’s a problem it is easy to fix because of the awesome customer service!!!
Title: The best site ever

Content: Quick, easy love to make lists, love the recommendations and browsing history sometimes I can’t remember the name of something I browsed for and then there it is.
Title: Love the app

Content: I was trying to contact a customer service representative today and I put my number so they can call me, they never call me and it look almost impossible to actually speak with a human, so disappointed
Title: Customer Service

Content: I enjoy shopping here and get awesome deals. Love the subscribe & save. Makes my grocery shopping less hectic. The delivery system is great. They unloaded the boxes : ring doorbell & take a picture. Secure delivery. Thanks to EVERYONE !!! 😊👍💯🎈
Title: Love you

Content: Everything comes on time it’s only been a few packages that didn’t but overall amazing
Title: Amazing

Content: You guys should change the menu more often. Seriously. I don’t think it’s changed enough honestly. Actually, how about this: From now on, every update better have a new menu. If it doesn’t i’ll shop at walmart from now on.
Title: Dude…

Content: It might be dangerous to have this easy of a time shopping but it’s hard to beat
Title: Dangerous but extremely efficient

Content: In times like these people need a place to count on that you have to get some stuff you need
Title: A place you can count on

Content: Why does “this app” have a radio button in app settings to allow biometric sign in, but it doesn’t work.  I contacted customer service and they said it’s not supported.  It’s provided in my Prime Video on my iPad device, but not on this app.  Is that by design or a flaw/problem that needs fixed so I don’t have to enter my password when I log into this app. DLA
Title: Biometric Functionality

Content: Great way to find what your looking for, and you can look for things faster, app is better than wish🤣
Title: Love the app

Content: They always give me my merchandise on time and exactly on the date that it will arrive. There’s tons of stuff from home goods to outdoor, anything and everything!
Title: Awesome app

Content: They babble. Do not listen to customers. I had already been billed for item I cancelled bc they had wrong shipping address. I just wanted it sent to correct shipping address. She was unable to communicate how that can be done. Argues with me about my card not billed when it had been.
Title: Customer Service impossible to deal with

Content: Good service but not the type a principled organization I feel comfortable supporting  In the future I will look for American values
Title: If they were not Communistic I would stray with them

Content: Everything I got is amazing couldn’t ask for any better service and the notifications when package is shipped and delivered
Title: Best company ever

Content: App is great, would it be possible to interstate with dark mode so the brightness isn’t harsh on the eyes especially at night?
Title: Dark mode feature

Content: While I would rather support small businesses especially at this time, this is increasingly helpful during this extended time.
Title: Physically disabled

Content: Be nice if you would let us authenticate with email not just phone
Title: Be nice if you would let us authenticate with email not just phone

Content: It seems the search does not really pick up on all the terms, nor does it filter results to the terms. Also, the filtering capability is lacking. You cannot specify more than one brand nor can you filter to a price range...   eBay has much better filtering capability.
Title: Filter and search

Content: Never have a problem everything is smooth and easy
Title: Quick and clean

Content: Most of the time their deliveries are on time and the tracking is accurate but sometimes they say they can’t deliver package because they aren’t able to access the house but they have previously.
Title: Delivery

Content: They closed my account from nowhere and I lost my gift card money I tried to talk but they didn’t even help me
Title: They closed my account

Content: Have been a Prime Member for about ten years! Always have prompt deliveries and the customer service has always been amazing!!
Title: Always a great choice!!

Content: I am power chair limited and have to order all my food. So many routine foods aren’t available after I order it once.
Title: Lack of stock

Content: I understand that the app logo is updated to look like a box but on my screen it just looks dirty or perhaps the dark look of an app that’s currently updating. I know it’s silly but it looks ugly and I’m not leaving it on my screen to dirty it appearance (I’ll probably tuck it away in an app grouping).   Otherwise no issues with the app.
Title: New logo

Content: I like this iPhone app quite well  but I am unable to choose my smile charity on the iPad app.  Maybe due to the age of my iPad.  Idk.  Just seems like the apps should be the same across my IOS devices.
Title: Good App but iPad App needs updated

Content: 3 clicks and I’m done shopping ! Great service. A few delivery issues and product issues. Delivery - leave the packages in the same place each time.  Products - many inferior products  All in all a very satisfied customer. Great customer service.
Title: 3 clicks

Content: Love the easy way of shopping. The way you could subscribe and save more in the things I need in certain amount of time.
Title: Amazin

Content: There is a glitch when trying to view wish lists. I can’t scroll down and have to refresh until it works.  This is still ad issue and has been for like a year now. I think I’ll delete the app and stick with the desktop version.
Title: Pretty good

Content: My only problem is 90% of the goods are sold and shipped from China. This used to not be an issue. Now my feelings have changed on the matter and I wish there was a way to filter out anything but domestic results.
Title: Only 1 issue

Content: If you buy something from a gift card and return it it will deduct about half of it and if you bought a 10 dollar thing and return it it will take 5 dollars away from it so it will just take it from you even if you bought it 5 minutes ago
Title: It’s good but...

Content: I can never find log out button so no one else can use. Try to get help and you chat people don’t understand. 😡
Title: Log out

Content: Can you fix the mobile app so the images aren’t covered up by the text? There’s no way to pop out the image on the other buyer’s product reviews so half the image isn’t even visible and it covers the product that they’re showing.
Title: Review images covered by text

Content: Liked the previous format better.  It was more intuitive and easier to use.  This format makes me hunt for what I’m looking for.
Title: New format

Content: When you view an order for an item you bought in the past it just says “deal of the day” instead of the price. Please correct this and please add a link for app feedback instead of posting it here.
Title: Show price I bought it at last

Content: Small font. Unable to read product information. I like the old app. Much better.
Title: Small font

Content: I don’t like the new home page at all! Why change it if it’s not broken?
Title: Changes in Home Page

Content: The app doesn’t show the total number of options when you do a search (like on web) and sometimes the cart doesn’t show the contents, it’s just blank. You have to leave the cart and come back to it. Must be a glitch.
Title: Not like website

Content: As of up to today 12 Sept 2020, every time I click on cart icon it shows up empty even though I have items in it. I have to click on other icons and return for it to eventually load. Quite annoying when I’m trying to review my cart.
Title: Cart keeps needing to be reloaded

Content: 9/9/20 -> Now there is a bar across the bottom in addition to top task border. This makes my viewing smaller on my phone. Hate it!!!  :(
Title: Why the change?

Content: I think the UI is designed well, the menu at the bottom makes much more sense, the color scheme is refreshing. Definitely needs a dark mode, however, should be a standard design consideration
Title: Like the new UI design, needs a dark mode

Content: The new version is hard to get used to, everything is out of sorts and I’m always accidentally going to something else with the new buttons now being on the bottom of the screen. Horrible please change it back
Title: Horrible update

Content: You guys did an amazing job on my order especially with only a couple days until my daughters birthday thank you so much
Title: Amazing job

Content: By moving the menu from upper left to lower part of screen and making it always open, you have made it very annoying to those of us who scroll with our left hand.  When I seek to read the reviews on a product, it’s too easy to trigger the home button forcing me to start the search all over.  Please bring back the old format!
Title: New app design terrible for left handed

Content: I like the old version of the app so much better. New version is not pleasing to the eyes at all. How do i go back to old version?
Title: Dont like new look of app

Content: I’ve recently had problems in the pass year with my shipments, bud here recently I’ve ordered dozens of packages and have had absolutely no problem very pleased.
Title: Outstanding progress

Content: I use to return the items to Kohl’s, which is 2 minutes from my house, with no problem but today I cannot see Kohl’s in the drop-off options. I think it happened after updating the app but Im not sure. It is very unfair and inconvenient to pay for the shipping since the app is not showing any dropoff location within half hour of drive. Please fox this issue.
Title: Khols not appearing in return dropoff location

Content: Great customer service, delivery drivers, competitive prices, great options and super convenient especially for my subscription grocery products!!
Title: Great service prices and products

Content: I can't any longer copy and paste text from this app. Can you bring this function back to your next update?
Title: Copy & Paste

Content: My app worked fine until it updated. Now it keeps crashing.
Title: Update

Content: It signed me up for a prime membership and I didn’t even know I was on the trial till after it was over and I paid for a year. Also now that I have decided to actually get prime student it’s like pulling teeth to figure out how to do so and I’ve just given up on buying prime student because of that. The chat room is horrible I’ve had like 5 employees just end the chat before I was helped.
Title: Terrible customer service

Content: The latest update in May 2020 did nothing but minimize the user ability and make it more dumbed down and simplified that ends up making it more frustrating to use. The menu on the bottom? Why move it and make it more simplified. It was fine before. Why change just for the sake of change?
Title: Chang for the Sake of Change

Content: Can’t find anything.  I don’t care about other product s.  Please allow one to opt in
Title: Latest release is terrible

Content: Pending purchases cannot be hidden until order has been received. Lack of hiding order details for pending orders, delivered orders, and browsing history defeats privacy.
Title: Lack of privacy

Content: Once I updated the app today it will no longer open when I attempt to browse. The update screwed the entire app up.
Title: Update ruined everything.

Content: Cannot open on iphone 8+ after latest update. Poor QA
Title: Cannot open on iphone 8+ after latest update

Content: YOUR app is fine with me  until toay. You up-dated your app and now it is not useful .Nothing is working on it.  I also tried on the internet and that is exactly the same - not working.  Hopfully you can get it up and running  ASAP.
Title: App Not Working

Content: As far as glitches, I’ve never experienced any of those issues. I find it easy to navigate with the app and purchasing products is fairly easy. 5/5
Title: Pretty great

Content: I would love to see an option to only see US made products
Title: Should have more options

Content: Good news:  I’m not alone here from an issue perspective. Bad news: For the past 2 days or so, it’s been logging me out every time I try to use it
Title: Annoying and frustrating

Content: I recognize this is a minor inconvenience. But the filter setting in the search is incredibly annoying. On the website you can set all your filters (I.e. price, department, rating, etc) and then search. But the app, you can only set one filter at a time and then the search refreshes.
Title: Filtering is tedious

Content: Everything works but it won’t let me ask a question about the products. I have to go on my iPhone 6 to ask the questions.  Weird right? It works perfectly on my old iPhone 6 Plus on the iOS 12.4.5 but it won’t work on my current iPad Pro 3rd gen OS 13.3.1
Title: Can’t ask a question via iPad Pro 3rd Gen OS

Content: Since the latest update I have not been able to change my default wish list. Nor have I been able to delete anything, this is a serious issue for me. I was already on the verge of canceling my subscription with prime due to previously horrible customer service around Christmas. Now with these issues and horrible updates I’m really thinking it’s the best decision.
Title: Beyond Annoyed...

Content: The app is fairly easily to use. Basically adding items to my list to later move to cart. Apple Pay needs to be added as a form of payment to simplify the process when placing an order with a cell.
Title: So far so good.

Content: Typical:  as companies grow larger, attention to customer satisfaction comes in last. App was good - updates have rendered it useless. Repetitious app reinvention can get tiring for a customer. Monies targeted on app updates would be better utilized targeting larger problems for this company - like the disastrous delivery issues that plague its customers. Again, we come in last.
Title: App Changes for the worse

Content: The app is easy and intuitive to use but when using at night. It tends to burn my eyes. I would recommend adding a dark mode. Everything looks better in a dark mode.
Title: Great app

Content: Biggest issue for me with the new update is that it doesn’t save what I was looking at when I switch apps. I have to search for it again, even if I switch apps for 20 seconds. Also the next button is terrible and exhausting... Please fix these issues I’m not having a problem with being logged out as others have stated using my iPhone 8+ running iOS 13.2
Title: Revert back

Content: Why do some customers have the option to do monthly payments on certain products and others don’t? Both customers are prime members.
Title: Why??

Content: There’s stuff I want to get, but the new app update is making it blank out on me, especially when I search.  I tried opening and closing the app, turning off the phone and reinstalling—still doing it.  Super frustrating because I use it all the time!  Why make it so hard to buy something?
Title: Why don’t they want me to buy anything?

Content: First they did an update getting rid of the list drop bar at the bottom. Now they have done an update adding pages you have to keep clicking next to see more vs the old way where you just kept scrolling. Makes me want to use the app less and just go online to shop...
Title: Latest updates are undesirable

Content: Paid extra 5.99 for next day delivery. Showed up 2 days as if I wouldn’t of paid extra. Also before place order it will say showing up Wednesday. But once order is fulfilled then will show true delivery time.  No way to contact with payment issues other than doing a return and refund.
Title: Price and delivery problems.

Content: Love this company. What I don’t love is how you took away the “add to list” option. Yes, I know you can still add items to a list with the heart. BUT, that adds it to your last default list. If you want it in a different list, you have to change the list and also remove the item. Can we get the drag-and-drop feature back, PLEASE????
Title: Wish list

Content: love most of it but just know that they don't just sell from your town it's all around the world not everything will be right they are constantly getting orders it won't always be 100%👌perfect i've gotten a good bit wrong but most right 👍 alot of people shop online though, don't care if someone writes a bad review like 'bad,don't like it ,or nope' if they don't tell you why you shouldn't have this app then they don't have a good reason
Title: amazing

Content: When you are looking at an item (let’s say shoes), if you try to select the size from the drop down menu, you cannot scroll on it, the background moves instead of the size menu. It prevents you from seeing all the sizes
Title: Drop down menu problem

Content: My kid (Emily) was crying for a long long time because her toy (Gumby) was supposed to come a week ago. now They are saying Thursday or Friday I wish we could send a video but we cannot she is still crying right now saying “mommy mommy mommy why can’t it come today” I feel so bad for her. I am just putting it out there for a warning?!?!?
Title: Sad day

Content: The newest app update has taken away the drag and drop feature for my list. This greatly affects my shopping and I now will just go elsewhere. I don’t have time to click on every item manually, add it to a list, go back and compare, find it again and repeat. Until this feature comes back, goodbye to thousands of dollars of profit from this consumer!
Title: Awful shopping experience

Content: HATE IT! I ordered the book “My beloved World” by Sonia Sotomayor, and I had ordered it Hard Covered and it should of been Brand NEW! Next thing I know, I just got my Package and once I opened the book it’s all written and has a page ripped out! I cannot write a review since I haven’t bought more than $50 😣 This is so unfair!!
Title: The review system...

Content: I just realized that the package 📦 wasn’t delivered to my house. It was delivered to a vacant house two doors down from me two days ago. I checked to see if it was there but, did not see it.
Title: Package 📦 left at the wrong house.

Content: I am extremely visually impaired. This app does not allow me to explode the screen so I can see the details. It also doesn’t come with an option to enlarge the text.   I do enjoy the app but these improvements would be much appreciated.
Title: Accessibility

Content: When you post an item on Facebook, and I click on it, why not take me to that item, like other retailers do? I don’t want to bring up this search page and go thru hundreds of options, I just want to see the item you advertised. Not smart marketing, in my opinion. And then I have to go back and get the name and number to do the search. Surely you can handle that.
Title: Why make this hard?

Content: Would be nice if you could access all the things you can on the webpage version. You can’t see if you have comments on a review or things like that. Overall amazing app.
Title: Great other then a few things

Content: I used to love the app. 5 stars wasn’t high enough. However, it doesn’t work right since the last update. Can’t get more than the first picture to load, if there is a drop menu for selection of different colors or sizes of an item the menu doesn’t drop down anymore, and I cannot add anything to my cart.
Title: Bug with newest update?

Content: Like the app for its convenience but it doesnt display videos or images in the reviews which is the thing I look at the most so thats disappointing. You also cant sort reviews from most helpful. Having it bookmarked on browser might be better.
Title: No pictures?

Content: Nine times out of ten when I try to select an item to view, it does not open. Adding an item to a list sometimes helps it load, but more often than not I have to close the app and reopen it just to view one item... and then I have to do the same thing all over again a few minutes later. This makes the app virtually unusable. Please fix this.
Title: Can’t view items??

Content: I don’t understand why when I’m browsing and click on something it takes me back to the top of the page when I go out of the item I’m looking at & I have to scroll all the way back to where I was. I don’t think that’s a very effective way to shop.
Title: Browsing drama

Content: Dear Amazonians -  I received 2 emails informing me of accepted yet unauthorized changes to my acct - my email address was changed and my mobile number was deleted - making logging onto my acct impossible.  I’m pleased that I received these emails, though they offered no way for me to respond/dispute the changes, and the app provided no useful links to customer service.
Title: Customer not serviced :-(

Content: I order my fiancé some stuffer for a surprise birthday party. My banner was dirty in different place and the colors was gold. My 40 balloons would not stay up with the helium in it and when I put my table piece together it didn’t look like the picture at all. Order from here before never had a problem til this. Not happy at all. Would rather order from Walmart or something if I have to go thru this
Title: Not a Satisfied Customer

Content: Make it so you can’t change what card you are using on the iPad. It’s got the one click pay option when I want to use different cards.
Title: iPad

Content: If you feel the need to charge more. Fix the search. I specifically type and search for certain items and I get other stuff? Please stop. You want to charge more for prime? Throw in STARZ for free! Your taking more from us, while keeping it the same.(to me anyway)Yes, more of a rant. Let’s keep it real.
Title: Want to charge more?

Content: I love the app but the annoying part is that if I have a return I have to go to computer to print because their isn’t the ability to do that from iPhone. Please make a update where we can all print labels directly from our phones. I mean it’s 21 century...
Title: Please add return label support for iPhone Air Print

Content: What happened to my wishlist? It used to be visible on the bottom of the page when I open the app. I liked the save and compare option as it helped me keep track of items I’m interested in purchasing. Can you please fix it?
Title: What happened to the drag and drop?

Content: The app is okay but I went to buy a mouse for my computer and it ordered three instead, two with the express shipping (which I wanted one of) and then another one randomly with free shipping, and it seems kind of hard to accidentally do such a thing...
Title: Eh

Content: Upon opening this app, I can get to my lists, but it pulls up a specific list, and I am unable to switch to a different one. This requires me to go to a desktop version, delaying purchase and subsequent delivery.
Title: Unable to view different lists

Content: beware, I had items on my cart (they are still there) and I gor charged to my credit card, now have to deal with this, upset.
Title: charged me for items on cart not ordered

Content: Worked fine until latest update. Freezes at the top in the search bar and back button. Have to force quit the app to get it to work. Deleted the app and reinstalled, didn’t fix, rebooted phone, still didn’t fix
Title: Freezes at search bar

Content: Downloaded because I saw a promotion where I'd get $10 off a purchase of $20 or more when signing into the app for the first time. Then realize that I wouldn't get the deal for 7 business days in my email. Never got the email, so I called customer service. They never heard about the promotion so wouldn't honor it. Deleting the app now because they don't know what promotions they are running.
Title: Horrible customer service

Content: It’s super buggy. I cannot sign in to checkout and buy my items, ‘Sorry, something went wrong. Try again.’ Then when I do it again, it asks that I select an address I would like to ship to but then takes me back to the initial screen I was in prior to attempting the checkout and I have to sign in again...it’s a big loop and I can’t buy anything via app. This began just before Thanksgiving holiday.
Title: Cannot Checkout

Content: With the latest update, it has become incredibly difficult to copy the tracking number of a package.  Clicking on the number brings up an annoying pop-up box on the bottom of the screen, and you can’t even highlight the number in order to copy it.  Please fix!
Title: One Annoying Update

Content: The latest app update has eliminated landscape mode. When the vast majority of iPad owners use it primarily in landscape mode why would you possibly force the use of portrait mode only. The prior version worked perfectly.  The current version is a retrograde insult to loyal customers. Additionally, you can no longer X out text in the search bar. I will use Safari until they fix this, but it counts as an epic fail.
Title: Landscape Mode?

Content: Since the update, I cannot view the app in landscape on my iPad. I have done everything I know how to do to rotate it and it will not go to landscape. PLEASE fix this. It is not only the rotation, but the keyboard is gone when I try and use the search function. Tried and tried to fix it, but it apparently needs to be addressed by you. Unusable in the format
Title: Bad update

Content: Before the update my app would go into landscape mode on my ipad but since the update will not go into landscape. Makes it too hard to shop and browse if you have to hold ipad upright. My case will hold the ipad in landscape but not vertical. It may save me money since I won’t be shopping as much.
Title: Landscape Mode

Content: App was perfect before this update. I have the iPad Pro and if I can’t use the app in landscape mode...I’m not shopping. Totally throws off my shopping experience. Yeah it sounds lazy... all you have to do is turn it sideways and your good right? NO. BAD UPDATE. until it’s fixed, not spending a dime here.
Title: Why fix it if it isn’t broken?

Content: Nearly everything on the store is only for Prime members now. Gonna have to go elsewhere if buying anything means adding a super expensive monthly subscription.   Seriously. Imagine going to the grocery store just to buy milk or something and "Oh, that will be $30 a month. You can't buy without our membership plan." Hell no. I'm out.
Title: 80% of Everything is Prime Only.

Content: In the app it does not have a log out option! If if it does, then it's not simply found. Just spent 15 min trying to log out. Even google can't help
Title: Log out option?

Content: Great app quick and easy but missing the ability to print or view invoice, I have to go to the computer to do this, and that's almost every order, so why use it in the first place?
Title: One thing missing

Content: App is fine until you start scrolling down a product page and the Price + Add to cart + Buy now overlay shows up and the frame rate drops to a slideshow.  Using 13 Pro Max, so there is no way is this related to inadequate performance regarding my phone.
Title: Price overlay - Choppy Scrolling

Content: The app would not load ir let me see orders older than one old as I try to scroll down the list they stop at Sept 13th order date which is exactly one month from today and message displays “ You've reached the end of Your Orders”
Title: Not loading loading orders more than One month old

Content: Five stars because it has gotten out of a middle so many times with last minute purchases.
Title: Love this store.

Content: I’m running the latest IOS update version and the app has been extremely slow thanks to this big prime deal stuff….and I don’t even have prime smh. The app crashes whenever I am in my settings account. Also please remove the explicit inappropriate material (pornographic)  its being sold by numerous sellers, possibly companies.
Title: App crashes, freezes, and more!!!

Content: When you order the things do come how it looks like in the pictures but it does take a long time and sometimes it does not come and get canceled
Title: This app has pros and cons abt it

Content: Your site is so huge that I cannot find things, e.g. changing to a different default email. Suggest you put in a search feature (a better map) just to be able to navigate the site.
Title: Searching site

Content: I Ordered many items expecting them two to there days and they are delayed every-time and than come in the next 5 days
Title: Got prime not worth it

Content: You messed up the county settings. Can’t find it anywhere. Jeez… why do you have to make it so convoluted? Some of us could be buying things in different countries for extended families. When you have global branches, make the purchasing easier, at least for US prime members 😉 You are losing business to regional, online sellers because of the inflexibility in your app!  *** Previous comments Why did you change the color scheme?  This review is only for the recent UI color scheme changes… ugh…
Title: Country settings

Content: Put the search box on top. Search box at the bottom is not intuitive, whoever suggested otherwise is crazy.
Title: Don’t change the UI elements often

Content: Every time I put some thing in my cart to buy on my payday it’s always gone and says I have nothing in my cart now and don’t remember what all I had . I had items in my cart from five years ago now I have nothing. Had a bunch of stuff I was going to buy this July 11 and 12th now I’m looking somewhere else to spend my money
Title: Shopping cart problems

Content: Why did you move the search bar to the bottom?? Horrible idea! Seriously. When every app has it at the top it is very hard to get used to having it at the bottom. Please PLEASE put it back at the top.
Title: Why??

Content: Becoming quite routine tracking packages as they get close only to receive an apology for being late immediately to hear its delayed a day.  Quite frustrating.  God forbid the item is something you really need.
Title: Constantly late deliveries

Content: Moving the search bar to the bottom is RHE WORST.  It covers the product page, it’s in the way, and should be at the top.  The list page is a mess also now.  Gone is the user friendly list of lists, and now a jumbled confusing page where it’s hard to find the lists.  Terrible
Title: Boo!!!  Fixing features that aren’t broken!

Content: It’s terrible. I don’t want to see every item I have saved to all my lists. That’s why I made LISTS. So they would be SEPARATE. The extra step to get to the original list page is just unnecessary.
Title: Why did you change the list page?

Content: You seem to not want app feedback via the app, so I’ll leave it here.   The search bar at the bottom of the screen is not good. And not having a setting to change it back is even worse.   I don’t expect much from the app, it’s so jam packed full of stuff, it is what it is, but the bottom search bar is just awful.   Awful enough that searched how to leave feedback within the app and when I couldn’t find it, took the trouble to write this review.   You know that means I’m far from the only one that feels this way.
Title: Bottom search bar bad. Period.

Content: Please put the search bar back at the top! And make the lists easier to choose from again. I used to be able to long press on the heart and it would let me choose which list to save to. The latest update went backwards!
Title: Latest update is not good!

Content: I loved the app until yesterday when you moved the search bar to the bottom!!! This is HORRENDOUS! My wife is disabled due to a spinal cord injury christmas eve of 2022! With limited hand use it is now almost impossible for her to shop using your mobile app! As well as an inconvenience for myself!!! Dont fix what wasnt broke!!!
Title: Loved at one time!

Content: Please stop messing with the layout! With this latest update i no longer have a back button and i have to end the app to start all over when searching for something! Its not user friendly at all especially those with iphones!
Title: Layout

Content: Can’t access 90 percent of my music, can’t turn off music shuffle. Merchandise is very low quality and poor customer service.   Every shipment has been thrown to the ground with busted corners then been re-taped.  Overall someone needs to care.  The app is extremely buggy; I can’t even hi light a star.
Title: Honestly

Content: The new version doesn’t allow for you to add ideas to a wish list. It’s pretty limiting now. It doesn’t make a lot of sense considering people may want something, but may not have a specific link to a product at the time. Now they can’t add any free thought ideas.
Title: No new ideas?

Content: Get rid of this inspire icon on the bottom of the app. It’s no need for it. Or let us disable it. Why in the world would you place it where my order icon tab was. That was done deliberately so people can tap that icon. Allow us to move these icons as we like them in the order we want like the iOS tray. Once you guys fix this then I will rate your app a 5 Star
Title: Inspire WFFFFF

Content: All the positive reviews are obviously fake, no one respects this disgusting company, it’s become incompetent to the point of it not being worth the low standard. I won’t even begin on issues of ethicality, they hire trash, they use subliminals, the music playlist at Whole Foods is trash. Wrong historical period for this type of personality to have any power or influence.
Title: We all know the positive reviews are bots

Content: The order was fast and efficient
Title: The order was fast and efficient truly amazing service

Content: This app will scam your credit card numbers and buy things without permission as soon as you order something they will put your account on hold and then take ur info and ban ur account I had a 150$ gift card for their store to buy my son a present I ordered it it said suspicious activity banned my account and cancelled my sons order really bad app!
Title: Do not get this app

Content: Really wish I could add items to lists without having to select the item in the scroll page
Title: Adding to lists

Content: This is why I give 1 star. You should be able to control your tv subscriptions etc … from your phone. By making it more difficult for us to manage our subscriptions, you make more money, which is unethical. You are already a monopoly. Why not be ethical at least?
Title: Desktop and Cell Phone Versions Should Work The Same

Content: Spend over $200 after i just bought prime for the first time. Packages said they got delivered and never did. Been otp for 4 days trying to get help and nothing. Was told to “make a police report” in order to get my refund or my items sent back. What a waste. Complete joke save your money
Title: First two items i ordered never got delivered. No refund either

Content: The search is terrible as always but now the results are all autoplaying video thumbnails. The prime benefit of 2-day shipping is getting increasingly rare. They tell me it’s a prime item and that it ships from close by but it won’t arrive for 3-5 days. They aren’t even trying to be good anymore.
Title: App is getting progressively more annoying

Content: We marvel that this app, with all the people working on it, is so poor.  Multiple steps to check order status.  A favorites page that seemingly can't edit.  Much like Alexa, too many cooks did a number on that as well.  Getting a Google assistant soon, but no relief on this bloated app.
Title: Daughter and I agree, app is crap

Content: Used to be two simple steps to check the status of an order, now it’s four. In its place is a buy again button in a section titled my shortcuts. Nothing like making an app less convenient to encourage additional purchases
Title: Extra steps just to get to orders but a buy again button is now easy to find

Content: Since this new update, it’s been real buggy for me. It just freezes and I have to close the whole app and restart it. Kind of annoying.
Title: Bugs

Content: I can’t purchase anything because whenever I click on the “checkout” button it’ll appear like it’s about to transfer me to that page, but instead it bounces me right back to my cart. Very annoying as I was needing to buy a blood glucose test kit with overnight shipping. I even tried to refresh the app and it still won’t work.
Title: Won’t Let Me Checkout

Content: Front page loads with no issues but as soon as I click a product to look at, I get a whitepage. Have to close the app and reopen it to fix. Although sometimes it does not fix it, so I just search it on another app and buy from that store.
Title: Blank screen

Content: I keep encountering an issue where the view of a product suddenly turns into a blank white screen.  It has persisted for months.  Now we are seeing full screen ads.  Full screen ads are absolutely unacceptable.  Ads in general are unacceptable.

Content: This app used to be 5/5 but for the last few months it constantly crashes and draws blanks when I try to search for products. It makes me not want to shop as much because it happens every single time I open the app. Super frustrating.

Content: Can not search for prime only items on mobile while simultaneously trying to add another filter. This app is now significantly less useful than it was before. Updated to latest version and still does not function normally. Please fix, thanks 👍

Content: I don’t know what happened. I used too get on this app daily too look at deals etc.. let alone buy all the things. Well now every single item I click doesn’t matter what it is, it tells me that it doesn’t deliver to my address. Anywhere from noodles, clothes, phone cases and chargers an kitchen things.  It’s extremely frustrating. 😬
Title: Ugh

Content: App was fine, then it wanted me to sign in and doesn’t allow me to press anything on the sign in page. Even if I try to create new account, the screen won’t let any fields be filled out. Tried deleting and downloading many times with no change. Just going to use the web instead. Disappointed!

Content: App isn’t loading properly. I’m sure you know this. Please allocate some of your billions and fix it. I can’t read reviews more than half the time, as the app only loads the top quarter of the page. Very disappointing from a huge company I’ve spent thousands of dollars for.
Title: Fix your glitches

Content: Convenient and well organized website.

No problem! You can’t do it by clicking on your review and editing it of course, you’ll find it hidden in a submenu of your profile.

Not like it’s been 10 days and it got lost day 2.. Just getting sketchy.

Content: For almost a year now, Amazon’s app has hijacked audio on my iPhone. Every time I open or close it, whatever I’m listening to stops playing. I have the microphone access turned off in Settings > Privacy, yet they’ve still found a way to annoy me.  Fix this! It’s ridiculous.

Content: I enjoy using the app because of convenience and user friendliness.  I’m saved trips to the mall/store especially during the pandemic.

Content: Love shopping with Amazon,saving my time to find items hard to find with quick shipping!

Content: There’s no way to search for text in a product page anymore. I often use it to search part of the product description or for reviews that mention a specific word. Now I’m in limbo and can’t compare products like I would like to, preventing me from making a purchase.

Content: They gave me the option to pay for my order and they were all set

Content: Shopping is miserable on app.  No option to print out what you’ve ordered without going though many steps to get back to order. Once finished shopping, no way to find logout.  Your updates to make app better for the shopper is just the opposite.  I shop less, instead of more because of your set-up.

Content: App used to work just fine. Now there is no smooth transition from mail to app and back again. Hijacked from app to store, only way back is to get out of app, erase all and reopen. What the heck is that?. Please update and fix. Weeks later still malfunctioning. New update holds in portrait mode on the iPad ???

Content: Able to order on the go, easy to find and easily can compare items. Making returns if necessary easy with our local Kohl’s taking returns.

I’m so annoyed that I have to wait for some deliveries that I made weeks ago and need like tomorrow... I just hate that I never know when I will actually get my orders .

Content: Used to be 5 stars...after upgrade 4 stars....hard to change or remove items from the browsing history. If it’s not broken, don’t try to fix it.

FOUR customer service reps, and still no resolution.  Maybe the “team” will figure it out...
Title: Horrible Customer Service

Content: I just updated last night and now I’m having so many issues. I click to view an item and it won’t load the page or takes forever to load, it’s having issues filtering results. Please fix!!

Content: You have taken what was a great app to a buggy UI that freezes on me when I list my orders. The menu to navigate at the lower end of the screen is so counter intuitive. The left side context menu was amazing and in line with the desktop app... made things easy. Browse via mobile but continue browsing and finish the purchase on desktop. The color scheme is down right deplorable...

Content: This app has been my go to since the shutdown. I loved the convenience and the one stop shop for EVERYTHING. After you have decided to shut down voices of differing opinion, I have decided to use my tiny muscle. I will no longer use your app to make purchases. Instead, if I do find something I like, I will bypass you and shop directly with them. I will support small business, but not you.   Goodbye. ✌🏾

It is a difficult to use application find items, the menu paths are unclear, and items get dropped from the shopping cart. Go back to 2 applications or fix it.

Content: This app has historically been awesome. The latest release is freezing when it is first opened. The phone is an iPhone 7 but I still don’t see why the app should freeze. Even if a background task is being performed it should not prevent scrolling.

Content: The Imethod liquid eyeliner pen is amazing! It goes on easy! Stays on even after a full nights sleep it was still on in tact! It’s so easy to use. As long as you make sure you keep it with the lid face down so then it will not dry out! I love this product! I will be getting more!

Content: So many things to say but to keep it short; this is Amazon’s worst update ever. Way too cumbersome and difficult to navigate. Very disappointed!!!

Content: This company has absolutely the most clueless customer service reps and the worst system in my opinion I was supposed to receive my item within 4 days did not receive the package until 1 1/2 months and it didn’t even have everything that it was supposed to have!!! I called them and “Britany” sits there and tries to tell me she can’t help me and has no clue why my account is suspended.

Content: I really don’t get it... I have to submit a bad review every time this happens and it’s super annoying. I shouldn’t have to use your app to track my orders, it’s easier to use whatever shipper for my orders app and then I can make arrangements or whatever. These tracking numbers are long so please stop removing copy/paste!
Title: Please stop removing copy/paste for tracking numbers

Content: Not sure what happen... but I can no longer click on the ratings and go to that section.  No big deal, but it was nice.  Also it would be nice to be able to zoom in on the images that are submitted with reviews.  Other than that... it does what it is supposed to do.
