Content: I get notifications about everything else with this app... that things have shipped and are out for delivery etc. Why no notification when things are running late? I had to go deep into the app to figure out what happened with the order that was supposed to come yesterday.
Title: No notification when running late?

Content: What is wrong w this app? I'm outside of the US and not only I can't receive the stupid push to sign in but I can't even contact support because it asks for the stupid push for me to even talk to someone. Support on Twitter was useless, anyone in here can do something? If I'm using the app in my device then it's common sense I should be able to just do my thing but amen hoping someone finally helps
Title: Push notifications

Content: App would be fine except for the huge problem with the ratings link not working at the top of the app.  Typically clicking the link at the top of the item is supposed to bring you down to the bottom of the page where the ratings are.  Not working on my iPad.  I have to scroll every time.  Total PITA.
Title: Ratings link not working

Content: Just caught them Price gouging , shame on them. I ordered echo 3rd gen but I needed a 2nd gen. Yesterday it was $99.  Today it was $149. But you can get a 3rd gen which is the new one for only $59.  They are changing prices. This is getting bad
Title: Crooks

Content: Was finally forced to update, and i have to say, this new update has definitely reduced the time i spend browsing for things to buy. Mainly because there is no longer the drag and drop tray at the bottom of the screen, which made it easy to compare items and to switch between lists.
Title: where’s the wishlist???

Content: Being able to compare items at the bottom or see wish list at the bottom were amazing. Being able to search and just scroll through was more convenient then going from page to page.
Title: Took away the wrong features

Content: I don’t think I’ve ever left a review on an app before but the update is terrible. Major mistake. People who shop on the app daily get smacked in the face with a new format and different colors almost unrecognizable. Whoever approved this doesn’t realize that this will surely impact sales. It doesn’t feel like the same app and instead of shopping here I am writing this review, and that’s saying something. Figure it out!
Title: I HATE THE UPDATED APP

Content: We cannot COPY the tracking numbers on the app anymore.  What’s the point?   Somehow toy took out the ability to copy stuff like the tracking number o item name and paste it on another app. We need to go to the web to copy now. Why did you take that feature out? It was great and helpful.
Title: Bring back the ability to COPY the tracking number!

Content: The last update was fantastic for seeing and tracking orders. It was finally listed out in the order of next delivery, which was incredibly helpful and efficient. What happened? Now my orders list is completely scrambled and I have to scroll through a month’s worth to finally find what might deliver next. Not helpful at all.
Title: Orders (format)

Content: Your new interface is horribly designed! Where are Daily Deals or Lightning Sales? The only items shown are “Bargins” most of which are cheap dollar store crap from (& shipped) from China!   Fire your app designers and get it together...this is supposed to be a store not a magazine. It’s confusing and not user friendly. You have lost many sales from me because shopping is now frustrating and confusing.
Title: 2020 BAD LAYOUT!

Content: I get it your trying to maximize your bottom line, but it’s real annoying when I search for something and more then half the results are for unrelated sponsored items. Plus do away with the next button, just let me scroll through all the items without keep hitting next, for like every 10 items.
Title: Stop showing unrelated sponsored items in searches.

Content: Your latest changed the orders screen and it us so confusing now. I had an order that didn’t arrive and i was refunded and it is still at the top of the order list. No way to delete it. Is it going to be there forever??? Its lost in transit. Remove it from the list!! Not all newly placed orders appear on the list in the order they were placed. I could go on....PLEASE CHANGE IT BACK!!!!!
Title: Order screen update is terrible!!!!

Content: The app does everything the website does so I don’t know why it even exists. Except for chatting with costumer service which by the way are all incompetent. They couldn’t help me with my delivery issues I had to go out of my way and contact the shipping company my self. The staff here needs to step up a notch and do a better job at what they are being paid for.
Title: Would give 0 stars if I could

Content: It’s good for window shopping for those of you who don’t know what it means to look around but one time I was adding things to cart and it just erased everything and I had to do it again then this happened constantly and then it started glitching
Title: Glitches and I had to add things to cart again because it comes out it self

Content: Bro I’m sick and tired of y’all signing me out!!! This is the tenth time I’ve had to reset my password because y’all keep signing me out!!! I’m not understanding what’s happening but y’all need to fix that like FRFR!
Title: Stop signing me out!!!

Content: I thought I was going to get $25 to spend when I downloaded this app. Turns out, I think I’m supposed to spend $20 to get $10 off and $30 to get $15 off.   I’ve ordered stuff and they divided my order so it looks to me like I’m getting nothing for downloading this app. I talked to the chat people. One told me I didn’t qualify (never told me why). The second person told me it would show after I made my purchase. Nope.
Title: Annoyed

Content: This app is so annoying lately. I have to sign in repeatedly while using it - sometimes 4 or 5 times in only a few minutes. I’ve noticed more of other glitches lately too. It won’t always let me add things to my cart, will say my cart is empty when it isn’t, won’t always let me add to my wishlist, etc.
Title: Constantly have to sign in

Content: The app keeps me logged in and all is great if I want to make a purchase but if I try to cancel a subscription it app is designed to not work. I live over seas and the app is associate with another number that I no longer have and customer service have not proved helpful. My favorite part is that in order to get to customer service via the app I need to sign in, which I cannot.
Title: Cancelling subscriptions is a nightmare.

Content: Whenever I open the app using anything but my home WiFi, it doesn’t work. I’ve checked my settings, and every other app on my phone still works. I’ve tried redownloading it, and signing in and out. It’s really unfortunate when I’m trying to track something but I’m not home. Otherwise, wonderful app when I’m using it at home
Title: Great app, but...

Content: For goodness sake, why does it keep logging me out? Now it’s not auto populating my email.   Another issue which is minor but wish they’d bring back is the drag and drop to compare items quickly. That was awesome.  Ow they make you heart items and then have to dig around to find your wish list. Come on developers. Why are you making it harder to use the app? It’s counter intuitive.
Title: Keep me logged in!!

Content: Seriously love AP but the app lately is ridiculous!!! Logs me out DAILY IN THE MIDDLE OF AN ORDER. (Yes I used AP that much) It’s weird because often I will be half signed in half signed out I don’t know how else to explain. If I load my cart and try to pay, it will kick me out and say empty cart. This glitch has been getting worse the last few weeks but today I drew the line. Uninstalled the app, the app / update is TRASH!!!!! Soooo frustrating. Fix it!!!
Title: UNINSTALLED THE APP

Content: Ordered an item for next day delivery payed extra for this option. The driver couldn’t find my address I was even out in the parking lot waving them down and they weren’t paying attention. Customer service couldn’t do anything but say they could attempt the following day what about the extra money I spent on next day delivery? WILL NOT be ordering anything else from this company so disappointed.
Title: Delivery Nightmare

Content: I don’t know what happened to the app, but it has become so unusable that I’m actually considering driving to the store snow and or switching back to eBay. It constantly requires me to sign in over and over and won’t even work with Apple password wallet anymore, just blank password. I have to separately go to Apple password and copy then back into the app and paste. This is absolutely ridiculous.
Title: Total crap version

Content: It always says they’re fixing something on there end and I can’t use the app at the moment even on the website.
Title: It’s always closing me out

Content: It is absolutely the most aggravating thing to be looking at products but have to switch away from the app to reply to a text message or whatever and come back to the app only to have it revert back to the home page. Whyyyyy? Who wants to start they’re search all over again from the beginning? It’s to the point that I simply look elsewhere.
Title: Frustrating to Use

Content: Overall great app but it would be great if I could create nicknames for my various credit cards so I can switch which account I use to purchase without having to pull out the wallet and check...
Title: Nicknames for credit cards

Content: For some reason, lately when I open the app I get the message “Something went wrong” if I am connected to any wireless internet. When I switch to cellular data, the app works sometimes and sometimes I have to reset my iPhone 8s in order to get it to work.
Title: App keeps loosing connection

Content: Just look through the reviews and you can find thirsty arrogant idiots that won’t admit they aren’t as smart as they think they are.
Title: Very well designed app.  Has never failed me

Content: It’s crazy. I can’t believe that it is number 1 in shopping. I can’t choose the size of the shoes that I’m searching for. I have to check all listings and spend a lot of times. I texted to help desk and they suggested to put the size in the searching area but it doesn’t help. It shows me listings without my size. eBay has a lot of searching filters, at least it should show the sizes!
Title: No filters in searching. No sizes

Content: I have items from other registries that I’d like to be able to mark as purchased. But for whatever reason y’all took that capability off. Please add it back for the baby registry. It’s frustrating. Every other registry allows you to go in and mark as purchased.
Title: Purchased items

Content: I love the app, except the part to save my items on my wish list. It was better the way it used to be where we would dragged the item to the list we selected. Right now it’s hard and annoying!
Title: I love the app

Content: They have ruined the app. What happened to the drag and drop feature on the app? Who ever though that would be a good idea should be demoted or loose their job. I thought my app was just acting up so I deleted it then re downloaded it. Nope not the app acting up. Just really bad ideas that ruined the app. Hope y’all read these and learn what you did ruined the app for everyone.
Title: What happened to the drag and drop feature?!

Content: What happened to the list tray? Dragging and dropping items in your list was so easy and it made it easy to see everything and easily compare items. It’s so much more of a pain to put things in a list, or view current list items from the app now. Hoping this is just a bug that will be fixed and not a discontinuation of a user friendly feature.
Title: List tray

Content: What happened to being able to choose items to watch and then actually see them under the “Watching” icon? I understand trying to make improvements but keep in mind those of us short on time don’t have time to search and figure out how the app works again and again.
Title: Worst Update!

Content: Lately, I can’t search for ANY product, including “tea glasses” and “beach towels” without getting recommendations for products with offensive language. I’m super tired of seeing the “F” word on every product as well as other offensive language!
Title: Products with offensive language

Content: The app picked up an annoying bug about a month ago where the toggle for "Alexa Shopping & Dash Updates" keeps turning itself back on every few days. These are notifications I don't want or need from this app.   Deleted the app from my phone. Maybe I'll try it again in a couple of months.
Title: Annoying Notifications Bug

Content: I love this app. I get whatever I need, whenever I need it. However, not being able to order kindle books or audibles from the app is absolutely ridiculous. It cuts their sells so much, at least in the house. I am astounded that in this day and time they cannot fix this aspect.
Title: Great For Somethings

Content: The way they list items for purchasing or interest is extremely poorly set up.... You will have to scroll down a listing one item at a time, and there’s no way of making item comparisons at all !!! I wouldn’t even have this app as far as I’m concerned it is more of a hassle than any thing at all!!!
Title: Items listing is zero stars

Content: The app is usually amazing, however with the latest update there is no to share an item. I have to put it in my cart open it from there then it allows me to share the items.
Title: No longer able to share items

Content: I love this app on my iPhone, but am disappointed that it hasn’t been updated to take advantage of the new screen size and aspect ratio of the IPad Pros from 2018...The latest version came out 5 days ago so clearly someone has been releasing updates, just not the one us new iPad owners are looking for.
Title: 2018 IPad Pro update??

Content: I’m trying to order some things and I am using a gift card and it has the right amount of money I need to buy the thing and all my items are eligible for free shipping but at the payment method screen the continue buttons are faded and is letting place my order. WHY
Title: Usually good but..

Content: Do you realize that the camera feature hasn’t been working for a very long time ? Every time i try to use it the app just freeze and i have to restart it
Title: Camera feature not working

Content: You cannot see the price of an item unless you select an item...😡 so frustrating. Bring back the the visibility of the prices.
Title: Price display

Content: This is a great mobile app! It has touch id for ordering which makes it dangerous for those with online shopping addictions. Really easy to use :)
Title: Addictive mobile app

Content: Would be better if you could save the changes to which notifications you want to see. It looks like it's saving, but when you reload that part of the settings, they are all turned back on.
Title: Notification bug

Content: Ever since the update, I can no longer click on a product and view multiple different colors of it. The button seems to be frozen. The same goes with adding items to my cart, the button is frozen and doesn’t allow me to add anything to my cart.
Title: Whatever this update was, it was a disaster

Content: The app is amazing, easy to maneuver through and very helpful. My only problem as a regular user is that the app is too robotic. It’s very vague and plain, with the tabs being too square and just feels fake in a way. But the app itself is as stated amazing except my thoughts.
Title: Robotic!

Content: I tried sending a link to someone of the shoes I might want.. but when I open the link to make sure it works... it shows a dog saying”UH-OH There Is A Problem On Our Side” then the person tried it and even said ya it doesn’t work for me either! Plz help me!
Title: I need help

Content: Recently updated and now I can’t use the search bar or camera search from the homepage. Also, pulled up the “more information” on an item and now the ‘back’ button doesn’t work. Useless.   Also, can you PLEASE get rid of that Wish List tray?!!!
Title: Update has serious flaws!

Content: I love the app. My only issue is that the past month or so I haven’t been able to look at my orders. It has me scan my fingerprint then says “something went wrong” I don’t know how to resolve this issue. Every time a new update comes out I hope it gets fixed but never does.
Title: View orders.

Content: Please fix this! It's been glitching on and off for a year! I try to add a friend's address so that I can deliver a gift to them, and then the app will just take me back to the checkout page and delete the address!
Title: Glitches When I Try to Add a New Address!!!

Content: Ordered some stuff yesterday and said it would be delivered early next week with my prime. Go to check up on the order this morning and it says it won’t be delivered until December. So I talk to customer service and it looks good on their end but not with the app. Needs to be fixed ASAP
Title: Wrong dates

Content: So easy to shop or change your mind when shopping.
Title: Shopping

Content: Constantly running into issues every order wasting my time and the money I pay for prime. App chooses when it wants to ask for needed information and rarely gets its it right. Constantly sending to the wrong addresses or the wrong card without first giving the option to chose which one I want to use
Title: App is a mess

Content: This app is horrible. Unintuitive checkout is one of my biggest concerns. Not very professional. I feel like I could break it if I clicked too quickly. I have stuff to do in my life. Why is the app so slow?  I can confirm, after placing my latest order on the mobile website, it’s much better. Save yourself the trouble
Title: Feels like it was designed in 2010

Content: I love Amozon so much! It’s like 1 million stories in one and you have it on your phone!! very convenient and time saving as well
Title: Shopping with Amozon in the comfort of your home yes!!

Content: Please fix filters, they only mess up searches and don’t help find things. Fix incorrect items in top selling categories  Add dark mode to app, how am I supposed to shop when im being blinded by white light the whole time.
Title: Please add dark mode to app

Content: We have redecorated our home and used the red and navy rugs through out our home.  We have received so many compliments about the new look !!!
Title: Red and Navy rugs

Content: I can search but I can’t choose items. Links fail to open and stuck on search page.  Only certain items open, such as account info, cart and search functions.  Once search is complete, I can’t click on items I’m interested in.  Argh.
Title: Unstable update

Content: Can’t swipe left/right to go back or forward when looking at products. I’m forced to use the back button placed next to the search bar.   Also, the search bar gets in the way of the chat feature when communicating with customer service reps or robots.   Put it back at the top.
Title: Forced to use back button

Content: Put the search bar back at the top. Moving it makes no sense. There is no reason for moving it. I haven’t used the app since this new update because having the search bar at the bottom drives me nuts. Your literally losing money because of this new update. Fix it and put it back normal please.
Title: Stop moving the search bar

Content: The change of the search bar is inconvenient. There should be an option to move it back to the top, and if there is it should be easier to find as I have been unable to find it.
Title: What’s with the changed search box?

Content: Whoever the genius is that said to put the search bar at the bottom needs to be demoted yesterday along with the person who approved it. What we needed was the ability to select multiple items to either move to or delete from another favorites folder or delete from subscriptions.
Title: Terrible Update

Content: I cannot go onto the app can you try to do something but this is an amazing app I want to go on I really love but this app I can not get it now
Title: I can’t get into the app

Content: Why was the search bar moved to the bottom of the screen? It’s confusing and makes the the app harder to use.   I hope this is corrected soon and the search is moved back to the top of the screen – just like every other app.
Title: Don’t like the new interface

Content: This app has worked great with little to no bugs and I have only had a lost package twice in which they refunded me
Title: Amazing

Content: Why do they even add a timeline or add how many stops if they don’t follow it? 2 hours ago I was 7 stops away and they were less than 2 miles from my home. Not they moved 50 feet and aren’t moving and now all details are gone. I hope someone makes a better service. I have wasted too much money on Bezos.
Title: Amazing selection, terrible delivery

Content: This is the worst “advance” ever in Amazon’s history! It has this wonderful “question icon” which takes one to BOOKS about any question, but NOT to answers. When you look for specific books, you can order physical books and audible books, but are told the app does not support kindle purchases. Bah.
Title: New software written by whom?

Content: I switched from my personal to business account and now want to switch back to my personal account. Instructions do not seem to be updated for this version of the app. Additionally, I cannot figure out how to log out of the business app — again, instructions are outdated.
Title: Can’t switch from business to personal account

Content: On the iPhone now, Whole Foods is messed up. You can’t easily change the address to pick up and when you do you still can’t shop on the Whole Food site … please fix this!!! Working fine until the last update!!
Title: Messed up last version

Content: I’ve been waiting on a product for weeks with 5 delivery days come and gone. When I contacted customer support, they said that the product was out of stock. Why would you continue to give me delivery dates when you have no product. Super frustrating and a waste of time.
Title: Shipping delays or no product at all sometimes

Content: I ordered a package on December 15  it said it will be there on the 24th I always checked and it said the same thing until today at 4:00 they said they said that it was running late and it will be there after Christmas so the thing was a gift that's why I give two stars
Title: Running late

Content: You will find all your needs! And u will get ur order to 3-5 days sometime u don’t get what u hope for but sometimes u do getting ur package gets u so much excitement LOL
Title: Great app

Content: For about a week now with Wi-Fi and cellular data every time I click on the app it says I have no internet connection. I 100% have internet connection. Tried to launch in safari and it’s the same thing. Only thing I haven’t tried is on my Mac but I should be able to use it on my iPhone just like I always did.
Title: Unable to use app

Content: Apps great, easy to use, lots of options. But UPS always ducks up deliveries and there is no option to choose another shipping company. At least give me the option.
Title: Please Stop Using UPS

Content: App will not work.  I get the doggie telling me I have no internet connection however of course I do have connectivity.   This problems has persisted for two days.  I am unable to ask for technical support with the app because when I go to that link I get stopped because it thinks there is no internet connection.  A classic circular logic loop.
Title: No Internet Connection

Content: This happened three times last year and twice so far this year. They misdelivered my item to the wrong address—the same wrong address. I contacted customer service the first time and they sent me a new item— which went to the wrong address. I’ve been trying to contact to  contact them again to no avail
Title: Misdelivery

Content: Pay to have orders dropped off at my house. They drop half my order at my house then drop the 2nd half of the order off at a post office in town. Why do I pay for prime just to have to go somewhere else to pick my product up. Now I gotta take a day off work to go get half my order which half was dropped off already AT MY HOUSE.
Title: Horrible service

Content: My 5 year-old son has been so excited about his Iron Man costume. He had to wait 5 days but today (Friday) was the day! Latest arrival by 10pm but we checked every 10 minutes from 6pm until bed time. 10pm came and went but no package. Then I get a message that our package isn’t coming? So now I have to break the bad news to my son in the morning.
Title: Disappointed Kid

Content: After submitting one negative review on earbud tip replacements for an Apple product where I followed all guidelines (I know, I read them afterwards in the email they sent me) I no longer am able to review anything at all even if the review is positive. What good are ratings and reviews if you shut up people who have anything negative to say about the product?
Title: Loved it until

Content: When browsing searched items, the screen can go white/blank.  You hit back button, and it brings you to the start of your search.  It enables a deep rage I didn’t know existed.  Please fix this.  It happens to my wife’s app on her phone, and others have confirmed.  They all share the same sentiment on how it makes them feel.
Title: White Screen Madness

Content: When viewing an item on its own page the page will go blank and only a page of white appears.  This does not occur with every item. There does not seem to be any rhyme or reason on why some item pages do this as it is not all items. It does occur enough on a regular basis to report it.
Title: Has a bug since the app redesign

Content: The app will go blank while you’re looking at an item, you have to go back and click the item again to see it. This happens far too often and it’s incredibly annoying. Everything is up to date and it’s still awful, I keep expecting an update to fix it.
Title: App goes blank constantly

Content: Great speedy service when your item is available.
Title: Almost worth the prime subscription

Content: A bit laggy and slow on my iPhone 12. But many cool features, and much better experience as an iOS app than Amazon‘s Alexa app.
Title: A bit slow, but much better than their Alexa app

Content: Does the app work? Yeah but I keep getting to an item screen, then it’ll flash and go white. Then I have to back out and go back into the item. If it was a one off okay, but it happens ALL the time across multiple devices.   If not for that it would be 5 stars.
Title: Stability issues lately.

Content: Have been having problems regularly with a page glitching and going blank. Each time having to start my search all over Again. Getting very irritating
Title: Glitchy

Content: The payment methods need to get updated and apple pay should be one of the options to buy.  Thanks.
Title: Apple pay feature missing

Content: All of a sudden I randomly can’t read reviews or I can’t select any filter options unless I close out the app and restart it. It’s annoying while you’re trying to narrow down the item you want to buy. Fix these glitches as I never had an sue until the last two weeks.
Title: What’s going on with these glitches?

Content: The picture freezes on an item and have to load a product page a few times to see it. Also tracking says 1 to 2 days and then they get delayed/lost more these days. Not quite prime is it.
Title: Buggy

Content: Worthless customer service when it’s their fault. “Oh I’m sorry we “lost” your package that you needed this week and then surreptitiously raised the price in the 5 hours it took you to reorder…. Good luck…” If you hang up on them out of complete frustration the will call you gain just to take the verbal beating that you refused to give them the first time around.
Title: Shady business practices

Content: On iOS iPhone 11, when viewing products the full tree collapses randomly with no error. Have to back out of product view and completely restart navigation to product. How does this get released into prod? Been seeing this issue for weeks
Title: Really?

Content: I love this app to create multiple wish lists, order things, and research products. Well done.
Title: Too easy!

Content: We live out in the country, and need to shop often for dog food since our dog is a big eater. Gas prices make it hard to get to the store.  Thanks!
Title: Rural shopper

Content: The variety on all products is amazing. I can always find what I’m looking for. I’ll start using it more now that I know it’s one stop shopping
Title: Ms

Content: Disabled,elderly, do not drive and a caregiver for a handy capped 93 year old woman. Your company has been our life line now for over 8 years. I am a very happy prime member😀. Thank you Darlene Wachter
Title: My life line!

Content: The app blank-screens within a few seconds after every search, and I have to start over. Very frustrating.
Title: Review of the software only

Content: I can find just about anything I need. With the price of gas I don’t need to drive around town looking for an item.
Title: Best way to shop!

Content: Always have what I’m looking for with great reviews on what the item will actually look like before buying !
Title: Great items !

Content: Service is awesome but I have to be very selective about what I order as prices are sometimes 30-40% higher on some items that I can obtain locally!
Title: Review

Content: I do lots of late night price checking, and opening this app is the best way to absolutely scorch my retinas with the purest white beaming from my phone screen. A dark mode would be an extreme upgrade, very nice quality of life addition for sure!
Title: Needs a Dark Mode

Content: So far I’ve used the app for personal shopping now I get the sense it can be used for almost any and everything. I have no complaints and I highly appreciate FREE SHIPPING!!!!
Title: The App

Content: For some reason whenever you’re scrolling on your phone it goes blank and you literally have to refind the item again. Whenever you have to keep doing that it makes you not want to buy the item no more .
Title: Glitch

Content: I use to hate to return merchandise now I shop knowing that if I need to return something I can do it with such ease. Thank you.
Title: The ease of shopping

Content: I am having issues with the mobile app and I cannot find where I could find help with it. Every time I search for an item I’ll be scrolling the page then the page goes blank. So very frustrating. It’ll happen when I click on an item too. Where do I find help with this??
Title: Mobile app is getting worse

Content: When you send an email stating that a package is undeliverable you should state why! How can I fix something if I don’t know what the issue was. Did I have to sign for it and I wasn’t home (this should not be the case as I have ordered these items many times before), was there not an available delivery option…? This is ridiculous.
Title: Undeliverable?

Content: For weeks, in the middle of searching with the app the app goes to what looks like a white page with nothing. I have to close app the reopen and start all over. I thought maybe the latest update it would fix it but it definitely has not
Title: Issues with App

Content: Thank you so much ! I have a thought about what I need and I go here and it’s delivered within days ! Absolutely love this! And even returning is simple!
Title: Amazing service

Content: That stupid alexa button is useless and in the way . Get rid of it - or at least make it optional. Hate it.  Shipping has become terrible. Why am I paying more for prime when it takes over a week and everything arrives crushed because it’s now shipped in a plastic bag instead of a box?
Title: Get rid of the da** alexa button!

Content: My favorite place to go to find unique items and hard to find items.
Title: My favorite

Content: Need more than a doctor degree for what ever is wrong. But the app is great quick easy hopefully I got it right measured looks like 5.75 actually it’s 5.8 looking forward to it. If they could get rid of dumb and dumber. But that has nothing to do with the review. Have a good night. Tom
Title: Her him

Content: All of a sudden when I went to check on if one of my orders was on the way, absolutely everything was deleted off of my account. My whole cart was gone, my order list was gone, and my baby registry was somehow removed from my account? I have no way to add things to it or check to see who is buying what.
Title: Deleting things

Content: You can find almost everything
Title: I love this website

Content: This app was excellent until a few days ago.  Now when you click on user submitted video reviews or photos, it takes forever to load or just freezes the app.  I see other reviews have the same issue.
Title: Still Loading……..

Content: I’m writing this review because I’m locked out of my account cause I have a new phone and new number. The woman I was just on the phone with was so unprofessional! I gave her all my information. Home address, last 3 purchases, and still no help to unlock my account. I am so frustrated! I don’t feel safe with my old account on file.
Title: Locked out of my account

Content: Some items come with defects, but the return request is great and works out with you to get you the best of the products you buy
Title: Bittersweet

Content: Possibly the best online shopping experience available. Kudos, that’s a result of being an effective team.
Title: Great service on the user end

Content: I am having a difficult time locating auto parts for 2017 basic raised rail that would enable me to install a luggage carrier of my choice! Any suggestions? Please!😊
Title: Auto accessories!

Content: I love this app. I can easily tap it to purchase an item or to check the status of what I bought. Love it!
Title: Great App!! Definitely a Must Have in my phone!

Content: It’s nice to be able to buy everything at one place. But I wish Jeff Bezos was a better philanthropic leader. His in ability to take care of anybody else but billionaires is pretty alarming. I hope he takes a spaceship two different planet soon.
Title: It’s fine

Content: I totally love this app! No complaints. I do have a few suggestions, though.  •add an option that allows you to delete everything from your basket, plus a confirmation button.  •try to add more relevant things for searching a key word. for example: i type in “queen bed sheets,” it will pull up king, full, or even twin.  •add more recommendations besides the section that already does so.  Thank you for considering my suggestions.

Title: Impossible to log into app anymore without another phone or computer

Content: There used to be a row at the bottom with my wishlist, and now that’s gone.   There is sometimes a “what you were last viewing” section on the home page, but it’s not consistently there, and that is VERY useful!!  Sometimes I hit the back button and didn’t mean to do that, and I lose the item I was JUST looking at. Can you either add the “recently viewed items” somewhere useful and/or give a “forward” button, not just the “back” button?  Please fix the “Post your question” button so that it works in the app. I’ve tried on the iPad at least, to no avail!  Thanks!
Title: Getting Annoying

Content: I had various lists for different areas of my house (bathroom, bedroom, living room Ect) the purpose was to buy things to make the living space a lot more organized! Turns out the app updated and deleted the lists and with it the countless products I had found worthy to add! Complete and total waste!!!

Content: This app is getting worse in every update while the corporate is making fortunes. Stupid app keep asking to sign in every click and keep resetting the saved results without an app switch. I think they forgot to test the app in every aspect rather hastened to release new features! STUPID !

Content: This app asks me to log in so often. It’s not like in the past month where it kept me log in and retain my last page used. After 3 minutes of viewing a page it goes back to home page and I have to find what I was reading again. I am using safari and google chrome to log in now.

Content: The app works well, what I don’t like is the fact when you look specifically  for something and you get plethora of items your not looking for and that don’t match remotely anything as to what was searching for Worse yet deluge of what’s trending or forced based on previous searches. Stop trying to sell me everything!

Title: Why the next button!?!?!?!?!?

Content: Why is it that whenever I want to buy something it has a ridiculous shipping date. I want to buy some thing where I can buy for cheap and fast but the shipping does not add up at all. The dates are terrible, if I buy something it’s should not take a month and a half to get here. An example would be  buying a hoodie and the date says, Nov 6- Dec 4 this is despicable an needs to be changed.

Something went wrong”. This is the first time I’m opening it since it was updated two days ago. Please find the issue and resolve it.
Title: Issues

Content: Previous version superior and made browsing quick and convenient.   Current is painful to click ‘Next’ every ~20 items and deterring... tbh it’s also really unpleasant to look at. Maybe have an option to change between view settings if moving forward with implementation?   Please bring the continuous scrolling back!!!!
Title: No Continuous Scroll While Browsing?

Content: Since the last update I can no longer open the app and search for an item. I also can’t click on an item from Instagram “Shop Now”.  Once in a while I can access products if I first search through a browser but even that is hit or miss.  Useless until new version.
Title: Unable to search..

Content: Search is entirely too broad. Do it like ebay. I cannot share my finds with friends. No share option in my app...this is annoying
Title: Missing key functionality

Content: Can’t find a way to return items on the app, drag and drop is gone, and the orders page makes absolutely NO sense. Instead of it ordering most recent orders first it puts them in whatever order it feels like. Returning items - couldn’t even find a way to do it in the new app.   Bring back the old one. It worked fine and had more functionality.
Title: Terrible update

Content: I feel like the app takes more clicks to get to the same place as the website.   it defaults to the home page and won’t go back to where I was.   Currently I’m not seeing any advantage to using the app.  And.  The “reward” I got for downloading it was a coupon that never loaded to my account.  Usability 3/5 Loading speed 3/5 Worth using 2/5
Title: Clunky

Content: A heads up on dropping this feature would have been nice. I was convinced my app was having issues until I read other reviews. As a previous reviewer posted, the app should have the option to remove this feature instead of taking it away completely for the rest of us who enjoy it. Other than this inconvenience the app is overall pretty good.
Title: Drag and Drop

Content: Great products and price. I bought a Trianium tempered glass screen protector and the quality and easy steps to help you put it in your phone is amazing. it came with three screens protectors and an installation frame that I loved!!!
Title: Amazing

Content: The app is great but better support for text size scaling is needed. It can be very difficult to read descriptions add they don't scale up in don't despite configuring it in IOS and no independent app seeing exists.
Title: Better accessibility needed

Content: How do you use the search with camera function to use an already existing photo on your phone as your search term?  The help button on the app says you can but doesn't say how.   After chatting with and talking to ELEVEN people over the course of TWO hours I got someone who actually understood the problem.  The answer: "Yeah, that's weird.  I guess it doesn't work anymore."
Title: Search by photo doesn't work

Content: I am giving you three stars because I think it’s unfair that you have to spend $50 before you are able to write a review on products. Just because I haven’t spent $50 doesn’t mean I don’t have something to say about the products I did buy.
Title: Product review guidelines

Content: No longer have the ability to click the menu most of the time. Clicking it does nothing. Click on an item *most of the time* does nothing. Clicking return items, opens a new screen that is back to the screen you were just at. Opening a new item, takes you back to the screen you were just at.   I like this update...
Title: A+

Content: Don’t count on using this app during holiday sales. Four consecutive days have gone by and still no change.
Title: It crashes to frequently

Content: You’d think that most apps would be supported on your $1,100 iPad.... NOPE. Here’s another one that doesn’t work. I tried to rent textbooks and no rental options are available, but it works just fine on my iPhone and all options are there. Why the hell did I even buy this iPad if so many apps don’t work properly? Not happy.

Content: All of a sudden, I can no longer look up someone else’s wish list from the app(on iPad).  If you want to sell products, you really should fix this ASAP.  It is Dec 2 and I think there might be a big holiday coming up where people like to share their wish lists with others... just sayin’

Without that this app is useless to me.

Content: There is a keyboard bug on my iPhone X. When you contact to customer service via Chat online. The keyboard will only show up one time, if you minimize that, then you are not able to open the keyboard again. You need to close the whole app and restart it.

It blows up the picture so big and it won’t let you see the whole picture. Frustrating because that is a big help for me to decide if I want the item or not. I’m deleting the app.

Content: The last update was horrible. My app freezes as soon as I open a product and I can’t get out of it. Needs a fix and soon. I’ve never had a problem until now and it makes me want to scream in frustration!

Content: Used to love it for scanning books but now the scanner has expanded to include products and the scan search gives tons of irrelevant products. If I scan a book, I am looking for that book. Not all books have a barcode so the barcode scanning doesn’t help. Wish I could go back to the prior version.

After using the app for a while, it starts to develop “dead zones” in certain parts of the screen, particularly at the top bar.  I have to fully lose out of the app and restart it on my device to get it working again.

Content: Amazing app! Makes buying everything simple and is always adding more features!

I enter my password and it tells me “something went wrong. Try again”. Won’t let me do anything.  I try it on the web page instead of the app and it works fine. Very annoying! Please fix this bug!

(Similar to how Google Authenticator does it.)

Content: I had to call customer support to find out how to log off Prime when I finished shopping.    Step 1.  Tap the “hamburger” icon.  Step 2.  Tap the “Prime” icon.  Step 3.  Scroll down to “Settings”. Step 4.  Tap “Settings”.  Step 5.  Scroll to the bottom.  Step 6.  Tap “Log off”.   The ability to log off should be readily available on the “Home” screen!  Users shouldn’t have to jump through so many hoops just to log off.
Title: Logging off Prime is a hassle

Content: The new update caused major issues. After searching for an item and clicking on a product, the app takes you back to the main search page. You have to scroll down to the item again to see options or reviews.

Content: Ordered a toy for my nephew. Sorted by prime and next day delivery. It has now been over 48 hours and there is no was to contact customer service without calling. There are no options for issues with a late delivery.  You purchase prime for this exact reason. Life is busy and you have little time. Yet their “guarantee” is not true. There is no repercussions for them not fulfilling their end of the bargain.
Title: Prime next day not true!

Content: Why do companies think it is a great idea to change an app logo. Your users are accustomed to visually finding an app by the design and then you changing increasing user effort. It is stupid. Do companies really think they will get more customers with a new app icon design or that they lost customers because of the old one?  This is just the result of some designer justifying his salary with a new app icon design. Absurd.

The whole interface looks redesigned and it gives me anxiety now. Not shopping here until it’s fixed.

Content: ok the title is a joke, BUT. It was great up until ios 12/13, Bad updates, Different layout changes which aren’t necessary. I do recommend it for online shopping for certain things tho. But I find mercari way cheaper used in good condition, So buy from mercari instead imo.

This was my main way of shopping and now I’m really bummed.

I get the same email saying the account is still on hold and I need to reply with the same information I have given in the email 4 times and on the phone twice.

I tested it on other items and I was able to order them perfectly fine, and I also tried ordering the gift card with another item and it worked fine. It never worked by itself and it wasted lots of my time!

This is a horrible update to the app which in turn changed my account. AWFUL!!!!!!

Content: I don’t write reviews at all but the recent changes to the layout on the app really seems like 5 steps back. This is a mobile app not a website where I have to click a button to go to the next 15 or so items. The sorting feature obviously took another step back as well. What warranties this kind of step exactly? It would be zero stars if possible.

(It isn’t) then they send me an email with a one time password that I’m supposed to use instead. This is a horrible user experience, just to get logged in.

It’s invasive and violating to “think” for me. Appears you are attempting to turn your clients into trained monkey. I and my fellow customers OWN OUR THOUGHTS AND OUR DATA. Syndrome is automation out of control.

It’s been happening for some time now and I don’t know what to do.

Content: When you click on an item in the $10 and under category, you’re stuck with it. You can’t go back to the list of items and you can’t go to the menu...or anywhere else. You have to close the app and start over again.  Good idea, but needs fixing.

The other 2 times the button didn't do anything and I had to go back and start over. Going to have to dig up my laptop to make this order. Which year is this? :(

Content: Amazing app- One suggest to make it even better would be multi account access. I juggle accessing my personal and business account. It would save a lot of time if I could just toggle back and forth between accounts.

I already tried calling your 800 line but you guys told us we didn’t have an active subscription please help us!!!

Content: They are locking accounts- blocking all information- after spending THOUSANDS of dollars- now I have 0 info on any history- orders & they have all of my bank info just “locked” away in their twisted game- oh want to know why? “Unusual activity” - I bought HOUSE items & PARROT items- Smdh for 5 years it’s been the same- so please LIE to someone else- get on the right-

Content: It takes away everything from my cart every dang month I hate you and I will sue you for a billion dollars you will hear from my lawyers  -Abby Lee❤️

Content: What a terrible design choice! This makes it so much harder to shop.   A “4.2” rating doesn’t mean much if it’s from like seven total reviews, so I really hope they fix this. Content: I’m trying to click on use this payment method button and it doesn’t show error, card details are proper and yet it doesn’t take me forward to checkout. It get stuck on the same page after 100 times of the button click

I speak to three of your representatives who cannot help me and tell me the lists do not exist. I finally told them forget it. This is ridiculous.  As big as you are, you need to get it together.

Content: It seems you can no longer cancel subscriptions via the mobile application, you have to login in on the computer to do so (inconvenient). There is no “Advanced Controls” link to select to cancel the subscription via mobile. This app seems to get more terrible with each update smh.

Content: Don’t they make enough money off purchases and prime subscriptions and everything else they’ve bought? Seeing an ad when I open the app is so annoying, especially when paying for a prime account. Makes me want to cancel and shop elsewhere, I prefer in person anyway.

Title: If you can’t do 2 day shipping then just say it!

Content: I like the convenience of shopping at my time and the variety to choose from.

A great idea from the company.

Content: The Wishlist scrolling gets stuck in the last few app releases. I cannot scroll past a few items without it “rubber banding” back to the top of my list. For a shopping app, it’s incredible how much battery this hogs.

Content: The recent update is causing the whole screen to toggle when I try to swipe sideways. It’s annoying. Not user friendly at all. Please fix it.

I was able to save things quicker and now everything is much slower! It’s to confusing! Why did you make such a big change when it was working just fine!

Content: I think during covid, prime members need to be reimbursed. So many packages arrive days late. I was staying out of state and had a package deliver so late, by the time I was back in state it officially delivered. This keeps happening and I make sure I order items way before I need them delivered. Absolutely annoying

Content: My mom ordered stuff for my birthday and there coming wayyyyyyy after my birthday so now I’m not gonna get the things till after my birthday and she has to spend extra money so she can buy stuff that I can actually open on my birthday and my friend got me stuff to but that came already witch is good

Content: I can find everything I need on this app for a better price and the most important part, their customer service really works!

Content: Amazon’s Chat Support is very useful however y’all need to add a vibrate/sound/banner notification for when the rep responds back. They take a while to answer and i get disconnected when the phone display times out or I do something. Having to constantly switch back to the app to check to see a response is crazy.
Title: Chat Support

Content: It’s very annoying to have to go to the next page to view items. The load time and just tapping the button is a waste of time. Content: The option to archive orders (hide them) isn't available on the app. This removes the ability to surprise anyone in the family with a gift as it shows up in the orders tab. In the world we live in today with the majority using apps I don't understand why this function is left out of this app.

Content: Convenient when it works.  I get constantly stuck in “enter password” loops that randomly occur when I use the app. Even if you enter the correct password, it sends you back to the “enter password” page.  If you forget your password, you need another device to check your verification email, otherwise the app resets, causing another never ending loop.
Title: Convenient when it works

Content: This app is well designed. I can move between pages quickly and over the years I’ve rarely had tk worry about issues.
Title: Great usability

Content: Please bring back the drag and drop and infinite scrolling. I’m not sure why it was ever removed in the first place??? If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it! And can you PLEASE make picture scrolling on reviews more smooth?? I hate clicking arrow after arrow like I’m on a mobile site. I should just be able to swipe and zoom like any other photo on an iPhone.

Like the driving factor is to force more things in your face so you spend more.   They need to make results relevant so you find what you’re actually searching for. Also do I really need to chose my country every time I use the app??

Content: With the latest update, this app has become so much less enjoyable. Having to use the next buttons as opposed to the continuous scrolling is annoying. The reason given was someone decided that since we have MORE THAN ONE EMAIL ADDRESS THAT WE SHOULD LOGIN EVERY TIME WE WANT TO MAKE A PURCHASE. We have FIVE EMAIL ADDRESSES, so it’s just a STUPID POLICY.
