Title: Thankyou for such a great and pleasant experience

Content: The prime membership is worth the little money and they also have amazing deals!

With the volumes of orders during the pandemic it’s become hard to track what was ordered how much was spent in a way that it’s easy to reconcile back to my credit card to verify that there are no extraneous purchases
Title: Hard to manage

Content: Convenient and fast app for my shopping needs. Way better than using browser.
Title: Good app

Content: Love the app. Just my one little criticism is that the shopping suggestions aren’t as good as they could be in my opinion but other than that amazing.
Title: Easy to use and one of the best apps I use

Content: Y’all always have everything I need and shipping is also extremely quick!
Title: Love it!

Content: You can browse, save your wish list items or buy effortlessly! Good Savings and delivery impeccable!!!
Title: Easy way to shop

Content: I got a gift card to use on Christmas I used it three months ago and as I was using it they put my account on hold and every time I call they tell me the same thing I have been trying to get my account off hold for three months and I still have not got it off hold nor have I got my money from my gift card back 🤦🏻‍♀️
Title: They stole from me

Content: Convenient and just a click away! Use it way too often 🙃
Title: Addicted

Content: I’m able to get all my shopping done without leaving the house
Title: The introvert way to shop

Content: I gave this rating because a few items I have recently purchased have said prime on them. Yet it takes 3-4 days to get. If I’m paying for this “exclusive” service then why aren’t I getting the benefits.
Title: Prime items aren’t shipped according

Content: I haven’t have any issue with the app, and I really want it to stay like that, cause sense the pandemic that’s where I’ve been shopping, I really like the app.
Title: NO ISSUES

Content: Convenient shopping experience, practically has everything you need! One of the best shopping platform on the net! Hands down!
Title: Awesome!

Content: I bought a pop it and it said it was coming last friday and then it cancelled the it said it was coming on sunday still didn't come and i bought a super smash bros switch game a year ago still hasen't came
Title: Delivery issues

Content: Should wait until after the delivery comes to ask for feedback. App is user friendly. Easy. Can’t wait to start managing my time with your “restock” option. It’s overwhelming with options at first. Time is needed to determine size and frequency options.
Title: Great App

Content: Searching reviews has been disabled which is very frustrating. Keywords you can search are prepopulated by product and not customizable. Really annoyed this feature is gone it’s one of the most useful.
Title: Why is Search Reviews feature gone?

Content: Probably fine but the app just annoyed the absolute crap out of me right before soliciting a review... I entered specific information into the billing section and the app decided to change stuff to match the delivery options without my consent and I had to go back and re-enter it all. Very annoying.
Title: Bad time to ask my opinion

Content: Since the latest update, I have not been able to place a Whole Foods order. This was the most convenient part of the app for me considering I am currently without car. Every time I go to place the order, it takes me right back to the Home Screen. Customer service is absolutely no help at all and it’s not working on just the website either.
Title: A mess

Content: It would be nice to just get a difference returned onto my credit card instead of having to return an item just to re-buy the item at a lower price. especially during a pandemic happening, it would help not spread the virus
Title: Why not price match?

Content: People all realize back in the day you had a milkman you are a delivery man for everything it’s not new having stuff delivered to you
Title: Awesome commerce

Content: Through deals. Even if you aren’t touching the screen. Maddening! Please fix this. Also, the share link no longer brings the item into messenger, it goes right into an email. This is the iPad app.
Title: Screen jumps several pages down while scrolling

Content: 1 star for the icon that made it hard to find amount the apps 1 star for the reviews not working well on the iPad 1 star because the app speed seems to be degrading rather then improving in recent times
Title: Find everything but get ready for some hurdles with the app

Content: Disappointed that I didn’t receive the correct items. I received the new flavor packets that are not good. I ordered the old one, sent me the new one and they taste awful.
Title: Cherry crush packets

Content: The app crashes every now and then when you are on a product and can’t go back to results. Also the rating button to see other buyers reviews and photos, or questions doesn’t work.
Title: Fix the glitches!

Content: Love being able to just sit at home and order . This is a great way for us all and definitely love your family. Delivery are prompt and very friendly staff.
Title: Happy shopper

Content: This is a very Good app. I’ve bought some pretty good things from this app. It has supported me when I was unable to get things I need and I give this app 5 stars.
Title: Using for years

Content: Wasn’t packaged well enough.  Received it dented on all the pictures from something very heavy sitting on it. Also corner was bent.  All from shipping.
Title: Folk art Calendar

Content: Print is way too small. I cannot seem to increase the size
Title: Fine print

Content: After the newest app update, orders won’t go through. I tried to order the item that I tried on the app,  now on the actual website and it went through perfectly. Now I’m worried I was double charged. Will not be using the app until it’s fixed. Seems like a lot of people are having issues with the newest app update.
Title: Orders won’t go through after update

Content: I love this app! It is very easy to use. The only thing I can see that needs to be added is giving users the option of giving a nickname to each of the payment methods one might have.
Not sure why, but withthe newest update, I can no longer scroll through the multiple photos provided in product descriptions.  It’s stuck on the first photo.
Title: Can’t scroll through photos.

Content: Just today it started showing only 20 results per page and I can’t find a way to change that to more. I would rather scroll on the app then hit next a bunch of times.
Title: Not enough results on each page

Content: Please bring back the share/copy button!! It’s ridiculous that I have to share as an email just so I can copy the link. Then have to delete the draft and go copy into a message. Too many extra nonsense steps! Fix it!!!
Title: Share/Copy Button

Content: A great system, easy to use, and lots of option. Plus, you can track your package’s progress! Also, many of the items I order come early! It’s great all around. :D
Title: Great!

Content: I am unable to post reviews. I have asked several times for an explanation with no response or resolution.
Title: Can’t post reviews

Content: The search results now on pages is annoying as hell. Bring back endless scrolling of the search results!!!!!   In the customer reviews picture gallery when you click on a picture and then click “Back”, it brings you to the very top of the gallery instead of taking you back to where you were. VERY ANNOYING!!!
Title: Annoying “new” features

Content: All of the local stores seem to be jacking their prices. Maybe I need to figure out a better way to work with them. LOVE AMAZON!!!All the look
Title: Love the local stores.....BUT!

Content: For a company this large to answer the phone and fix a problem right now is incredible.  Awesome customer service!!!!!! Thank you.
Title: Awesome customer service.

Content: Been using the app for years and while there’s the obvious annoyances of the limitations using it on Apple, the reason I find myself writing the review is that the previous orders for my account do not even populate. I changed the filters and everything but had to switch to internet browser to find what I was looking for.
Title: Orders

Content: Floating one feels so out of place on iOS. Anywhere really.  Update: App now has a normal tab bar, thank you! Rest of the UI update seems good 👍
Title: Can I at least have a normal tab bar?

Content: The most recent update has caused some really blatant performance issues with this app. Trying to view my cart takes forever or sometimes just doesn’t load at all, I literally have to hard restart the app to view my cart at times. It’s also just sluggish in general compared to before on various other pages too, terrible UX overall
Title: Recent update ruined app

Content: Absolutely love having everything at the palm of my hand. Anything I need or may want is available and the app makes it easy to navigate through.
Title: Love

Content: This app is easy to use. I have not had any problems ordering or paying with it
Title: Easy to use

Content: If it’s easy enough for me to place an order without messing up..anyone can manage! I’m thankful for the ease of purchasing from the app!
Title: Easy to make purchases

Content: Thanks for making it easy to shop, purchase and return items!!!
Title: Merchandise

Content: As an everyday user of this app for the past, what, 10 or more years,  I can authoritatively state that this new update looks very amateurish and I hate everything about it.  I *never* review anything, but I feel so strongly about this that I feel it is important that the developers of this app hear from their user base.  Return the previous, excellent user experience!!!  Your changes make me really not want to use your app any longer. I suspect from what I see of other reviewers, that you will probably see a reduction in use as well because we no longer enjoy browsing for stuff we don’t need, but simply want.  Very disappointed.
Title: Terrible Sep 2020 UI Update

Content: The new update it horrible. Makes it hard to find and do what I need and it keeps telling me to do this and that. On top of that it feels like such a fake app now. Like something cheap like I’m about to be ripped off or scammed. Especially since my gift card money keep getting used or disappearing and all when I tell it not to use it.
Title: Update

Content: Why did u change the app layout!?? Please change it back to the older version that it was just a few days ago! It was so so much better with a back arrow. Better color too. Just a better version of the app. Please change it back:/
Title: REALLY!??

Content: My account when I didn’t receive an order disappeared it doesn’t show any of my orders and I never received my last order
Title: From 5 to 0

Content: This has helped so much!! Not able to physically go to stores, my new shopping skills!!
Title: Too convenient!!  Too easy!!!

Content: $15 for prime is good but the thing i do not like is that it allows sellers to ship thru usps or ups like im paying $15 for what also you can see how many stops away your delivery is at not usps and ups dont show that
Title: Good app but

Content: Bring it back bring it back
Title: Bring back suggested items on main screen

Content: The option is not working. The upload button is visible but when you press on it it does nothing. I have downloaded to the latest version.
Title: Unable to send product info to another person

Content: This app used to have a share button until it integrated the website into the app. I might as well use the web browser to shop at least I can send the address to somebody.
Title: Where is the share button?

Content: I want to apply multiple filters and now I have to go back into filter after every filter selection. I would also like to save certain search features (I always want customer rating over 4)
Title: Hate updates to filter

Content: I received a notification that my delivery was given to me in my hands; which never happened. Waited an extra day and still no package.  When asking for refund I was asked to return the item that I never received.  I hate it that I’m not more patient but what’s the point of prime then and them giving me a wrong day of delivery. Waste of my time and an incompetence on their behalf.🤦‍♀️
Title: Deliveries are marked as delivered when not

Content: Please fix the search engine, it just returns to many incorrect items. Also Chinese products flood the results on a search and many times you get the same product shown multiple times with the same product picture but different company name or supplier.
Title: Search returns incorrect items and too many Chinese results with same picture

Content: Please bring back the copy/paste feature.  Why would you take away the ability to copy text from items?  And even worse, being able to copy the Tracking Number of packages?  Whoever decided to remove that feature should not be trusted.
Title: Copy/paste feature

Content: I think the app is great normally, but the last couple of days it keeps crashing. I tried restarting my phone and it’s still happening. 🤷🏼‍♀️
Title: Keeps crashing the last couple of days

Content: I fell in love with my order. I order iPhone cases and screen protectors. They fit perfectly. This is not the first time I order something from u guys. U guys deliver really quick.
Title: iPhone cases and Screen protectors

Content: I hate the last two updates. It no longer feels like a seamless and easy app experience. It feels like being on the website only much more poorly designed. I want to scroll, not load the next page every 10 items. The only benefit is I’m saving a lot of money because I can barely stand to be on the app.
Title: Worst. Update. Ever.

Content: Every time I have to deal with amazons customer service it’s like pulling teeth to get any kind of help. They’re rude, seem to be untrained in how to treat their customers, and have even called me a quote “liar” until I provided screenshots of my previous conversations with them proving my side. Working customer service myself, I would never treat a customer the way Amazon’s customer service agents have treated me.
Title: Poor customer service

Content: So IRRITATING that I cannot search for friends’ wish lists by email address or name via the app. I had to ask each friend to share links to their already PUBLIC lists with me so that I can order their presents from my phone. Why isn’t there a way to search for public wish lists via the phone app? I guess only desktop users need to search?!
Title: Abridged (with missing features)

Content: Have no idea why people are giving bad reviews, I’ve had no problems other than delays which is normal given the amount on packages coming out everyday, It really is good App....
Title: Good App...

Content: Super annoying effect of the last update or two- switching between apps causes it to go back to the home page instead of wherever I was in my search results. This makes it really hard to comparison shop if I happen to get a text or something.
Title: Doesn’t save place in search

Content: Customer support have not been properly trained and are not knowledgeable enough about the problems with the app and I have been trying to purchase things for hours and have been left with no answers  Not the employees fault / it is amazons.  Pay more attention to problems with your app and website. Major bugs here
Title: Things are all good and fun until something goes wrong

Content: Overall good but how about those of us who don’t have perfect vision?  We need the option to change the  color scheme to white text on black background or something HIGHER CONTRAST   Weak letters on a brilliant white background are fatiguing.
Title: Overall good but how about

Content: I have been reading all the negative ratings. I have decided not to use your app. Just maybe you will fix it. Change is not always good.
Title: Notrate

Content: Everything works great except that every week or so it asks to log in again. No big deal, i have my creds saved in my iphone. So i tap on the option that correspond to the saved password door my email and the password field remains blank. No errors, nothing. So now i have to type in password even if all i wasn’t to do is check a delivery really quick. Please fix this!
Title: Fix ur app

Content: App started logging me out EVERYDAY. I now get a pop up all the time about logging in. If you are doing this for security reasons then at least let me choose with a “stay signed in” button. OR incorporate biometrics from the phone for me to purchase with face or Touch ID but stay logged in. Terrible UI experience compared to before. I wonder whose team approved moving this to prod?
Title: Newest update keeps logging me out

Content: The way pages are designed its a lot of white background. Reading white text off a black screen instead of the other way around is much easier on the eyes and on my husband when I’m shopping in bed. All of that white is really bright.
Title: Please add night mode

Content: This app is going backwards. It had a great hold to put into a wishlist feature. Gone. It had unlimited scroll feature which was great and the main reason I used this app over the website. Now there is a next button after every few items shown.
Title: Unlimited scroll gone. App going backwards.

Content: I like this app but it needs updated and my stuff arrived a few days early and still says it’s on its way when I already have received it yesterday
Title: Update

Content: The last one was much more user friendly. I hate how I have to pick a filter one at a time. And I miss having to view the products by sliding down.  Now I have to go through pages. It’s meh. No reason to change what doesn’t need to be fixed.
Title: Miss the old update.

Content: That is the message I receive often when I tap the “next” button to look at more products. This started about 10 days ago. Frustrating, to say the least.
Title: “Oh-oh, something went wrong, please try again.

Content: Not impressed with the latest update. I don’t like having to load new pages when searching for something. Also I’d like to enter all my filters at once before it refreshes. I have to open the filter option to add another filter. Change it back!
Title: Latest update not search friendly

Content: While I can search and select items, when it takes me to particular items, I can unable to view different colors/sizes and unable to “add to cart.” I press the buttons and nothing happens. I’ve tried uninstalling.
Title: Unable to hit buttons

Content: The app has not been letting me drag the product to my wish list, both on my iPhone and iPad. Is this a capability you are no longer offering? Also there is no where for me to report bugs happening with the apps so I figured a review might help
Title: What happened?

Content: Shipping has become an issue, nothing gets here in 2 days and the “tracking” in the app is a joke.  First it said “my delivery was next”. Then the map showed dot moving away from my neighborhood. It updated to “there are a few more deliveries before you”.  That was Wednesday for a product ordered Monday.  Now it says “if you don’t see it by Saturday contact us.”  Jeff Bezos should be ashamed.
Title: Doesn’t live up to promises

Content: Hi My app is telling me every time I tap on the item I’m browsing at it tells me that the page is restricted and if you know how to fix that then please tell me other than that i love your app!!.
Title: Help me please

Content: I used to love this app, but now the drag and drop isn’t working anymore. I can’t just drag the item and put it in my wishlist. I loved that feature because it made shopping so much easier. This app has many flaws now since the few updates. Please bring back the drag and drop!
Title: Used to love it, now not so much

Content: ****Latest update: The updates are making the shopping experience cumbersome and confusing. Shopping on the app used to be simple, streamlined, and straightforward. It’s the opposite now.   What happened to the drag and drop option for your Watchlist? I hope it’s an option that can be brought back with the next update to the app.
Title: Tap, Hold, and Drag no longer working

Content: I ordered two items and only one has come and the other I paid 1$ extra for two day shipping and it won’t be coming till June 28 it was supposed to come today and when I searched 5 cent items I put in filters free shipping it gave me stuff that was 700 dollars
Title: Two day shipping

Content: Bring back drag to add to wishlist! I “window shop” on the app more than I’m on Facebook, and it’s the only place I shop online! I won’t continue to use the app if I have to add items the hard way. Too time consuming and too slow. Please fix this!
Title: Drag to add to list gone?!

Content: This used to be my most used app, but that’s because I watched a bunch of “saved” cart items. This newest update only allows the first few saved items to be viewed. No way to expand the list either... so I have to leave the app and use my browser. Why have an app? If I have to use the browser I might as well delete the app. Worst update yet.
Title: Lost most cart functionality

Content: I just received my Xenvo remote  shutter release. It actually too 2 minutes to pair with my Blackberry Motion. There is no lag time between activating the Xenvo and the shutter release. The Xenvo is the most efficient release I have ever used.
Title: Xenvo

Content: When looking at user pictures in the reviews section, the ability to swipe to the next picture would be nice... used to have this feature.
Title: Wish you could swipe pictures in reviews

Content: This update logged me out and deleted all my lists and recently viewed now I don’t even know what stuff it was I was saving to buy later on 😒
Title: The new update

Content: I can’t believe I waited years to download this. I don’t know why there isn’t the best reviews honestly because it works perfectly for me and the barcode feature is awesome!
Title: Great!

Content: The app has improved visually with the latest update, but for some reason the ability to print return labels from the phone has been lost.  The new wishlist menu at the bottom is also unreliable.
Title: Improved but with new problems

Content: I would really like to be able to Buy my kindle books directly on the app instead of going to the website.
Title: Getting better

Content: I’m not a huge fan of reading the top rated reviews all the time. I usually read a few of them and then switch to most recent because it gives me a better idea of what everyone thinks about the product. Now I can’t sort reviews in the app to most recent, my most used feature.
Title: Can’t sort reviews

Content: Don’t know why you did it, but your latest update messed up the format when you open an item on the iPad app. 80 percent of the page is white and empty, while information shows up as a 1 inch wide band on the right side, with type overlying tiny pictures. It’s totally messed up and unusable as it is. Please fix this mistake as soon as possible.
Title: Latest update messed up format

Content: Mostly good, but strangely inconsistent when searching. I suspect sponsored products play a role in this. What really prompted me to write a review, however, is that the video that some products feature is broken in the current version of the app.
Title: Convenient but not always consumer-friendly.

Content: Annual cost went from $79 to $99, and now its going from $99 to $120. Just ordered an item early Tuesday morning and it says it will arrive Friday. That is their “2 day shipping”. They will tell you it goes by the date the item is shipped. So that’s right if they decide to ship it 2 days after you order the item expect to get it in four days.
Title: Annual cost has gone up $40, no longer 2-day shipping

Content: On my iPhone X, on the widgets screen, it will not show my order, it keeps saying unable to load. Also, while shopping, if you hit a customers picture they took, a black screen comes up, not a close up picture.
Title: Issues

Content: I was hosed on my last order. Your app never gave me the option to mark free shipping and was charged the full amount. I agreed to Oder thinking maybe it just comes off at the end.  NOPE! Cancelled order and ordered again. Same thing. Wanted the merchandise so I just let them scare me out of the free shipping.  If I were into conspiracy theories I bet TRUMP had something to do with it.
Title: Free shipping

Content: What is going on? Many items are not letting me select the color or size want/ need? I’m pressing the box and it’s like it’s frozen, nothing is happening. I’m having to go online to order which I noticed one of my items has a $3 coupon on the app but not on the website. Frustrating!!!
Title: App not letting me make selections

Content: Since the new update, I am asked to login anytime I want to do anything within my account other than browsing. Great. No problem. I’m glad my information is secure... but then I get a notice saying, “Sorry. Something went wrong. Try back later.” I can only purchase items from my desktop which makes having the app on my phone worthless.
Title: Fed up with receiving “error” notices

Content: After this last update on Jan 11, 2018 the search bar stop working
Title: Search bar not working after last update

Content: Miss latest update screwed up the top menu bar them. It responds one time, but after that, no response, and I have to force quit the app for it to work again.
Title: Menu bar doesn’t work anymore

Content: I absolutely loved using this app. The interface is nicely arranged and easy to navigate. I like how the seamless transition from hyperlink in safari goes directly to opening the app. It’s a nice feature.
Title: Love it

Content: Not happy with sellers not disclosing items are coming from China or Europe. I expect an item to ship 2-3 days after ordering and it’s over a week later then it actually ships. This does you no good when you need the item fast. Not only that, the shipping information is so uninformative it’s doesn’t help at all. All you know is shipped and delivered.
Title: Shipping!

Content: Fixed without n 24 hrs of my comment!    Landscape on my iPad stopped working. Restarted iPad, uninstalled and reinstalling app did not work.
Title: Fixed! Landscape mode on iPad stopped working on last update

Content: Not sure what happened with last update but I’m repeatedly getting this “something went wrong” message when I try to do anything except a basic product search. Pretty frustrating so shopping has to only occur in iPad or desktop, not working for iPhone. Woe is me. First world problems.
Title: “Something went wrong”

Content: This app used function seamlessly. Now my touch ID is gone (even though it is enabled in my settings) and every time I want to look at “my orders” it says I have to sign in and then when I sign in it says “something went wrong try again.“ When I open up the app it says I’m already signed in. Very frustrating.
Title: Touch ID and Password

Content: Since the last update, I can browse or search but if I try to check out, review orders, or otherwise need to enter my password it states, “Sorry an error occurred...” or returns to the last screen I was viewing. If I want to do anything but browse or search, I have to close the app and login on with the Chrome app. Please fix this...
Title: ATTN: Usability & V&V - bugs in last update

Content: This app is a must have, however the new update where they added touch id really screwed it up. It is now impossible to view orders or anything account-related, and the only message is one saying “Oops! Something went wrong!” That...uhhh...kinda needs fixed.
Title: Update Bugs

Content: I didn’t have to spend several weekends looking for exactly what I wanted. Thank you.
Title: Finding made easy.

Content: I was disappointed when landscape mode stopped working. After deleting and reinstalling the app, landscape mode returned. So, overall I have no issues. Nothing amazing, but works fine for me.
Title: Deleted and Reinstalled, Landscape Mode Restored

Content: I’ve never had any trouble with them and they have almost everything
Title: How good

Content: Not sure why, but when I use the Lens feature the camera stays on even after I stop using the feature. Unless I force-quit the app, the camera comes back on even when I re-launch the app. I hope they’re not spying on people 😆
Title: Camera stays on

Content: I don't know how else to submit a complaint about the app, so I'm doing it as a review. But with the search bar now t the bottom, I keep tapping it as I scroll, which causes so many issues and will end up with people buying less. No UI/UX designer I know would ever do such a thing. Please move it back.
Title: Search bar with the bottom?

Content: I’m am so incredibly happy to have the opportunity to get what I need without having to worry about it.
Title: Love items here

Content: I don’t even know where to begin all my dad wants to do is online shop like school supplies and clothes 1st of all everything I mean EVERYTHING is so expensive if I want 5 shirts it’s about $100 2nd of all I can’t even have the going out fun with my dad anymore all he wants to do is online shop and he is convinced that it’s cheaper when ITS NOT!!! I HATE THIS APP!!!!
Title: This app ruined my life

Content: I hate the new bottom bar search feature- it just makes sense to have it at the top.  Now it’s annoying trying to figure out what to press to go back and where to look for the search feature.  Not a fan of this update at all!!!
Title: Put the search and back button back at the top!!!

Content: Changing the search bar to the bottom was such a terrible decision. I just cannot fathom the decision making that goes into making app functionality WORSE for users. I cannot swipe back to the previous screen with one hand I have to tap the back button now. Just bad all around.
Title: Horrible updates

Content: And leaves my iPhone 13 burning hot. Plz improve processor load testing on recent devices.   Suggestion: The web app lets me set custom price ranges to filter results. I’m unsure why this isn’t allowed in the mobile app.
Title: This update kills my battery life

Content: I put this in 5 stars because their is delivery was said to send at Sunday and then when I was ready to get the delivery package it said again on Thursday it is trash man
Title: Scam

Content: I can always know weather I'll like the product or not, the review system is unmatched and trustworthy.
Title: Fantastic review system!

Content: It would be a lot easier if you could find influencers storefronts on the app instead of having to sign in on the website. It doesn’t make sense why this is so hard to do!
Title: Support the creators

Content: There’s times when someone else wants to know what I bought or what I am looking at, and the only way (I know) is to not use the application, but use and copy a browser page, real clumsy!
Title: Needs sharing capabilities

Content: The new app layout is awful exclamation the search bar is at the bottom and it doesn’t stand out. And the search function is not exactly intuitive either you might get one or two results that are actually relevant to what you’re looking for and the rest of it is just sponsored ads
Title: New layout is TERRIBLE!

Content: Moving the search bar to the bottom of the app makes me not even want use the app anymore. I liked it at the top where it seemed easier to search. If your going to change it on us at least make it where we can move it to where want it! Don’t fix what’s not broke!
Title: Search bar!!!

Content: why mess with years of muscle memory for no benefit to the users? I also noticed that the suggested results when typing are slower to appear and sometimes glitch after this new update. Please revert immediately, or at the very least add an OPTION to change it back!
Title: move the search bar back!

Content: I use this app daily and was happy with the old configuration. At the very least, the location of the search bar should be an option.
Title: Put the search bar back!!!

Content: This search bar being at the bottom of the app is driving me insane. Why on earth is everyone starting to do this?? If your going to change it up then at least make it an option where we can change it back if we prefer to like other apps are doing!
Title: Don’t like the update

Content: Bad enough the app keeps getting too much clutter, this new search bar feature at the bottom of the screen is beyond ridiculous & impractical to use while holding an iPhone & trying to type.
Title: Search bar at the bottom

Content: The last 8-20 items I have looked at have received that are for a completely different product.  Kinda hard to think about purchasing and air conditioner when the reviews are for tooth brushes.
Title: Wrong reviews on products

Content: As my title states. I hate the idea tab. Please remove it or let us opt in or out in app settings. I hate accidentally clicking on it. It’s not my thing. I just don’t care to have it.
Title: Love it but hate the idea tab

Content: There should be an easy way to search for keywords on reviews, especially if the product doesn’t have a Q&A. Seems pretty basic.
Title: Some Basic Functionality Missing

Content: Hi, my name is Tiffany Corbin and I have been waiting on my refund from three things that I have canceled. Content: I somehow got the new update and the screen organization is horrible. I can’t see the small screen of the phone well so I have the screen size magnified.  This app bar now takes up a 1/4 of the screen and I non stop scroll only 5 items at a time.  Now I can’t find anything.  How do I return something. Guess the old wasn’t tried and true.
Title: New style app not a fan !!

Content: Agree with the others: The latest app upgrade was a fail. It is much less intuitive even with all my best will. Why is there no share option anymore in the item pages? This really needs to fixed ASAP. The old app was user friendly. This is just a wanna-be-different move that “misimproved” things...
Title: Where did the share button go?

Content: Are use this app several times a week. To purchase, to delete in the cart is simple, all things are very easy to use.
Title: Easy to use

Content: My favorite place to shop
Title: Awesome place to shop and find everything you need

Content: Usually would give this app 4-5 stars. 5 stars when I was able to slide images down to the bottom into my wish list. Now I’m giving it one star bc when I try to log in, it says something went wrong. 🤦🏽‍♀️ I’ve been trying to log into my app for a week. Uninstalled over and over again. I can log in online no problem! Wish the app would work!
Title: App Troubles

Content: I rarely buy things in stores now. I can find anything I need on here and most of my items arrive early.
Title: Love it

Content: I wish we had the option to follow certain sellers that we like and that there was a place where we’d then be able to see all the products that they post kinda like a newsfeed
Title: Love the app

Content: Keeps freezing on iPhone 8+ when opening menu. Pretty unusable at this point.
Title: Freezing

Content: This is a good app idk why it's has three stars  I would give it more than five stars they never disappointed me  I get my BTS things safe and sound thx
Title: This is good app idk why it's has three stars

Content: I used to appreciate when we didn’t have to press “next” all the time. The last update made shopping take much longer I have moved to other sites. The other thing is the filters.  Other sites are soooo much better with the filters.  We don’t have all day to look through 4000 results.  Please make the filters work.
Title: Bring back smooth scrolling

Content: App is very easy to use and order from. The only thing I say is get better with searching for things in search tab. Other than that it gets my four and a half star rating.
Title: Very doable

Content: I love how you can check to see all the things you’d package went through and I don’t care if they don’t have dark mode it’s still a great app god bless you guys keep doing great!❤️
Title: Awesome

Content: I like the app but I miss being able to print an invoice from my ipad or iphone.  I never use the app with a PC.  The only way I am able to print is to login via google, ie do not use the app.
Title: Printing

Content: I love the fact that I can literally order everything I’ve ever wanted, but I hate when it says it’s free shipping and it ends up being over 5.99 in shipping totally recommend but it’s just that minor set back
Title: Great app but...

Content: I’ve not been in app for 2 days not since the update yesterday???
Title: App is Crashing after latest Update

Content: Won’t get past your logo! After the last two updates.
Title: Not working

Content: I am AMAZED that anyone could give less than 4 stars! From ordering, to being able to cancel, refunds.....to tracking packages and notification ~ perfection!  BTW ~ BEST PHONE SERVICE OF ANY COMPANY I HAVE EVER WORKED WITH IN MY 50 + years.
Title: What More Could One Ask For?

Content: Used to be able to highlight and copy tracking numbers to easily access them in the ups or fedex or usps apps or online and now we can no longer highlight the tracking info wth is this about!! Please fix this as I use it everyday!
Title: Can not copy tracking numbers anymore!!!!

Content: I has trouble signing in, I had all of my credentials correct but they told my something was wrong, I don’t know why it happened but please fix the glitch.
Title: Signing in

Content: This app always comes in handy when I want to order something quick and cheap. It is especially better considering that I have Prime. Great job!
Title: Great app!

Content: I don’t know what has happened, but I’m constantly being asked to sign in. I haven’t changed my settings so I don’t know what is going on but it’s annoying.
Title: Constant sign in

Content: I ordered an item for $160 and received an empty package and called to see about a replacement and they promised me a replacement and I did not receive it. Now I have to wait a week for an “investigation” to call back to see if I will get my item or a refund. I do not like this app anymore for the way they handle things like a small hole in the wall business when they are worth billions.
Title: Item stolen by delivery driver

Content: Bring back drag and drop and endless scrolling! Why do I need to click “Next” after 20 items? This update went backwards 10 years. I can’t even stand to use the app for more than 5 minutes because of the constant need to click through pages.
Title: Get rid of the NEXT button!

Content: This is the main shopping app that i use, because the tracking is always up to date. They also have really good pricing.
Title: Best

Content: It was working fine up until recently, now it keeps logging me out on both mine and my husbands phone, app is up to date, I even deleted it and downloaded again and nothing worked. Every day it crashes and logs me out and I have to keep entering info over and over again. Just fix this already.
Title: Keeps logging me out and crashing all the time.

Content: Every time you are on an item page and you click into the “Customer Question” box to search through other people’s questions and reviews it kicks you all the way to the bottom of the page. And then you have to scroll up to the customer question section again to conduct a search.
Title: Kicked to bottom

Content: This app use to work perfectly but after the new Apple update every time I open the app it asks me to sign into my account. I check the box saying to keep me signed in but without fail whenever I close the app and open it again it asks me to sign in.  I also accidentally hid the wish list tray and now I can’t get it back. It was so convenient.
Title: Keeps asking me to sign in

Content: It seems the latest app update has removed the feature to browse similar items either purchased by other customers or reviewed by other customers - I can't even count the number of items I have discovered and subsequently purchased only because these options lead me to finding them in the first place!  Please please PLEASE bring back those features!  The current app forces me to shop like one does from a shopping list at a grocery store, when I just want to browse!!!!  From Unhappy but long time customer
Title: Changes in latest update are terrible!!!

Content: I like to print a copy of my orders for my husband, who keeps track of our credit card expenses and uses copies of the orders like sales slips to match up the expense to the item when it appears on the statement. Not being able to print a copy of the order is a big minus.
Title: Printing copy of order no longer available

Content: Ever since the app has updated I’ve been having an incessant problem with error messages. Half the time I try to search for a product I get the error and a photo of a dog appears, when I click on try again, same thing. I force kill the app and sometimes it helps, but 75% of the time I cannot properly use this app due to the errors. PLEASE FIX.
Title: App Keeps Displaying Errors

Content: It is nearly impossible to use this on an ipad. For any item that requires you to pick from multiple options, the option list does not scroll. It’s so frustrating to find an item but not be able to add it until I go to a browser, my phone or computer to actually be able to make my choice.
Title: Scrolling is a dealbreaker

Content: There’s no watch the deal button any more. I guess it’s good. No more spending money because there are good deals!!! Thanks for the update.
Title: Where is “Watch the deal” button?!!

Content: You can’t do anything with your account (like deleting the account or adding prime) without having to call customer support who are sometimes nice and sometimes incompetent. It takes 20 minutes to get one thing done & it’s annoying. All I wanted to do was add prime but you can’t do it on the app & the process was so long I didn’t even want it anymore.
Title: You can’t do anything on the app :/

Content: Lately I have been constantly getting their “uh-oh something went wrong on our end” page for everything. So frustrating when your doing research, comparing products or trying to purchase. I hope they can fix this because this has been going on since prime day deals for me and I’m so over it!
Title: Uh-oh

Content: This app is pretty great, though I would definitely give it five stars if the pantry list options were better. There’s no option on the app to see your pantry list, OR add to your pantry list when shopping on prime pantry. That’s pretty frustrating.
Title: Needs option for pantry list

Content: There is no way to leave seller feedback on this app. You can read feedback that other people have written, but you can’t write feedback yourself. You can’t even do this on the mobile website. You can only do this on the desktop version of the website.
Title: Missing features

Content: But now it’s useless. I’m fascinated that the developers would remove the ability to just see the items you want that are upcoming sales. You can mark an item to watch, but it’s pointless because you can’t just monitor those items. I wish they’d change that back to make that useful
Title: I used to love it

Content: I totally LOVE this app!! I get really good stuff that I order!! This is great! There is no bugs, no problems, and when I search something up, there is millions of results!! The best part is that, the prices are awesome!!!
Title: Awesome!

Content: I love the app and use it ALL the time. Does the phone really have to vibrate every time I add something to the cart?  Makes late-night shopping pretty hard. There is no way to turn the feature off!!  Please please do something to remove it or make it optional!!
Title: Stop the vibration!!

Content: The app by itself works fine, but when I try to view any of the videos/advertisements for an item, it brings up a black screen with a crossed out play sign. Reinstalling didn’t help. There is no information out there who to contact to resolve issue.
Title: Cannot view item related videos on latest iPad

Content: I have the iPhone version and it works fine but when you choose to select a different color the window doesn’t scroll very well.   It only scrolls the background item versus the colors I’m looking at for the item.  I hope you fix it soon!
Title: Oh no!

Content: Trying to buy something with money not all available on same card immediately. Wish split payment options were available
Title: Wish it would allow split payments

Content: Every single item I ordered never made it to me. Sellers don’t respond. Charged me 12 times in a row for a Prime Account I closed. Told me I can’t register a Fire tablet I purchased because it was listed as lost or stolen. Promised me promo funds and never received them. Cannot believe that people love this crap. Addicted to shipping for stuff they do or don’t need. Sad that this type of Corp is taking over the world.
Title: Worse than Wish App

Content: I had written a horrible review in this app but it turns out that it was a user error on my part. I had fixed the issue and the app works perfectly.
Title: Oops my bad

Content: Horrible. I now have to endure videos auto playing when I search for something. This deserves zero stars. I’m already on your app buying. You are making money that way now I have to watch crappy commercials in my search. No thank you. Will not update rating until you let me turn the “feature” off.
Title: Now playing commercial videos in the search

Content: I’ve had several incidents with some orders and when I bring it to Amazon‘s customer service they were always great. Keep up the good job 👍
Title: The best customer service ever. Thanks!

Content: The App deign keeps changing on iPhone for some reason.  The way the left menu looks is always changing.  Why is this happening .  When I go to the AppStore to check any App updates it doesn’t show the app was updates.  So not sure what is happening here.  Please provide feedback.
Title: App Deigns

Content: Top brands filter doesn’t work anymore. Either the no-name brands are paying to be included or it’s broken. It makes it really difficult to sort through the junk. Please fix!
Title: Top brands filter broken

Content: I really liked the layout of the app, however once I downloaded the app, my billing info was glitchy, and my ability to download books from Audible became spotty.  Also, the main reason I downloaded the app was because I had received an email saying I’d get $15 in credit for downloading the app.  I never got it.
Title: No Thanks

Content: On the iPhone and on the computer website you can see pictures people have taken and attached to their reviews, but you don’t have that feature on the iPad. Could this be updated?
Title: Pictures missing

Content: I tried to use this app several times.  I needed to log into my account. The app is very slow and fails often. Even when it showed me the login screen, I couldn’t even enter my user ID. It kept failing, telling me to please try again. After about 12 tries, I decided to write this review.  Maybe someday this will work for me, but for now I’m deinstalling it.
Title: Something is always going wrong.

Content: The new update get into my nerves. It doesn’t want to load the items to add into the cart. And the worst thing is the app keep on kick me out. I have to reopen every second.
Title: Update

Content: For the life of me I can’t figure out why they would exclude customer review pictures and videos from the IPad app. I either have to go onto safari and find the product or bookmark and open on my iPhone.
Title: iPad version has let features than the iPhone lol?

Content: If you plan on paying for prime to have the free 2-day shipping, don’t waste your time. It takes days for the order to process before it ships out two days after. But when I didn’t have prime things were processed that day or the next and here in 3 days. So idk why it takes so much longer with Prime.
Title: Do not pay for prime!

Content: Ok so i downloaded the app made an account and bought something, tried buying something else , didn't work, i logged out and my password didn't work , I changed it like 5 times more and the new passwords never worked even if i try logging in on browser nothing works and i know its not my email as i get the emails that i changed my password ,if anyone knows what to do help
Title: I CANT LOG IN OMG

Content: If you want to write a review on the one and only item you have purchased you can’t. You have to spend a certain amount of money all together in order to write reviews. But, other than that the app runs perfectly.
Title: Reviews need work

Content: The app works okay. The service itself is good, but it could definitely be improved. My orders usually arrive on time and in good condition, but be prepared to receive a bad apple occasionally.
Title: Good service

Content: Frustrating App... No useful filter for browsing! Can’t filter out international sellers. Who wants to sellers that take weeks/months to deliver if they deliver at all. It’s ABSOLUTELY necessary to know location of products when shopping. Back Button but NO Forward Button when browsing or comparing products, you are forced to start over. Best to close this App and do your shopping online! FIX IT OR FORGET BOYS!
Title: Back To The Drawing Board Boys!

Content: For some reason I cannot change a review that deserves changed. I originally gave someone a bad review after I had a problem with a product I purchased. They saw the review and offered me an entire new one, if I offered to change my previous review. Which they did, and it works just great.  I tried changing it over a dozen times and the old review always stays.
Title: Rating purchases

Content: I love the app. And I use it more than any shopping app there is. But why do I need to go to my browser in order to buy kindle books? It is the same process and layout. Let me purchase kindle books through the app.
Title: Kindle Books

Content: With this latest update, the screen doesn’t turn on my iPad when I turn my iPad to the side, which is the primary way I use it.
Title: Screen not rotating

Content: It makes absolutely no sense that I have no way to buy a kindle book through the app, I have to go onto the web browser to do it and that just doesn’t make any sense at all. One might find this to be a small inconvenience, and it is in the long run, but it’s stupid that I cannot BUY something through the app of all things.
Title: Why can’t I buy kindle books?

Content: App is not working form me, as soon as I click on an item all I get is a blank flashing screen! As much as you charge me for prime and music I should have no issues. Because of this, I am seriously thinking about canceling! Shipping is never one time , you couldn’t even get a gift card to someone in the expected time!
Title: Horrible Update!

Content: The iPhone app works great still! However the app for iPad does not give you the option to update your account settings anywhere. Or if it does it’s incredibly difficult to find. I hate using my iPad to shop now. Please make it more user friendly. The apps vary greatly between those two.
Title: Not working well

Content: Can no longer check order status or place an order in app. I have to login through an browser to do either of these things. I have tried on different devices with Touch ID and with Face ID neither works. This is a basic important function that needs to be corrected.
Title: Order status

Content: We can no longer logout of the app? Why?? If you want to stay logged in, fine, but why did you remove the ability to logout?!? I have 2 accounts, for different purposes. Please restore the ability to logout. If it's still there, I can't find it
Title: Can't Logout?? Are you kidding me

Content: The app for the iPad needs the same level of quality updates the phone version does. The interface is outdated and has less functionality than the web version. If it’s possible to fit that information on the web version, then it’s possible to make an iPad friendly version that has the modern look of the iPhone app.
Title: iPad app needs help

Content: I’ve been using this app for years, the latest update has caused major problems.  I’m trying to shop and can no longer use the “back” arrow  or enter things in the search bar.  The entire row of controls at the top just completely stops responding requiring me to quit the app and then restart it.  Makes shopping next to impossible.
Title: You broke something

Content: Every time I attempt to log into my account I get a notification that says, “Sorry an error has occurred. Please try again later.” Yet it still logs me in. Which would be fine, but then when I try to make a purchase it gives me the same message. I’m able to make purchases on a desktop, but I prefer mobile... fix this asap!!
Title: App not letting me make purchases

Content: In the reviews you can’t see the pictures they attach. I look at the pictures to see the quality of the product. Please fix this.
Title: Can’t see pictures

Content: I love this app and use it frequently, but for the past 2 months or so, every time I try to sign in with the app, I get a pop up that says “Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.” and then I get a white screen. It’s incredibly frustrating, please fix this!
Title: Bug with the current version when signing in

Content: I'm having no problems at all with the app. If I had to say one thing bad about it I'd have to say it's that I probably spend too much time on it.
Title: Works fine for me

Content: For some reason whenever I want to cancel an order, even if it is less than an hour after the order was placed, the app asks for my fingerprint (which is not part of my settings) and then responds, “Sorry.  Something went wrong.  Try again later.”  No matter how many times I try, it never allows me to cancel the order.  Infuriating!
Title: Can’t cancel orders

Content: App was great until a couple of days ago when I kept getting an "oops, something went wrong", followed by a "Still loading..." screen that never loads. This has happened when I try checking my orders and checking out.
Title: There's a glitch

Content: This app was definitely working fine till recently. I’m disappointed because I can’t add anything to my cart anymore. I have downloaded and re-downloaded the app many times but still the same issue and it’s really irritating. Please fix this problem as soon as possible, I wish to be able to order things before Christmas.
Title: Add to Cart Button Flawed

Content: The app is very awesome and great to use. I bought many things such as books, jewelry, clothes and other items.
Title: Great app

Content: App will allow me to search for a product and choose to look at one item, but when I choose to look at the next one the app will either freeze or crash. It does this every single time I've used it since iOS 9 rolled in September. UPDATE SEPT 2017- Still really bad. It does not crash anymore but now it limits how I can search when compared to a browser search.
Title: App is Unuseable

Content: Nice app but cane we please have an easy way to find all of the authors we are following? I check to see if there are new books coming out and Audible versions available.
Title: Missing Author list.

Content: I don’t know why people write such mean reviews on this app! There’s tons of product you can buy in all different aesthetics!
Title: AMAZING

Content: Some of the toggle but are not work while the other do. Buy options and cancellations are freezing up.
Title: Issue with app.

Content: I collect Funko POPS and I love them. I ordered a rare one but it came a few days late and the box was damaged. I hate this. What do these people do with the packages! Is it that hard to  place them nicely on the ground and it ruined my whole year. Also the delay of packages is terrible! Especially when I pay extra to have it ordered early. Please fix this!
Title: PLEASE READ!!!

Content: My grandsons can forward links of their wish list
Title: Perfect gift selection

Content: I put a tent in my cart for $79 and waited to confirm with my husband, but a few hours later the tent price zoomed to $120 with no advance prompting that it would happen! I am sooo disappointed!
Title: Price changed unexpectedly

Content: Whoever decided to put that “add to cart” button in the lower left where most people swipe with their finger should be dragged out in the street and, well, you get the idea. I am sick and tired of scrolling through searches and adding items I don’t want to my dang cart. I’m deleting this app until I see it’s fixed.
Title: Got dang add to cart button!

Content: I am a prime member and for a long time now can’t received any items in 2-days. Not sure what the point of paying for prime is, if I can’t get 2-day shipping on anything anymore. (adding to say I used to be able to get everything in 2-day shipping so not sure why that changed).
Title: Prime

Content: Why haven't you enables your app to go Into dark mode? The light background with light writing is very difficult to see! Please fix it quickly!! Outside of that, love the app!
Title: Get Dark Mode!

Content: Amazon’s prices are double than Walmart and other stores these days. Their return policy is worse than that of your local retailers.  They’ll deliver for “free” if you pay for prime, but if you need to return your item, they make you take an errand. If I’m going to be out and about, I might as well support local and buy local while I save $$$.
Title: Crummy

Content: Thank you so much for prime day. I have saved $24 on my purchases for my pup pet hopefully will have another great sale sometime in the winter for Christmas.
Title: Dog harness n shampoo

Content: I received the wrong package and mine is no where to be found. Then the other package is running late when I needed it a specific day. I’m canceling my prime membership because it’s no point of having it. Then y’all don’t like to give refunds. I want my refund on the card I paid for the order with not no credit on the app.
Title: Horrible app

Content: I know this is an app rating but I don’t know how else to comment.  The chat is terrible, it’s supposed to be a real person but I swear it’s just a bot. I don’t know how else to contact them either. I can’t believe you can’t print labels at home anymore, I don’t have a UPS close. I should have stopped shopping here a long time ago.
Title: Terrible service

Content: What were they thinking.  App used to be great, one of the best, bit the redesign is moronic.  Moving the search bar to the bottom of the screen has to be the most idiotic thing anyone has ever done.  Everyone involved with that decision should fired, and then blacklisted so they can never find work ever again.  Complete garbage. Zero stars.
Title: Absolutely horrific

Content: App is working well, no problems.
Title: App is working well after latest update

Content: Needs a dark mode!!! Also somewhat glitchy when opening and closing, especially when music is playing in the background as music stops and resumes once app is opened.
Title: Dark mode pls!!!

Content: Seen others who updated recently and the search bar is at the bottom of the screen. I don’t know why this is becoming a thing but it’s not intuitive and disrupts scrolling because it’s easy to accidentally tap in the search bar. Colossal fail
Title: Search bar moved to the bottom of screen

Content: I hate having the search bar at the of the screen. Please bring it back to the top or at the very least give us the option in the settings to move it back to the top.
Title: Searching for search bar

Content: I’m not sure why this isn’t already an option, but dark mode is my preferred mode for my screen as I am sensitive to bright light. Even on my lowest light setting on my phone this app is still very bright. Please allow darkmode as an option.
Title: Please allow Darkmode in app

Content: The new location at the bottom of the screen is unacceptable. Fairly obvious tactic to force users to view ads before finally finding the search bar.
Title: Search bar

Content: Why change something that has worked well for many years?? At least give option in settings to choose search location...
Title: Please put the search bar back at the top!

Content: Just because iPhone did it doesn’t make it a good idea, at least give us an option to keep it on top or move it to the bottom.   Great app other than that.
Title: Put the Search Bar back on top!

Content: The search bar at the bottom is so distracting as you scroll down to view items and awkward for typing. At least give us the option to move it back to the top. I won’t be shopping via the app while it’s laid out like this 😑
Title: Loved until the update - move search bar back to the top!!!!

Content: Button location is right where my thumb scrolls. Everytime I scroll down I hit this button, adding unwanted items to my cart or multiple of the same item. This is a huge pain. Please move to another location on the screen.
Title: Please remove or change add to cart button

Content: Im really sad about this. I bought a package a few days ago and it was coming today but it got changed to June 10-12 and on the 9th my sister is having a graduation party
Title: Not happy

Content: I never understood why when apps change something simple like where the search bar is why they don’t offer options, how hard would it be to have a setting to choose where to have the search bar. I’d give it zero stars if I could.
Title: The new format is stupid!!!! I hate the bar at the bottom!!!

Content: Newest update has the search bar on the bottom. I strongly dislike this. Would love it back at the top!
Title: Search bar

Content: Something seemed to have changed recently where you can’t choose between different options anymore so it’s hard to tell what size you’re selecting.
Title: Recent Change?

Content: This app should have been left alone. Why fox what is not broken! This update that changed lists to saves is terrible! It’s very hard to navigate now to find my lists
Title: Update on list/saves is horrible

Content: App was constantly slow to load results or not showing me my lists and purchases. I ended up deleting it since the website works much better.
Title: Deleted it.

Content: On the IPad you are unable to click the other images for an item.
Title: Issues with IPad

Content: Tap into search bar…history flashes for a second, then is reduced to the last two searches. The rest are there, but not visible or useful.
Title: Search history broken

Content: I am trying to switch my address while changing country. App is not letting me do that as it’s not showing me options for address selection in bottom anymore. I tried restart my phone and also other methods
Title: Address switch issue

Content: Searching for keywords in reviews is no longer available. Making it hard to search reviews for related information. Please revert to old experience.
Title: Review search unavailable

Content: Better
Title: Fixed some issues

Content: This has been a constant issue for a while where I order an item by selecting “Buy Now” and the app orders the item and also places that same item in my Cart. Now I have to go into my Cart and delete all the recent items purchased. Annoying and confusing
Title: Items Ordered Stay In Cart

Content: I had the app for exactly 20 mins and everything hit the fan. I tried to hit final place order and the screen kept freezing. Simply closed it out, went back to my browser and placed order, then went back and deleted the app. Easy peasy.
Title: 20 mins

Content: They only aim to waste as much of your money as possible.  They will refuse refunding you for products that don’t work.  NOT ACCESSIBLE for those with Disabilities, made it clear they want to make it as inaccessible as possible and contributing to capitalist dicks who don’t care about you only wasting your money.
Title: Horrible customer service, not disability friendly,unreliable

Content: It’s great to have options to return items at your desired location.
Title: Easy Returns

Content: The app is designed to make it hard to find and do the things that you need to do, but easy to place fast order. They trick you into memberships and don’t even offer the next day shipment benefit of prime anymore, not worth it, just another mediocre e commerce now, much better options for shopping online now.
Title: Garbage company and app

Content: If they add a dark mode I bet you’ll see nighttime sales go up real fast… overall the app is good though. Has some unecessary buttons and could be less cluttered
Title: Dark mode

Content: Can’t believe how many times they have changed my delivery date and I was never informed. Some things I can’t buy around me and when mine breaks I need another one asap in order to work. At least have the courtesy to inform me if there’s an issue.
Title: Lack of communication

Content: I buy everything with this is way better then apps like wish
Title: Love this app

Content: Ordered parts for my car around $200 worth of stuff they locked my account calling it suspicious, can’t get in contact with customer service any type shape or form due from having to sign in to get in contact when I can’t because my accounts locked hope you skums enjoy my middle class hardworking money👍
Title: WILL STEAL YOUR MONEY

Content: Had this issue of upwards of one, if not two months. When searching either past orders or just for items, or scrolling on an item’s page, the screen will turn blank. Going back fixes it but puts you at the top of the page.
Title: Blank screen when searching

Content: please update the app so that it has dark mode to be able to use at night it is very annoying for the eyes, I don't know why it doesn't have that option, many users will thank you since all the apps in 2022 are compatible, greetings
Title: Dark mode

Content: The latest update takes you to another page for different sizes instead of just dropping down. Time waster!
Title: Latest update not for the better.

Content: Excellent service and delivery. User-friendly website and suggestions were not found what I need.
Title: Diane

Content: Shopping to checkout is lighting fast.  I can’t believe I have not been using the app all of this time
Title: So very easy

Content: I am very excited about receiving my new leather case for my new 12 pro max iPhone! I can’t wait to to place it on my new phone; stylish and protective!
Title: Very Nice

Content: Thanks for making it so easy to order all the things I love!
