Content: My grandmother, Mother, and all of my aunts if they were still with us - would love this service.
Title: “Simply the Best-Better than all the Rest”

Content: Easy to check out easy to search products
Title: Blink

Content: Scan shop at local merchant hardware/sport stores...finding shopping easier on line to see what’s available, and to view consumer ratings.
Title: Time is money...

Content: Always on times and if I ever have to return a product there are no hassles!
Title: Convenient and On Time

Content: Best of everything
Title: Always great prices on quality items

Content: Always on time and quick to get delivered excellent service
Title: Fast and accurate

Content: I just ordered a pair of shorts and a pair of shoes and when I checked on them today it said there was a payment problem with the shoes so they weren’t ordered and then I had to buy something else and my check out was only going to be 9.98 when o ordered yesterday but because of the problem it was 20 $ so I’m really not happy at all
Title: Not happy

Content: Majority of my orders turn up late. I check the shipment, it tracks to my city. Next thing I know, it gets sent to states up north, then either becomes even more late or never shows up at all. I really don’t get why either. Shipped to my city in Louisiana, then all of a sudden gets shipped to Tennessee?
Title: Late

Content: Me and My son have asthma, we’re allergy dust, I was turning on then after a week much better and fresh Thank you 🙏🏻🙏🏻
Title: Better then before

Content: Update did make the user interface cleaner, but isn’t as easy as the older version of app to navigate through. Still OK though.
Title: Update not as good

Content: I only have one request: all products should publish their place of origin.
Title: Excellent online shopping site

Content: The site works great and is very convenient and easy to use
Title: The site works great and is very convenient and easy to use

Content: Always my Favorite way to online shop!! Thanks for everything all these years 🌻🌻
It makes me feel like i can get anything i want and when and it basically everything on there keep up the great work guys🥰
Title: Dear:amazon from: Joszelle

Content: I tried to order something and it’s making me fill out a payment document just so I can get my item. I think this is stupid and shouldn’t be a thing. Sorry that your app has this dumb thing. 😡😭
Title: Broken App

Content: Tired of “oops”.  Tired of “still loading”. Tired of not being able to sign out. Tired of product pages loading with just a black screen.  Going to take my business to Walmart, target, anyone who can reliably let me shop online when I need something. This crappy programming issue is over two weeks old. DONE!
Title: Worst update ever, going to shop elsewhere

Content: Parts of your site is hard to navigate like sending items to different addresses my mother love to send children and grandchildren things but often has to make many orders to change the address
Title: Like the easy but not the shipping

Content: It says “sorry. An error occurred. Please try again later.” Fix this bezos.
Title: Suddenly can’t log into my account

Content: Hey stink stink so i recently change my name to hellobaka and it isn’t showing for me so can u pls help me with also i’d like to say that i recently had a baby and her name charlie talentless meilo so can u give me a discount ty very much stink stink☺️☺️💗
Title: New baby😜😜😋🥵💗💗💗😛😛💕💕💕💕

Content: I was told when I ordered my sketchers I’d recieve them April 1, now it’s telling me I won’t get them till April 9, this is bull!!! Do not give false info an delivery dates I needed them this early that’s why I ordered right away ALSO if I ordered them with in a certain time frame I’d get them April 1, so I then ordered them now I won’t have them in time for my vacation!!!! AMAZON~~They are liars an not a happy camper right now FURIOUS😖😖😖😖😖😖
Title: Told I’d recieve item April 1,

Content: I used to not have prime but when I did it was so quick and easy
Title: Great and quick

Content: I appreciate the speed of getting my products when I desperately need them.
Title: It get it when I need it!

Content: I gave the app one star because it recently started playing video ads to PAYING prime members. This is absolutely infuriating, especially given that I have very little data and they’re wasting it with their greedy practices. I don’t know whether this is intentional or just a bug, but this shouldn’t be happening!
Title: Shows very limited results

Content: I've used this app for quite a while, years and it has always had this issue where it stops responding and you keep tapping the options but nothing happens, yet you can still scroll up and down.
Title: It stops responding

Content: Great app for online purchasing. But, I really wish they had a dark mode. Like I know I can turn my brightness down but Amazon’s screen is so bright. I’d like the app if it had dark mode enabled. Thank you
Title: Dark Mode should be a thing

Content: I don’t agree with taking down Parler to help the competition. Been on Parler for a year and never seen violence, want to see hate read Twitter. It also seems that a lot of the genuine products are knock offs from China. Read reviews how a lot of stuff looks different then from other stores. Censor America just not china
Title: WAS my only place to shop

Content: All the time when a looking for something. You always have the product. I loved when they said shipping free!!!
Title: I loved . Keeping doing excellent job.

Content: I changed my password 2 weeks ago and ever since then I haven’t been able to log in. Every time I try I just get an error that says “something went wrong”. At one point it forced me to change it again but the new password didn’t work either. This seems like a long time to wait on this significant of a bug to be fixed...
Title: Cant sign in

Content: I chatted with customer service twice about “undeliverable” item, they offered a refund but I said no I need the Item ASAP and they said “ok we will send you the item”, but they did not. The name of one of them was Aswin and I have a screenshot of the chat.  Then I talked with a supervisor named Will in a phone call and told him about the guys who lied to me in customer service and he said it is not his problem!!!
Title: Bad experience

Content: Make sure to order as soon as possible most items arrive sooner and some later
Title: Shipping

Content: It truly is unbelievable how easy it is and to be able to do it from the convenience of your own home that’s just fantastic.
Title: Amazing!

Content: Love getting my things in the mail quickly and when it does not work the return is easy.
Title: Love

Content: Good app app but I order an over night package and it has been 24 hours and still not here however great app!!
Title: It’s kinda meh

Content: I turned 60 yesterday and as I sit here ordering on my phone I had to think back how far back we have come. From card catalog to put it in my cart. Not the same cart during my day😂This is the new wave!
Title: New wave

Content: Also I wasn’t allowed a return or refund.  I ordered the product with a picture of the upc on the label, and the item I received was still incorrect.  Not mad, just disappointed...
Title: Incorrect items sent

Content: I have no access to my account no way of deleting it and I’m still being charged a monthly prime membership I’ve called costumer service about 15 times and when I say it’s been nothing but a waste of time I mean it.... ridiculous customer service if you ever have any problems with them I pray for you because they will get absolutely nothing done
Title: Horrific costumer service

Content: Its terrible that you guys put people’s accounts on hold when they add a new payment method. You just assume its an unauthorized payment or unusual activity. People work hard for the money they spend on this app and you guys should ask security questions or something instead of just LOCKING someone out of their own account that they know the email as well as the password to ! TERRIBLE SECURITY AND COSTUMERS SERVICE IDIOTS
Title: Why

Content: This app needs a filter for people like me who don’t want to buy from China. I want to support US companies ONLY. PLEASE ADD THIS FILTER!  And yes the lowest to highest filter seldom works right.
Title: Needs better filters

Content: Love them .... I have seen a difference in my hair since I’ve been taken it took about three months before I notice a difference 💙💙💙
Title: Laura Jones

Content: Links on product pages often don’t work. Specially links for similar products. Also When you scroll down on a product page the back button functionality disappears and you have to scroll all the way back up to find it.
Title: Terrible on iPad

Content: I’ve been trying for months to get rid of a reacquiring subscription charge. It takes a long time to talk with a person then they switch you to someone else then put u on hold then tell u you’ll get your money back and it never shows in your account!!!
Title: Beware of subscription charges

Content: Why do search results on the iPhone app now look huge! Each item takes up the whole screen, so it’s impossible to browse quickly! I think somehow this changed within the last few hours for me. (I normally live this app and use a lot!)
Title: Search results got too big!

Content: While shopping for boots, clothes, and other items for Christmas presents, I’m unable to do something as simple as filter by brands. I’m shown a lot of items that I decidedly don’t want and am unable to filter them out of my results, even when going directly to brand shops. This has made my shopping experience drawn out and tedious, and I don’t enjoy it at all.
Title: Poor shopper experience

Content: Overcharged me on an order without telling me they were gonna renew my membership. Didn’t receive the product only a oh we are sorry this happened wish there was more we could do. I’ll never use prime again. You guys have millions of customers so I’m sure it doesn’t really matter to you but I’ve been a member for a really long time so thanks for nothing
Title: Overcharged

Content: Recently, I cannot get this app to work to save my life. Every time I open it the screen is stuck constantly loading, before finally popping up as a picture of a dog with a “something went wrong on our end” message. This has been happening for nearly two weeks now, and desperately needs to be fixed!
Title: The new update is a nightmare!

Content: The newest upgrade on iPad is awful. Three major issues for me: 1.  Can’t tap to enlarge pictures. Just gives you a magnified view. 2.  Can’t share an item by text, only email or social. 3.  Clicking on review number at top doesn’t automatically take you to reviews. You have to manually scroll down to find reviews. Please fix it!!!
Title: Ipad app upgrade is awful

Content: Not impressed with the updated version of this app. I previously enjoyed being able to swipe trough pictures rather than having to zoom in and click on each individually. I really hope for another update to change this back. Definitely not worth the hassle compared to other shopping apps
Title: Poor update

Content: When returning to the list from looking at a specific item you’ve called up from a search, the app throws you back to the very beginning each time which is EXTREMELY frustrating when searching long lists.  There was NOTHING wrong with the old format. If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it.
Title: Hate the new app

Content: Shop for anything at the touch of a button. I might be addicted :-)
Title: Shopping has never been easier

Content: Such a helpful app! Easy to navigate and so convenient and helpful. Never any glitches.
Title: So easy to use and so convenient

Content: You can find everything you want , easy to used just click and you are done
Title: Excellent

Content: Using this app is the easiest way to shop.  I highly recommend using it!
Title: Easy Shopping

Content: I LOATH this new design. The UI morons who designed this should all be fired.  You took something simple, functional and consistent and scrambled it all to hell.   We are creatures of habit and efficiency with learned muscle memory. I’m now instinctively trying to tap functions in places they no longer exist and getting unexpected results/nonresults, and there is literally no benefit to the changes.
Title: Terrible redesign

Content: I don’t shop anywhere else now super convenient super easy best thing created!
Title: Greatest shopping experience

Content: Have always had good service.I  never received my three rolls of scotch tape and bamboo ear swabs.  I would like to find my items. I never received them. Help me out.
Title: Missing items

Content: The latest update ruined the functionality of the app. Moving the home, account, shopping cart and menu buttons to the bottom of the app screen make the app difficult to navigate and hard to use. At this point, the website is more user-friendly than the app.
Title: Latest update ruined functionality

Content: Leave a good thing alone don’t screw it up like you did with this alleged upgrade   Hurts to even suggest upgrade.
Title: New web layout

Content: This is my favorite place to shop. 90% of my shopping is done here. Good products. Good value.
Title: Many choices. Great value. Awesome customer service.

Content: Very reliable, completely satisfied. I would recommend this app to everyone. Thank you
Title: Fantastic app

Content: This app just changed a couple of days ago, and I don’t think for the better. The menu is now at the bottom of the screen and is clunky. The old one was much more attractive, and the drop-down menu was more elegant.
Title: A step backwards

Content: They have helped me with a lot of last minute stuff and boom it’s right at my door earlier than expected. I live that they send me suggestions of things I just needed.
Title: Awesome app fast delivery

Content: I think that this app is great. Very useful and the items have been arriving pretty quick.  Thank you and I thing you’re doing great.
Title: Great

Content: Use to be a 5 until I pay for Prime for The fast delivery 2 day went away. Not worth it anymore .
Title: Rating

Content: Freezes, can’t get out of search filters, and if I do they don’t apply. Filtering items such as high - low is a joke. I was initially thinking about how nice it was to select my options all at once rather than one at a time, but this is absolutely worse than before!
Title: Update isn’t efficient as it looks

Content: I ordered this thing and it said it would get here in 2 days but then came in 5 days
Title: Super long wait

Content: Heads should roll over this new UI, it’s total trash. I’m a web developer of 20 years and I’m utterly shocked on how bad this new design is. I know for a fact that it’s having a huge negative impact on mobile sales. I’m sure this alone will be enough to roll back to the old design. This is such a crazy fail, it’s like they pushed a prototype live without testing it first, by accident.
Title: New UX is Garbage! Fire the Developer!

Content: In the lists section, the list doesn’t show everything you’ve saved. So when you’re looking for something you have to search for it all over again, but it says it’s on the list! Very annoying

Content: I had a complaint and talk to their support on chat. I keep following up it’s like my second month now. I tried contacting them just now and there’s like three representatives that I talked to. the first two just left while we’re communicating and had to repeat everything again. As usual they did not resolve my problem. so I ended up just cancelling my Prime.
Title: don’t waste time

Content: The redesign adds 2 more steps to everything.  I actually have to change the way I hold the phone to get to the menu.   Just why???
Title: App redesign is horrible UX/UI

Content: Lots of changes many are major which are confusing to many users. It’s difficult to navigate around the AP & find ur way back. Example, to change your billing address a head scratcher for sure. Simplicity is the key when ur dealing with the masses. Thx you in advance for ur consideration....
Title: Not user friendly:

Content: Awful horrible user experience I’m sorry you can’t find app developers that understand e-commerce
Title: HATE the new app layout

Content: Small complaint- can all order history be exported in any way?
Title: Works well

Content: Every since the latest update the app will not even open.
Title: App doesn’t even open

Content: For whatever reason, now that the COVID issue is lightening up, Amazon’s reliability in delivering packages on time these last few weeks has seriously declined. I will wait until all of my items arrive, and then I likely will not return until my shipping times aren’t comparable to those of Wish.
Title: Reliability has seriously tanked

Content: I love this app so much. I do not have any problems with the shipping . It does take stuff out of my cart tho but it will but it back in my
Title: I love it

Content: i’ve been using this app for at least 2 years great app has its moments but what makes the app difficult is when you buy and item they’ll take the money but then in a few days give it back then take it again , this app needs to learn take the money while its there stop giving the money back!.
Title: use at your own risk

Content: Keeps logging me out and when I input the password, it asks me to verify a credit card that I don’t have anymore. Ugh
Title: So frustrating

Content: Application seems slow and page loads on every time I tried opening even product. Even orders placed page takes time to open. Also retrying payment or changing payment option for bunch of items seem not possible at least that’s what appears from ui  Disappointing experience
Title: Doesn’t seem like mobile native app

Content: I left the country for two weeks and came back to my membership cancelled and in that process they crashed my firestick since they unlinked everything. I am in tears after thirty minutes of trying to fix this and being on hold... now being told they have to factory reset and I’ll have to rebuild everything. I have never had such a terrible experience.
Title: Disaster!

Content: There’s no way to share things anymore without going complicates way of adding a single item to a list, re navigating to the list, and sharing a link to the list of one item. Wouldn’t be as frustrating if it was a feature that was present and working, but the devs actively put in effort to remove apparently.   Will be 5 stars if it returns.
Title: Removed share button

Content: This would be a great app if it didn’t constantly refresh itself every time the app is closed. If you leave the app for literally 10 seconds to read a text message, you are back at square one. It’s maddening.
Title: Refreshes every time it’s closed

Content: Run pretty smoothly but there are some problems, like when searching low to high price on a product, also 900 results disappear. I think the cart layout could be updated to. It would also be a good idea to add a dark mode
Title: Needs update

Content: The latest version of the app requires me to re-login before I can look at my past orders.  Login isn’t using my saved credentials with Face ID and when I switch away from the app to get the OTP for two factor auth, it puts me back at the beginning of the login process.  So login is effectively impossible unless you can get your OTP from a different device
Title: Latest version is broken

Content: I really miss the endless scroll and ability to step away from the open app then continue shopping later. Now I have to click “next” a gazillion times while shopping and if I leave the session, it starts me all over. Boo.
Title: Really disappointed in latest changes.

Content: This app works well for all orders except kindle books. Don’t understand why.  It seems a bit crazy and is certainly annoying that I can’t order kindle books on phone or ipad.
Title: Kindle purchases not allowed

Content: I was fine yesterday although it started asking for my password....but I got in Today it asks for my phone number .....does not recognize.   Then my touch to login.  Does not work  So at least my iPhone has not updated in ages and seems to still work okay. Christmas is coming ...don’t mess with my shopping!
Title: Last release no longer allows me to log in

Content: Easy search and shop with easy order. Be interesting to see what could make it better!
Title: 5 stars

Content: Infinite scrolling was so much better than clicking a new page every dozen or so items. At least add the “show more” but a full page reload is slow and frankly obnoxious. I assume it’s to sell adds or what have you, but it’s annoying to use. Bring back the infinite scroll!
Title: Review for update to app.

Content: It used to be easy, there was a prompt to rate your item. Now it’s gone. It’s been agaves since I rated anything. I enjoy rating & surveys.  How do I get to the rating screen?
Title: Rating purchases

Content: Although the app is convenient, that’s only when it works. I’m constantly getting the “oops something went wrong” pop-up . It’s very frustrating!!! I contacted customer service and was told to delete and reinstall the app, same thing keeps happening. I’m a prime member, but that may change.
Title: App is horrendous

Content: I use amazon...a lot...I do not like that I can’t see everything on one page anymore. You look at like 20 things and then constantly have to hit next page. Please change it back or give us options of how many items we would like to view per page.
Title: New update

Content: With the latest update, when opening the app it shows the picture of the dog and says something went wrong. Closing the app out and restarting does not help, nor does deleting and redownloading. It is very frustrating.
Title: Loading error

Content: I do not like that there is now a “Next” button at the bottom of a page, and why did you change how we can select filters? Please change it back.
Title: Dislike current version

Content: I’ve loved this app for years but the last update changed things for the sake of changing them.  Hard to find some things I used frequently and the my orders just drives me insane!  It’s confusing to look at and if have more than a couple orders in shipment it’s impossible to track them all
Title: Hate new update

Content: so I was adding stuff to my cart and it was at 52 so it started to take stuff out of my cart and but it on saved for later and it was 161 stuff saved for later can y’all fix that
Title: good but one problem

Content: I've been using the app for years and had no complaints. I loved it. Then the wishlist tray at the bottom disappeared. What happened? I used this featured all the time. What's going on?
Title: Was great

Content: I like the app, but I have a hard time seeing the writing. The font size or boldness is not an option in settings. I do wear glasses, but till find the visibility daunting.
Title: Fonts too light /small

Content: Even though I am running it on a brand new IPhone Xs the app runs really slow and won’t load pictures of items. It also has problems adding items to cart and the layout sometimes looks really poor.
Title: App runs really slow and won’t load pictures of items

Content: Should be able to scroll through customer review pictures with a swipe . Instead of clicking back to look at the next picture
Title: Customer reviews pictures

Content: The share button overlaps with images, which makes it nearly impossible to find
Title: Bug found

Content: Usually no problems but sometimes app won’t go to checkout. It starts and then goes back to shopping over and over again. Have to go to a computer to checkout
Title: Pretty good

Content: Occasionally crashes, displays the wrong info or a blank page. The one thing that actually bugs me is that the option to sort by prime delivery is gone. This makes shopping with the app very inconvenient.
Title: Prime option missing

Content: I love the convenience but have been shafted multiple times by receiving low-quality products despite the higher quality ratings. Also, the scheduled delivery dates are not met by the vendors. I wish they allowed me to rate the vendor to inform other customers about their poor service.
Title: Unreliable delivery dates and garbage products

Content: Often times when using a gift card to purchase the app will crash or force you to reload multiple times and will not count your items as your attempting to purchase them.
Title: Needs work

Content: Recently, if I touch a photo of an item to see a larger image the first time I do this, all is ok. If I go to another item and do the same, the photos of the first item I viewed and zoomed are displayed.. didn’t do the in the past as far as I remember.
Title: Problem with item photos

Content: It is truly incredible how one of the biggest companies on earth can’t seem to hire competent devs. Each update brings more bugs and crashes than before. On iPhone X, I can’t even click the menu hamburger without the phone crashing. Don’t you morons test the app before you release it? A company worth billions should have a flawless app on mobile devices. No excuses.
Title: Brain dead developers

Content: The reviews option tab (Top / most recent) does not work.  It’s not letting me change to most recent. And I already tried closing & reopening the app. Please fix.
Title: Excellent app, BUT...

Content: Latest update ruins the image opening feature. Opening images of an item does not work after you have opened images of a previous item, the previous item always comes up instead of the item you are currently looking at.
Title: New Bug

Content: App is fine for browsing & adding things to your cart, but if I ever try to check out, I get asked to log in followed by an error message “Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.” I don’t think I’ve ever successfully checked out through the app.
Title: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

Content: This version is completely broken
Title: Need to fix it quick

Content: The top navigation doesn’t respond after this update!!!!!!!!👿👿👿👿Last update app has been slow  Please optimize the loading of items in cart and home screen page I like the app just needs improvements to have all website features/options  Buggy can’t click on my cart now
Title: Slow says still loading a lot freezes

Content: The Oct. 19, 2017, version 9.20.0 has bug that sets my iPad Air to portrait mode and will not let me change back to landscape until after I close this app.
Title: Version 9.20.2 bug Fixed with 9.21.1 THANK YOU!

Content: Used to be great... couple weeks now I can shop, add to cart, etc. Now when i click check out it scans my face, acknowledges, then goes to a white screen and says error.  If i cancel and try again, it'll go, but then if i try to change shipping address, payment method, or anything else, same issue.   have resorted to the mobile web site.

Content: This is one of the glitchiest apps I’ve ever used. It’s constantly crashing when I’m trying to make a purchase, log in rarely works, if it does, it says “sorry something went wrong” and never loads. I have tried opening and closing the app, updating, and restarting my phone. Nothing has consistently worked, it’s a roll of the dice of whether or not I can log in.

Y’all are false advertising and messing with our money!

When browsing, I now have to keep pressing “next” to go to the next page instead of just scrolling down through the items.  Also, “today’s deals” is no longer in the drop down. I now have to click on “see all programs” and then look for today’s deals.   Unreal and beyond annoying.   Whoever comes up with these ideas of making you go through extra steps just to do the exact same thing as before should be fired.   Stop fixing something that’s not broken!!!

Uninstalling and reinstalling resolves the issue for a couple days, but the issue continues to return.  iOS 12.

Content: Every time this app gets updated something goes wrong. The latest version won’t let me log in. I can log in on the website so I know I’m using the right password. Content: App is slow. Need to have more control of settings/ preferences within the app. I can't archive my orders in the app because it looks the same as the mobile website. So this means I have to go on desktop version in order to do all of this! What's the purpose of the app.

Content: Latest update does not work in landscape mode.  I hope this is a bug and NOT a "feature"!  PLEASE FIX ASAP!  UPDATE:  Landscape mode returned to iPad. Thank you and here are your 5 Stars...see how easy that was "CITIBANK"!!!!!

Content: Last few weeks the app has not been functioning.  I constantly get logged off and Touch ID does not work.  I get stuck in loops trying to check out.  I can’t view my order history, etc... the app is hardly functional right now.  Unfortunate, with the holiday season being here 😁

Content: So frustrated. I use my iPad almost entirely in landscape mode. Up until today, it worked flawlessly. But with this latest update, the app now stays in portrait mode - even when my iPad is on its side. My case is designed to open and work best in landscape mode, and I much prefer this angle for typing and reading. Please fix this!!!

Content: App works fine, but my ipad pro is connected to the keyboard 100% of the time, and it doesn’t shift to landscape anymore. My ipad isn’t locked for screen rotation and all my other apps rotate. Guess it was something lost in the ios updates and app updates. Hope it comes back soon.
Title: What happened to Landscape view?

Content: The apps a good app obviously can be better but all apps have downfalls. Anyways for buying fast this app is great and it works with alexa just tell her to add something to your cart or to order something it will work.

She don’t make a lot of money and it would be hard for her to get everything I want and what she wants .

Content: Every interaction with customer service has been awful so far please get your call centers out of India. It seems like they are paid per called a take because it seems like they’re only goal is to get off the phone with you as quick as possible.

Content: So happy to see the search bar back at the top of the screen!

Content: 99% of the time, if I have a problem, customer service is there to help me! And make me happy!

Content: Always a pleasure doing business with you. Great deals, prompt delivery. And you have everything I need and more!

Content: I hate searching for something and my top results are of some other things.

Content: The switch from visual review stars to numeric and longer displaying the number of reviews means you have to open every individual item to see what you used to be able to see just in the search results. Horrid user experience.

Content: Can’t stand the search bar move to the bottom of the screen. Please make an option to move it back to the top

Content: What the heck happened with this update?  App takes forever to load now…. So many times it times out it is so annoying and frustrating.  PLEASE FIX THIS UGH
Title: What is going on with this app now?  This update

Content: I hate how the search bar is now on the bottom instead of the top. It just doesn’t make any sense and makes using the app feel far more clunky.

Content: When I looked for tracking I got a message that if it had not arrived by the next day I could return to the site and request a refund. When I returned the ability to request a refund was no longer on the site. This is the third item ran late am considering canceling my prime membership.
Title: Parts not delivered

Content: The new version moved the search bar to the bottom of the screen and it is terrible. If you want to institute this kind of change, please give the user an option to keep it on top.

Content: I had a package delivered to my Florida address. I need it NY. My NY was my default address. I had to purchase another ( brushes) because I need it for my swimming pool. I can’t use it in Florida. I can’t return it until October when I go south. The app won’t let me reach costumer service unless I want to return the item which I can’t do until October
Title: Customer Service

Content: Crazy how many software engineers they employ and all they have is this mediocre app. Scrolling isn’t vertical-locked, constantly kicked out of checkout. But they never fail to push updates through for dumb prime day splash screens and pointless theme updates. Fix the backend issues. I’m about done with this subpar service.
Title: Terrible app

Content: Probably my most used app. Desperately need a dark mode for my eyes as I shop mostly at night. Please!
Title: Dark mode when?

Content: I have this time-sensitive package that requires me to give a passcode in person to the driver to get package. It gave me a notification saying I’m the next stop but I waited whole day and never received it. Then the customer service was not helpful at all and give me ambiguous reason and dates.

Content: Put the search bar back on top where it belongs...or give us an option to move it.  Change that doesn't improve the process is just someone trying to justify their job.

Content: Why did you move the search bar to the bottom for certain users?  I didn’t want to be part of your test group.  I have stopped using the app and will not use it ever again if you choose to leave the search bar at the bottom.  Why would you even do that?

Content: Encouraging people to sleep less in order to increase sales is a questionable business strategy. It could lead to bad decision-making and impulse purchases, particularly for items needed urgently. Moreover, it seems strange for a large company in 2023 to not offer a dark theme option for their app. There is no other explanation for being evil.

Not to mention the fact that the company denies factory workers a living wage and the right to unionize.

Is or has Jeff made a deal with Bob to force us to buy phones?  Wake up, you will lose a lot of customers, change it back!

Also, when I do (temporarily) get it back into landscape mode, the bottom third of the screen is missing. Very frustrating!

Content: “Sorry there seems to be a problem on our end.” — I’m so tired of seeing this message! The view of the app constantly changes from landscape to portrait. Sometimes it seems to realize it did this without prompting from me, the user, but mostly it doesn’t. It drives me crazy.
Title: What is wrong with your App??

Content: The only reason I joined Prime was for the quick delivery. Not the outdated movies, not the joke that is “Prime Day,” not any of the 20 somethings style junk. I joined for convenience.   It is no longer convenient. You’re lucky to get items in a week now…. Which means Walmart even has them beat.  Free shipping? Everyone has free shipping- most only require $35 order.   They blame COVID… yeh who doesn’t now days… do you want to keep customers? Don’t sneak changes like this by them.   I’ll just be planning my shopping lists better and saving $120 a year now.
Title: No more two day shipping and no refund on membership

Content: I got one day shipping and rarely do I get it within a week
Title: Delivery times to long usually and o have next day shipping,, Since Covid

Content: I swear the people that design apps don’t use them.  I get it they want you to spend more time using it.  But the latest redesign is horrible.  Everything worked perfectly in the old design and there was no need to change it.  This is simply a change for the sake of change.  This is why apps are ruined all the time.

Content: Seriously? Taking away the option to sort someone’s list from high to low through your app...NOT COOL!! Bring it back, and bring it back fast!! Yes you can still do it from a computers but still would like the option on my phone which is here I more that likely SHOPPING FROM!! You guys messed up here! FIX IT PLEASE!

Content: I don’t know who your testers were for them to think moving the nav buttons to the bottom of the screen was a great idea - perhaps you think your audience is 3yo who don’t actually use the app or spend their own money. It’s awful and I won’t be shopping again until this is repaired. It shows little regard for customer preferences.

Content: The app used to be so user friendly now with the new update it’s as if I’m using it on Windows 95 PC or a Commodore! What is this? Where you guys high on drugs when you did this update? Or was there a competition how can we make the worst update in the history of app updates or did you do it for BLM so they can have something real to argue about?
